Clients in Russia that process Mastercard transactions should review menu items for importing and exporting these transactions to NSPK.

Inward Processing: if the "FILE_FORMAT" pipe parameter in the menu item for importing IPM files is absent or has the value "U1014", additional actions are not required. If "FILE_FORMAT" has the "RDW" value, it should be deleted before the first import of a file in 1014 blocked format.

Outward Processing: if the "FILE_FORMAT" pipe parameter in menu items for exporting IPM files (including Collection only files) is absent or has the value "U1014", additional actions are not required. If "FILE_FORMAT" has the "RDW" value, it should be deleted before the first export of a file in 1014 blocked format. Also if the menu item has a subitem for conversion from RDW to 1014 blocked format, this subitem shoud be deleted and the "IPMMAST__INITIAL_DIR" pipe parameter must be reviewed. It should contain the final (not temporary) directory.

Note that exported files must be sent to Mastercard also (not only to NSPK) according to "Mastercard Bulletin No.4 3 May 2016" as earlier. Since now NSPK and Mastercard formats match each other, there is no need to generate 2 files. A copy of the NSPK file can be sent to Mastercard.

Money transfers

CARDS-53816

B2B and G2B money transfers license validation has been implemented for the following transaction application codes: 
FD,GD,MD,OG,C02,C03,C04,C05,C06,C09,C55,C56,C57.
Upgrade Note:
To allow the system to process B2B (FD) money transfer transactions (application codes: FD,GD,MD,OG,C02,C03,C04,C05,C06,C09,C55,C56,C57), the appropriate license option must be configured. Please contact Customer Support.

CARDS-54891

Changed VISA OCT reversal processing. OCT reversals with Target Channel "VISA SMS" are rejected with Return Code "12" and Posting Status "Under Workflow". OCT reversals with Target Channel "VISA" are not sent in the online phase and should be sent in clearing.
Upgrade Note:
В случае непредвиденных ситуаций (отправки в канал VISA онлайн-отмены OCT-транзакций) документу присваивается статус Under Workflow - для ручного разбора.
После проведения реконсиляции необходимо документы с таким статусом проанализировать и принять решение о постировании или отмене документа.
Updated Manuals: [transaction_management\Documents.pdf]

NSPK interface

CARDS-54803

Added a new DEFAULT_USAGE pipe parameter to define the bin_table.usage field for NSPK (MIR, JCB, AMEX, UPI) ranges and VISA/MC ranges not corresponding to the appropriate original IPS bin range. NSPK MPE Import.
Upgrade Note:
NSPK MPE Import: a new DEFAULT_USAGE pipe parameter has been added to define the bin_table.usage field for NSPK (MIR, JCB, AMEX, UPI) ranges and VISA/MC ranges not corresponding to the appropriate original IPS bin range. It is recommended to set DEFAULT_USAGE=H to avoid problems with P2P transactions from MIR cards to VISA/MC cards.

CARDS-56735

Added the ability to run several NSPK Export processes in parallel.
Upgrade Note:
Added the ability to use a sequence generated by DB file numbering, which allows several NSPK Export processes to be run simultaneously.

CARDS-53502

[MIR REL] 2017.2 B-05. NSPK Outward Processing (pipe): EMV tag 84 is filled with the "EMV_AID" document tag value if tag 84 is absent in addendum_doc chip data.
Upgrade Note:
[MIR REL] 2017.2 B-05. Если для межхостового обмена используется пайп "Affiliated BASEII Outward Processing", то для поддержки данной статьи в параметр "TAGS_TC50_<Processing BIN>" пайпа должен быть добавлен тег "EMV_AID".
Updated Manuals: [ips_releases\nspk\20XX_XX_NSPK_Requirements.pdf] [UFX_H2H_Interchange.pdf (NDA Specification for vendors)]

CARDS-55802

[MIR REL] 2018.1 B-20: NSPK MPE Import. Supported import of new file field BILCURRENCY_CODE. This field is stored in the CH_BILL_CURR tag in bin_table. To override this value, a new pipe parameter, CHANGE_CURR = "YYYXXX" can be used, where "YYY" is the currency code from the file and "XXX" is the currency code to store in the database.
Upgrade Note:
[MIR REL] 2018.1 B-20: NSPK MPE Import. Supported import of new file field BILCURRENCY_CODE. This field is stored in the CH_BILL_CURR tag in bin_table. To override this value, a new pipe parameter CHANGE_CURR = "YYYXXX" can be used, where "YYY" is the currency code from the file and "XXX" is the currency code to store in the database, for example CHANGE_CURR = "643810".

CARDS-55901

Supported new ODPT DE22.6 (Pos Entry Mode subfield) "10" value for incoming clearing messages according to B-16 NSPK Release article. Also changed processing for DE22.6="82" value on import. NSPK_RELEASE=18.1 additional global parameter must be set for new processing.
Upgrade Note:
A new ODPT DE22.6 (Pos Entry Mode subfield) "10" value for incoming clearing messages has been supported according to B-16 NSPK Release article. Also changed processing for DE22.6="82" value on import. NSPK_RELEASE=18.1 additional global parameter must be set for new processing.

CARDS-55904

Changed processing for DE22.5="4" value according to B-16 NSPK 18.1 release article for import files.  NSPK_RELEASE=18.1 additional global parameter must be set for new processing.
Upgrade Note:
Processing for DE22.5="4" value has been changed according to B-16 NSPK 18.1 release article for import files. NSPK_RELEASE=18.1 additional global parameter must be set for new processing.

CARDS-55987

Supported new [1240-220] adjustment message according to B-18 NSPK 18.1 release article. "EXT_CASE_ID" document tag will contain DE72 (dispute case id in NSPK) value.
Upgrade Note:
A new [1240-220] adjustment message has been supported according to B-18 NSPK 18.1 release article. These messages are imported to the database like adjustment (partial reverse) messages. Important: For correct processing of settlement documents received in [1644-685] (financial position) messages for [1240-220] adjustment messages, the optional DE26 reconciliation category must be selected in the NSPK questionnaire!

Notifications

CARDS-55552

Changed the values of the following variables for multicurrency products: USG_LIM_CURRENT_AMOUNT, USG_LIM_CURRENT_NUMBER, USG_LIM_MAX_AMOUNT, USG_LIM_MAX_SINGLE_AMOUNT, USG_LIM_MAX_NUMBER, USG_LIM_UNSPENT_AMOUNT and USG_LIM_UNSPENT_NUMBER. Now the values of the counters and the sum are taken from the base card. 
For products that are not multicurrency, the values of the variables remain the same; no search for the base card is made.
Upgrade Note:
В нотификациях для возврата значений ограничителей по мультивалютным картам теперь используется значение счетчика для карты в базовой валюте, которое суммирует транзакции во всех валютах. Для возврата к использованию в нотификациях счетчиков в валютах, отличных от базовой, или только в базовой валюте необходимо настроить отдельные ограничители.

CARDS-54717

Changed the result of a value returned by the %TRANS_REASON_DETAILS% variable. Now it returns the whole text from the doc.reason_details field instead of text from doc.add_info.
Upgrade Note:
Поскольку у переменной %TRANS_REASON_DETAILS% изменился возвращаемый результат, то необходимо проверить шаблоны сообщений на наличие переменной %TRANS_REASON_DETAILS% (или с тэгом %TRANS_REASON_DETAILS:tag%). Если переменная использовалась без тэгов для получения значения поля документа add_info, то ее необходимо заменить на %DOC_TAGS%. Если переменная использовалась для получения значения тегов, то ее необходимо заменить на %DOC_TAGS:tag%.
Check Scripts:
Для поиска шаблонов сообщений можно воспользоваться следующими проверочными скриптами:
CARDS-54717_SMS_template_reason_details_01.sql
CARDS-54717_SMS_template_reason_details_02.sql
CARDS-54717_SMS_template_reason_details_03.sql
CARDS-54717_SMS_template_reason_details_04.sql
Updated Manuals: [notifications\transaction_notifications\Transaction_Notifications.pdf]

Product management

CARDS-53979

Removed processing for the EXCLUDE_SIC tag from the CUST_EN_PREFERRED function.
For SIC Code, use the EXC_SIC_LIST tag.
For SIC Group, use the EXC_SIC_GROUP_LIST tag.
Upgrade Note:
Так как из стандартной индивидуально настраиваемой процедуры cust_en_preffered убрана обработка тега EXCLUDE_SIC, необходимо проверить использование данного тега в настройках. Для поиска записей с данным тегом можно воспользоваться проверочным скриптом.
В найденных записях необходимо использовать стандартные теги: EXC_SIC_LIST для задания кодов SIC и EXC_SIC_LIST_GROUP для задания кодов SIC Group.
Check Scripts:
CHECK_v1_CARDS-53979_EXCLUDE_SIC_tag.sql

CARDS-55995

Implemented forms for adding/editing product classifiers with "No" in the "Set to Contract" field; after changes made using the new forms it is not necessary to reapprove the product. Additionally, when approving a product, the value of the "Set to Contract" field value is automatically set with the SET_TO_CONTRACT tag value, if the tag is specified in the "Custom Rules" field of the "Product" -> [Classifiers] form, or with the "Yes" value, if this tag is not present.
Upgrade Note:
При утверждении Продукта также реализована проверка на пересечение диапазонов дат для установленных классификаторов. В случае выявления пересечения дат, изменения Продукта не будут утверждены с сообщением об ошибке "Incorrect intersection of activity periods of the classifier".
Check Scripts:
Для выявления пересечения дат классификаторов следует воспользоваться проверочным скриптом CHECK_V2_CARDS-55995_product_classifiers.sql, результаты работы которого будут сохранены в журнал выполнения процесса "Checking product options". Для исправления пересекающихся периодов можно использовать стандартную форму OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Products\Product Definition\Products -> [Classifiers].
Updated Manuals: [core\Contract_and_Client_Classifiers.pdf] [product_management\Products_and_Subtypes.pdf]

CARDS-60347

Upgrade Note:
При обновлении версии изменяется поле Event Group Code для схем резервирования. Поле содержит значение типа События (Event Type) в поле Event Group Code, которое совпадает со значением в поле Accrual Code схемы резервирования. Такие изменения не затрагивают стандартный процесс резервирования, но могут повлиять на некоторые решения. Необходимо проверить пользовательские пункты меню и процедуры, если они используют поле Event Group Code схем резервирования, и исправить их соответсвующим образом.
Проверочный скрипт CARDS-60244_RES_RISK_SCH_01.sql необходимо запустить, когда дополнительному глобальному параметру MULTIPLE_RESERVE_SCHEME присвоено значение "S" или "L", или до установки соответсвующего значения. Оставшиеся значения используются для MOVE_RESERVE.

Remote access

WM-3099

Upgrade Note:
If conf/config.properties contains the copy_managed_jars attribute, it should be set according to the value present in system/config.properties. Application Server should be restarted after upgrading the server application.

Reversal management

CARDS-57656

Corrected invoice standing payment orders processing in backdated processing: now invoice standing orders are recalculated in backdated processing without the need for additional configuration.
Upgrade Note:
Ранее при исправлении операций с помощью модуля Reversal Management платежные поручения, связанные с инвойсами, обрабатывались в режиме Reapply (проводки отменяются и затем выполняются повторно без изменений). Теперь платежные поручения, связанные с инвойсами, будут обрабатываться в режиме Recalc (проводки пересчитываются). При необходимости вернуть прежнее поведение требуется установить на платежном поручении тег STORNO_ACTION=REAPPLY;.

CARDS-58556 / I1807084877

Added a check that CDU was performed for the contract involved in the backdated processing actions.
Upgrade Note:
Теперь, если процедура ежедневной обработки контрактов (CDU) для контракта еще не завершена, и для этого контракта вызывается процесс корректировки модуля Intelligent Backdated Processing (корректировка в ручном режиме, преобразование расходной операции из предыдущего отчетного периода в рассрочку и т. д.), система сформирует соответствующее сообщение об ошибке для обеспечения согласованности данных.
Чтобы закончить CDU для данного конкретного контракта в такой ситуации, а затем применить действие Intelligent Backdated Processing, необходимо установить глобальный параметр FORCE_CDU = Y.

SOA

UFX-443

Upgrade Note:
Validation of the <InstitutionIdType> element has been enhanced for Additional Statement requests. Now correctness of <InstitutionIdType> values will always be checked. Allowed values are: Bank, Branch, CB. There is no possibility to keep the old behaviour.
The correctness of values in this tag for UFX statement requests must always be checked, otherwise a GeneralError message will occur.

UFX-468

Added document identifier field (DocID) to UFX instalment statements.
Upgrade Note:
Now in UFX instalment statements the InstDocID parameter is used instead of InstPlanID to get an instalment plan with a specified document identifier.

UFX-488

Supported <CompanyDepartment> in responses to client information requests.
Upgrade Note:
<CompanyDepartment> field in the response to client information request is returned (if it was previously loaded) regardless of ufx protocol version. The old behaviour is not supported.

CARDS-56656

Fixed UFX Messages Response Codes conflict. 
"2510 Unknown object type" replaced with "1920 Unknown object type", 
"2200 Client not found" replaced with "1930 Client not found", 
"2210 Multiple clients found by specified criteria" replaced with "1940 Multiple clients found by specified criteria"
Upgrade Note:
Изменились коды сообщений об ошибках, возвращаемых UFX:
вместо "2510 Unknown object type" теперь используется "1920 Unknown object type",
вместо "2200 Client not found" теперь используется "1930 Client not found", 
вместо "2210 Multiple clients found by specified criteria" теперь используется "1940 Multiple clients found by specified criteria"
Изменения могут повлиять на работу системы, если в програмных компонентах используется привязка логики к коду ошибки.
Необходимо проверить текстовым поиском по исходным кодам програмных компонентов, использующих UFX, обработку изменившихся кодов ошибок. Проверить, не используются ли изменившиеся коды в таблицах перекодировки/маршрутизации.
Вернуться к старому поведению можно только откатив обновление системы.

UFX-495

Fixed incorrect behaviour on export of affiliated clients in UFX Information responses and in Changes Export pipe.
Affiliation/Code element in a UFX response is now filled with the value of affiliated_client.SOURCE_REG_NUMBER. Previously it was always the same as Affiliation/Type.
Upgrade Note:
Systems that expected Affiliation/Code to contain affiliation type code should be corrected to use Affiliation/Type instead.
The old behaviour is no longer supported.

UFX-517

Renamed elements from <StornoCorrection> to <Correction> and from <StornoDocId> to <CorrectionDocId> for UFX Additional Statement Request.
Upgrade Note:
Changes have been made in UFX Additional Statement Correction request. Elements have been renamed: from <StornoCorrection> to <Correction> and from <StornoDocId> to <CorrectionDocId>. The old field names cannot be used. <Correction> and <CorrectionDocId> must be used instead.

Statistical Reports

CARDS-56949

Added a new parameter P_IF_ACTIVE_STMT (varchar2(1), the default value is "Y") for the "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business" report. The parameter defines how to calculate the "Number of Statements Mailed" value - by valid cards (=Y) or by all account contracts (=N).
Changed the P_REPORT_TYPE parameter processing to support writing SQL statements in it.
Upgrade Note:
Изменена логика работы параметра P_REPORT_TYPE. Например, можно задать значение P_REPORT_TYPE="c.report_type = 'C'" вместо "'C'". 
Параметр можно использовать для  SQL-запроса, который отбирает контракты, по которым были отравлены выписки.
Updated Manuals: [visa_statistical_reports\quarterly_operating_certificates\VISA_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

CARDS-57645

Added a new parameter P_IF_ACTIVE_STMT (varchar2(1), the default value is "Y") for the "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business" report. The parameter defines how to calculate the "Number of Statements Mailed" value - by valid cards (=Y) or by all account contracts (=N).
Changed the P_REPORT_TYPE parameter processing to support writing SQL statements in it.
Upgrade Note:
Изменена логика работы параметра P_REPORT_TYPE. Например, можно задать значение P_REPORT_TYPE="c.report_type = 'C'" вместо "'C'". 
Параметр можно использовать для  SQL-запроса, который отбирает контракты, по которым были отравлены выписки.

CARDS-56601

Corrected the logic for checking contract groups for a case when an acquiring MEMBER_ID changed during the reporting period. Now transactions are split into two groups by MEMBER_ID. This may downgrade performance of statistics collecting.
Upgrade Note:
Исправлена логика сбора статистики, когда в течение отчетного периода изменился MEMBER_ID эквайрера. Рекомендуется проверить производительность сбора статистики на базе, где объем данных сравним с промышленной.

CARDS-56746

Deleted report form 'Trial Balance.rdf' as obsolete.
Upgrade Note:
Удалена форма отчета "Trial Balance.rdf" как устаревшая. Следует использовать новые версии отчета Trial Balance.

CARDS-57085

Enhanced determination of the IPS Member Identifier (MEMBER_ID stat attribute) for acquiring contracts (statistical contract groups for acquiring contracts): now "Payment Scheme Identification" (OpenWay\Full\Statistics\Dictionaries\Payment Scheme Identification) can be configured to specify the correct MEMBER_ID.
Upgrade Note:
Изменено определение идентификатора участника IPS (атрибут stat MEMBER_ID) при сборе статистики. Старое поведение не поддерживается.
Updated Manuals: [amex_statistical_reports\AMEX_Statistical_Reports.pdf] [mastercard_statistical_reports\quarterly_mastercard_reporting\MC_Statistical_Reports.pdf] [visa_statistical_reports\quarterly_operating_certificates\VISA_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

CARDS-57566

Supported the ability to configure additional groups in the SIC_GROUP table to arrange data groups in the "Billing by Industry for ..." sections.
Upgrade Note:
В отчете XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business для формирования полей Industry split можно использовать новый параметр P_CLASSIFIER_TYPE. В нем указывается классификатор для группы (trans_group.trans_sic -> sic.code -> sic_group_tree -> sic_group.name)

CARDS-57625

Enhanced logic for 'Cards at end of quarter' field in report "XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business" - exclude blocked cards.
Upgrade Note:
Исправлена логика подсчета заблокированных карт для поля "Cards at end of quarter"  в отчете "XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business". Старое поведение не поддерживается.

CARDS-57690

Enhanced contract cache in gathering statistics for performance reasons.
Upgrade Note:
Рекомендуется проверить производительность сбора статистики на базе, где объем данных сравним с промышленной.

CARDS-57970

Added a new parameter P_PAYMENT_SCHEME (varchar2(255), default value is "W") for the "XLS_NSPK_Statistics_Acquiring_Business" and "XLS_NSPK_Statistics_Acquiring_Devices" reports.
The parameter defines payment schemes which should be present in the report.
Upgrade Note:
Изменен выбор MP_PS_MEMBER.PAYMENT_SCHEME, по которым будет сформированы отчеты XLS_NSPK_Statistics_Acquiring_Business, XLS_NSPK_Statistics_Acquiring_Devices.  Для возврата к старому поведению отчетов в параметре P_PAYMENT_SCHEME необходимо задать все MP_PS_MEMBER.PAYMENT_SCHEME, для которых отчет формировался раньше.
Updated Manuals: [mir_statistical_reports\MIR_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

CARDS-58382

Added a new parameter P_ADDRESS_LINE for the "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business" report (varchar2(255), default value is "to_char(c.billing_contract) || ad.address_line_1") for customising calculation of merchant outlets.
Upgrade Note:
Чтобы вернуть старое поведение отчета необходимо параметру P_ADDRESS_LINE выставить значение "ad.address_line_1". В этом случае для двух торговцев, которые имеют одинаковые адреса, количество торговых точек рассчитается как "1".
Updated Manuals: [visa_statistical_reports\quarterly_operating_certificates\VISA_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

CARDS-58383

Changed logic for 'New Cards Obtained During the Quarter' 
 field in 'XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business'
Upgrade Note:
Исправлена логика расчета поля "New Cards Obtained During the Quarter" 
в "XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business" - исключено условие отбора по дате закрытия карты. Старое поведение не поддерживается.

CARDS-58129 / I1805161998

Added a new parameter P_CACHE_MTR (varchar2(1), default value is = "Y") for the "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business.rdf" report. The parameter makes it possible to use temporary tables to cache useful data to improve performance in the "Card Issuance" report section.
Upgrade Note:
Рекомендуется проверить производительность отчета "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business"  на базе данных с объемом данных, сравнимым с промышленной.

CARDS-58079 / I1805163324

Corrected parameter name P_TRN_BALANCE_TRASFER -> P_TRN_BALANCE_TRANSFER in the XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business report.
Defined the default value for parameter P_TRN_BALANCE_TRANSFER = "Balance Transfers".
Changed the default value for parameter P_TRN_PAYMENT from "CH Payment" to "Payments".
Upgrade Note:
В отчете "XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business" скорректирована логика расчета показателей "Balance Transfers" и "Payments". Для возврата старого поведения необходимо: 
- параметру P_TRN_PAYMENT изменить значение на "CH Payment"
- параметру P_TRN_BALANCE_TRANSFER значение заполнить идентично устаревшему P_TRN_BALANCE_TRASFER.
Updated Manuals: [mastercard_statistical_reports\quarterly_mastercard_reporting\MC_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

CARDS-58073 / I1805174949

Changed counting of contracts that are shown in HDR section of the "XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business" report:
-Breakout of EMV-compliant Chip-enabled Cards 
-Of which are MasterCard contactless enabled 
-Total MasterCard contactless Cards issued 
-Total MasterCard contactless enabled Phones issued 
-Total MasterCard contactless enabled alternative form factors.
Now only valid and blocked contracts as of the end of the billing period are counted (previously only valid contracts were counted).
Upgrade Note:
Исправлена логика подсчета карт (учет статуса) в отчете "XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business". Старое поведение не поддерживается.

CARDS-59828 / I1805174949

In the XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business report:
- Deleted metrics for Swipe/Dip and Tap cards and transactions according to changes in "Quarterly MasterCard Reporting of Issuing Transactions and Volume 2017Dec".
- Deleted the parameters P_ATTR_VALUE_SWIP_DIPPED_TRANS, P_ATTR_VALUE_PHONE, and P_ATTR_VALUE_FOB.
Upgrade Note:
Metrics for Swipe/Dip and Tap cards and transactions have been deleted in the XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business report according to changes in "Quarterly MasterCard Reporting of Issuing Transactions and Volume 2017Dec".

Transaction management

CARDS-52529

Enhanced inheritance of document tags, transaction conditions and attributes to a financial presentment from an authorization document. In addition to inheritance for documents from our devices, attributes are inherited for our issuing documents and sponsor for acquirer documents. Sponsor document inheritance can be turned off by using the COND_INH_FOR_AFF global parameter where "Y" allows attribute inheritance and "N" disables it. The document tag with same values can also be used.
Upgrade Note:
In addition to inheritance for documents from our devices, "Transaction Condition", "Transaction Condition Attributes"  and "Additional Information tags" are inherited for our issuing documents and sponsor for acquirer documents. If sponsor documents should not inherit these attributes, the COND_INH_FOR_AFF global parameter should be set to "N" (do not inherit). The parameter's default value is "Y" (inherit attributes). The document tag COND_INH_FOR_AFF with the same values can also be used.
It is recommended to verify financial document processing results for the following cases:
1. Issuer:
- single/multiple financial document matched with authorizations for transactions with own cards card on own devices.
- single/multiple financial document matched with authorizations for transactions with own cards on foreign devices.
- single/multiple financial document matched with authorizations for transactions with own cards on affiliated host devices.
2. Acquirer:
- financial document linked to pre-authorization (by the PREAUTH_ID tag in the doc.add_info field) performed with foreign card on own device. 
- financial document linked to pre-authorization (by the PREAUTH_ID tag in the doc.add_info field) performed with affiliated card on own device. 
3. Sponsor for acquirer:
- financial document matched with the transit authorization performed with foreign card on affiliated host devices. 
- financial document matched with the transit authorization performed with affiliated card on affiliated host devices. 
4. Sponsor for issuer:
- financial document matched with the transit authorization performed with affiliated card on foreign host devices. 
- financial document matched with the transit authorization performed with affiliated card on affiliated host devices.
Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [tags description] [transaction_management\Documents.pdf]

CARDS-47239

Moved the CUST_MARK_ON_US custom procedure call from the standard CUST_ACCEPT_DOC_AFTER procedure to the standard accept procedure.
Upgrade Note:
The CUST_MARK_ON_US call should be removed from CUST_ACCEPT_DOC_AFTER procedure custom versions.

CARDS-56031

Optimized BIN table record search. If a BIN record is found, no further search of BIN records with a wider sub bin is performed. This behaviour can be disabled by setting the global parameter SKIP_WIDER_BIN_SEARCH=N (the default value is "Y"). A Check action has been added to the form for BIN table records with "Own" data source.
Upgrade Note:
Необходимо проверить конфигурацию таблицы BIN на наличие записей с источником данных "Own", используя сценарий предварительной проверки. Запуск сценария и корректировка данных должны быть проведены перед обновлением до новой версии Cards. Результаты сценария будут записаны в Process Log в рамках процесса "Validate own BIN records".
Если записи BIN с более широким диапазоном (меньшим количеством цифр) Sub BIN имеют более высокий уровень или приоритет группы BIN, чем записи BIN с более узким диапазоном (большим количеством цифр) Sub BIN, такие записи не будут найдены в таблице BIN, если установлен глобальный параметр SKIP_WIDER_BIN_SEARCH=Y (значение по умолчанию). В данном случае необходима повторная настройка записи BIN с тем же количеством цифр в диапазоне Sub BIN, что и у других записей, или большим (максимальная длина для диапазона Sub BIN составляет 6 цифр).
Check Scripts:
CARDS-55773_own_bins.sql

CARDS-54913 / I1704043479

Added inheritance of transaction condition and attributes into secondary financial documents. Inheritance is made for our acquiring and our issuing documents.
Upgrade Note:
Custom interfaces which export  trans_condition, trans_cond_attr, sec_trans_cond_att secondary document fields data might be impacted. The following changes should be applied to the interfaces to keep old behaviour: 
- initial trans_condition should be taken from "SEC_TRANS_CONDITION" tag value in doc.add_info field
- initial trans_cond_attr should be taken from sec_trans_cond_att field

CARDS-55318 / I1710032010

Changed the default value of the BLOCK_DISTRIBUTED_LIMIT global parameter to "N".
Upgrade Note:
По умолчанию обработка документа по установке кредитного лимита не будет влиять на состояние банковского контракта -- источника транзакции. Данное изменение внесено для исключения возникновения взаимных блокировок на банковском контракте при массовой обработке документов по установке кредитного лимита. Для возвращения предыдущего поведения системы следует установить глобальному параметру BLOCK_DISTRIBUTED_LIMIT значение "Y".
Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]

CARDS-53548

Card Expire information will not be inherited from an authorization if it is already filled in the financial document.
Upgrade Note:
Card Expire information will not be inherited from an authorization/pre-authorization/transit authorization document if it is already filled in a financial document. This behaviour is required, for example, for tokenization transaction processing. Interfaces using expire date information from a financial document may be impacted. An interface should be changed to get the card expire date from authorization/pre-authorization/transit authorization document to support previous system behaviour.

CARDS-58520

Eliminated attempts to fill BIN record reference on document accept and other card related checks for non-card contracts. The target contract's contract category is now checked instead of the transaction type's contract category.
Upgrade Note:
AUTH_TYPE and PAN document tags are no longer filled for mVisa payments. If the AUTH_TYPE tag was used to identify mVisa payments in product settings (e.g. services or usages), other distinguishing characteristic should be chosen (e.g. the BAI tag) and corresponding settings should be changed.

CARDS-54159 / I1610077363,I1702062338

Enhanced the "Lost Authorizations" form to show authorizations with the "Inactive" posting status that remain active due to partial financial clearing. The currently blocked amount is now shown as a separate column.
Upgrade Note:
Изменен источник данных для формы "Lost Authorizations" - теперь используется представление ACTIVE_AUTH_DOC. При наличии индивидуальных настроек в указанной форме рекомендуется провести замену источника данных, что позволит просматривать активные авторизации в статусе, отличном от "Posted".
Updated Manuals: [core\Special_Contract_Utilities.pdf]

CARDS-54454

Upgrade Note:
Для поддержки требований платежных систем по VISA Fast Funds, MasterCard MoneySend, осуществлению выплат государственных учреждений РФ на карты платежной системы «Мир» существует возможность настроить систему WAY4 для быстрого зачисления средств. Определить использование этих настроек можно по наличию глобальных параметров VISA_FAST_FUNDS, MC_FAST_FUNDS, MIR_FAST_FUNDS со значением "Y" в форме OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Additional Global Parameters.
Механизм обработки быстрых зачислений был изменен. 
Теперь при загрузке из клирингового файла платежной системы документ в системе WAY4, как и раньше, формируется с типом транзакции Notif Prs Credit Item. Далее если при обработке клирингового документа процессом Document Processing оригинальный финансовый документ, сформированный в онлайн-режиме из авторизационного, будет найден, то клиринговый документ Notif Prs Credit Item успешно обработается с кодом ответа "Successfully completed". 
Если же при обработке клирингового документа оригинальный финансовый не будет найден, обработка Notif Prs Credit Item прервется. При этом будет сформировано предупреждающее сообщение "Presentment not found for fast funds notification, converting to presentment", тип транзакции клирингового документа будет изменен на CH Payment. При следующем запуске обработка клирингового документа процессом Document Processing произойдет уже с учетом обновленных параметров.
Банкам-эмитентам, предоставляющим своим держателям карт такой сервис, настоятельно рекомендуется провести онлайновое и клиринговое тестирование указанной функциональности.
Дополнительно, необходимо выполнить следующие проверки:
1. Выполнить приведенный ниже запрос и обратиться в службу поддержки поставщика системы WAY4, если запрос вернет непустой результат: 
select * from trans_type where amnd_state = 'A' and chain_type = 'X' and prev_trans_type is not null;
2. Проверить настройки Пакетов Сервисов карт Our EuroCard/MasterCard и Our Cirrus/Maestro на предмет наличия в Сервисе операций CH Payment условия срабатывания "DOC_TAG=PTID;DOC_TAG_VALUE=C07,C52,C53,C54,C55,C56,C57,C67;", однозначно идентифицирующего транзакции экспресс-зачисления.
3. Проверить настройки пунктов меню загрузки клиринговой информации VISA, MasterCard на предмет наличия параметра USE_PAYMENT_TRANSACTION = N. Использование параметра USE_PAYMENT_TRANSACTION = N не совместимо работой технологии VISA Fast Funds, MasterCard MoneySend, осуществление выплат государственных учреждений РФ на карты платежной системы «Мир».
В случае использования параметра USE_PAYMENT_TRANSACTION = N необходимо обратиться в службу поддержки поставщика системы WAY4.

CARDS-55740

Increased the length of the fields DOC.REASON_CODE, DSP_REASON.CODE, REASON_CODE.CODE, REASON_ACTION.TGT_REASON_CODE, DISPUTE_TYPE.INW_REASON_CODE, DISPUTE_TYPE.REASON_CODE, DISPUTE_ITEM.INW_REASON_CODE, DISPUTE_ITEM.REASON_CODE, CM_CASE_DOC.REASON_CODE from 4 to 32 symbols.
Upgrade Note:
Данное изменение внесено для поддержки требований VISA Claim Resolution. Длинные значения для настраиваемых оснований формирования транзакций (Reason Codes) могут использоваться только для целей VISA Claim Resolution. Все пользовательские интерфейсы, которые могут выгружать/загружать претензионные документы VISA, должны поддерживать длинные значения оснований формирования транзакций.
Соответствующие изменения влияют также на пользовательские представления, и их следует синхронизировать.

UnionPay interface

CARDS-54554

UnionPay Outward: Replaced "CUP Outward Processing.dll" with a new java pipe, "com.openwaygroup.pipe.cup.outward_processing.jar". Pipe parameters CHANNEL, CHANGE_CURR_OUT, EXT_CURR_EXP are eliminated.
Upgrade Note:
The client must check the menu item that is used to run Union Pay Outward Processing and change it according to the new corresponding standard menu item (OpenWay\UPI\UPI. Daily Procedures\UPI. Outward Processing\UPI Outward Processing). If the menu item used parameters CHANGE_CURR_OUT and/or EXT_CURR_EXP, currency/currency exponent overrides must be configured in the database according to the WAY4 manual "Currency Conversion" chapter "Redefining Currency for clearing documents".

CARDS-53777

UnionPay Interface: Added the OUT_ST=Y; tag to the "CH Payment" and "CH Payment Rev" message types.
Upgrade Note:
Manually add the "OUT_ST=Y;" tag in the "Msg Details" field of the "Message Types - All" form (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Transaction Types\Message Types - All).

CARDS-54735

Replaced "CUP Inward Processing.dll" with a new java pipe, "com.openwaygroup.pipe.cup.inward_processing.jar". Removed the pipe parameters CHANNEL, CHANGE_CURR_IN, and EXT_CURR_EXP. Supported loading of Intra-currency Settlement Block File.
Upgrade Note:
For WAY4Cards version from 03.46.20:
The client must check the menu item that is used to run Union Pay Outward Processing and change it according to the new corresponding standard menu item (OpenWay\UPI\UPI. Daily Procedures\UPI. Inward Processing\UPI Inward Processing). If the menu item used the parameters CHANGE_CURR_IN and/or EXT_CURR_EXP, currency/currency exponent overrides must be configured in the database according to the WAY4 "Currency Conversion" document, section "Redefining Currency for clearing documents".
For WAY4Cards version from 03.44.30:
Loading of Intra-currency Settlement Files has been supported. Contact Customer Support for the installation manual.

CARDS-58416

Added message codes for "CH Debit".
Upgrade Note:
Клиентам, которые используют интерфейс к UPI, необходимо добавить следующие типы сообщений (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Transaction Types\Message Types - All) для канала UPI: 
1. Name "CH Debit" 
Code "DpP--1X-"
Category "Advice" 
Trans Type "CH Debit" 
Msg Details "OUT_ST=Y;"
2. Name "CH Debit Rev" 
Code "DpR--1X-" 
Category "Reversal" 
Trans Type "CH Debit" 
Msg Details "OUT_ST=Y;"
Updated Manuals: [ips_releases\unionpay\20XX_XX_UPI_Requirements.pdf]

CARDS-58608

Added a message type to receive UPI online Account Funding Transactions introduced in the October 2018 release requirement "2.5 A new financial transaction type: Account Funding Transaction". Configuration should be corrected manually. See Upgrade Notes for details.
Upgrade Note:
To receive UPI online Account Funding Transactions (AFT), the following message types (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Transaction Types\Message Types - All) should be added: 
Name "CH Debit Fin Request"
Code "02000F"
Category "Request"
Trans Type "CH Debit"
Msg Details "DOC_MODE=SMS;"
Updated Manuals: [ips_releases\unionpay\20XX_XX_UPI_Requirements.pdf]

CARDS-58657

Добавлены суб-типы транзакций для карт UPI для транзакции типа "CH Debit" в целях поддержки требования релиза UPI "2.5 A new financial transaction type: Account Funding Transaction" (октябрь 2018 г.).
Upgrade Note:
Клиентам, которые используют интерфейс к UPI, необходимо добавить следующие суб-типы транзакций (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Transaction Types\Transactions - All -->SubTypes):

1. Для "CH Debit"
Source Cat "Device"
Target Cat "Card"
Source Type "Our POS"
Target Type "UPI Cards"
Source Acc Type "Merchant Receivable"
Target Acc Type "Outg Suspense"
Fee Algorithm Options "SIC=6012;ACQ_ONLINE=Y;"

2. Для "CH Debit"
Source Cat "Device"
Target Cat "Card"
Source Type "Our ATM"
Target Type "UPI Cards"
Source Acc Type "Merchant Receivable"
Target Acc Type "Outg Suspense"
Fee Algorithm Options "SIC=6012;ACQ_ONLINE=Y;"

Необходимо также добавить "Fee Algorithm Options" с "SIC=6012;ACQ_ONLINE=Y;" для следующих суб-типов:
1. Source Cat "Device"
Target Cat "Card"
Source Type "Our POS"
Target Type "Our UPI Cards"
Name "CH Payment" 

2. Source Cat "Device"
Target Cat "Card"
Source Type "Our POS"
Target Type "UPI Cards"
Name "CH Payment" 

3. Source Cat "Device"
Target Cat "Card"
Source Type "Our ATM"
Target Type "Our UPI Cards"
Name "CH Payment" 

4. Source Cat "Device"
Target Cat "Card"
Source Type "Our ATM"
Target Type "UPI Cards"
Name "CH Payment" 

5. Source Cat "Device"
Target Cat "Card"
Source Type "Our ATM"
Target Type "Our UPI Cards"
Name "CH Debit" 

6. Source Cat "Device"
Target Cat "Card"
Source Type "Our POS"
Target Type "Our UPI Cards"
Name "CH Debit"
Updated Manuals: [ips_releases\unionpay\20XX_XX_UPI_Requirements.pdf]

CARDS-59698

Added MCC 6535 and 7322 to SIC Codes dictionary.
Upgrade Note:
Clients who use the UnionPay Interface should add MCC "6535 Value Purchase - Member Financial Institution" and "7322 Debt Collection Agency" with Group Code "U" and Direction Group "Unique" (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\SIC Codes).

VISA interface

CARDS-54827

Enhanced determination of the IPS Member Identifier (Member_ID) for account contracts (statistical contract groups for account contracts). Now Member_ID is calculated as Member_ID of the card contracts subordinate to the account contract while before Member_ID was calculated based on the interchange routing settings.
Supported an optional IPS Member Identifier set up for reporting purposes:
- The ability to define Acquiring/Issuing Member ID by IPS.
- The ability to aggregate reporting data that belong to different financial institutions under the same Member ID.
- The ability to report financial institution data with the different Member IDs by Issuing BINs.
Added the new menu item OpenWay\Full\Statistics\Dictionaries\Payment Scheme Identification.
For more details, please refer to the OW_HOME\manuals\language\MasterCard_statistical_reports\Quarterly_MasterCard_Reporting\MC_Statistical_Reports.pdf,
 OW_HOME\manuals\language\VISA_statistical_reports\Quarterly_Operating_Certificates\VISA_Statistical_Reports.pdf,
 OW_HOME\manuals\language\AMEX_statistical_reports\AMEX_statistical_reports.pdf.
Upgrade Note:
Исправлено определение идентификатора участника МПС (Member_ID) для счетовых контрактов (статистические контрактные группы для счетовых контрактов), чтобы избежать несоответствий в данных. Теперь Member_ID вычисляется как Member_ID карточных контрактов, подчиненных счетовому контракту. Ранее значение Member_ID рассчитывалось на основе настроек маршрутизации.
Предыдущее поведение системы больше не поддерживается. Для получения дополнительной информации см. следующую документацию: OW_HOME\manuals\language\MasterCard_statistical_reports\Quarterly_MasterCard_Reporting\MC_Statistical_Reports.pdf, 
 OW_HOME\manuals\language\VISA_statistical_reports\Quarterly_Operating_Certificates\VISA_Statistical_Reports.pdf, 
 OW_HOME\manuals\language\AMEX_statistical_reports\AMEX_statistical_reports.pdf.
Updated Manuals: [amex_statistical_reports\AMEX_Statistical_Reports.pdf] [mastercard_statistical_reports\quarterly_mastercard_reporting\MC_Statistical_Reports.pdf] [mir_statistical_reports\MIR_Statistical_Reports.pdf] [visa_statistical_reports\quarterly_operating_certificates\VISA_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

CARDS-54884

VISA: Added "VISA: MoneySend Domestic Jurisdiction" area with the code MSDOM as a sub-area to "VISA: European Economic Area Sub-region".
Upgrade Note:
New area "VISA: MoneySend Domestic Jurisdiction" with the code MSDOM must be created manually or loaded from Copy Configuration file. For this area, set the "VISA" Classifier Type, and and the parent area "VISA: European Economic Area Sub-region". Countries must be added according to table 9.5.4.D from "October 2017 and January 2018 VisaNet Business Enhancements Global Technical Letter and Implementation Guide Effective: 14 September 2017" document.

CARDS-52928 / I1612082576

VISA BASEII Outward Processing (pipe): changed the logic for filling the "Reimbursement Attribute" field (TCx5 TCR 0 pos 168). Now the default value of the REIMB_ATTR_FROM_SERVICE parameter is "Y" instead of "N". If the REIMB_ATTR_FROM_SERVICE parameter is set to "Y", the "Reimbursement Attribute" field (TCx5 TCR 0 pos 168) will be filled with doc.TARGET_FEE_CODE field, if doc.TARGET_FEE_CODE is null, this field will be filled automatically by the pipe itself. Please review VISA services settings or if Fee Prediction is used, set up WAY4 according to the "VISA_RA_Configuration" manual. If the REIMB_ATTR_FROM_SERVICE parameter is set to "N", the "Reimbursement Attribute" field (TCx5 TCR 0 pos 168) is always calculated by the pipe itself. If the latter behaviour is needed, the parameter REIMB_ATTR_FROM_SERVICE = "N" should be set in the pipe.
Upgrade Note:
VISA BASEII Outward Processing (pipe): changed the logic for filling the "Reimbursement Attribute" field (TCx5 TCR 0 pos 168). Now the default value of the REIMB_ATTR_FROM_SERVICE parameter is "Y" instead of "N". If the REIMB_ATTR_FROM_SERVICE parameter is set to "Y", the "Reimbursement Attribute" field (TCx5 TCR 0 pos 168) will be filled with doc.TARGET_FEE_CODE field, if doc.TARGET_FEE_CODE is null, this field will be filled automatically by the pipe itself. Please review VISA services settings or if Fee Prediction is used, set up WAY4 according to the "VISA_RA_Configuration" manual. If the REIMB_ATTR_FROM_SERVICE parameter is set to "N", the "Reimbursement Attribute" field (TCx5 TCR 0 pos 168) is always calculated by the pipe itself. If the latter behaviour is needed, the parameter REIMB_ATTR_FROM_SERVICE = "N" should be set in the pipe.
Updated Manuals: [visa_interface\VISA_Interface.pdf]

CARDS-55114

Modified the XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business.rdf report. Now "Number of Statements Mailed" and "Number of Statements Mailed with Finance Charges" are gathered only for card categories with the parent value of card programme = "CREDIT" (DWD_CARD_CATEGORY classifier values with the "Parent value"="CREDIT") and multiplied on billing cycles number.

Added new parameters:
- P_FILTER_11
- P_FILTER_12
Upgrade Note:
Старая логика расчета полей "Number of Statements Mailed" and "Number of Statements Mailed with Finance Charges" в отчете "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business" не поддерживается.
Updated Manuals: [visa_statistical_reports\quarterly_operating_certificates\VISA_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

CARDS-55831

Synchronized the name "WSP_REQ_ID" of the document tag representing the "Token Requestor ID" field supported in "TCR4 - Supplemental Financial Data" in BASE II Draft Data Transactions with the name of the same tag stored as the document tag representing the token "Requestor ID" parameter. Renamed the "WSP_TKNREQID" tag to "WSP_REQ_ID".
Upgrade Note:
Исправлено ошибочное написание тега "Token Requestor ID" в онлайн-документах.
Тег "WSP_REQ_ID" заполняется согласно полю "TCR4 - Supplemental Financial Data" in BASE II Draft Data"
для загруженных документов, 
для онлайн-документов значение поля "Token Requestor ID" сохранялось в теге "WSP_TKNREQID".
Имена синхронизированы, имя тега для онлайн-документов исправлено с "WSP_TKNREQID" на "WSP_REQ_ID". 
Необходимо проверить используется ли данный онлайн-тег какими-либо приложениями. 
Если используется, то следует откорректировать обращение к данному тегу из этих приложений, используя имя "WSP_REQ_ID" вместо "WSP_TKNREQID".

CARDS-57350

Fixed processing VCR Dispute response financial reversal in "VISA SMS Inward Processing pipe."
Upgrade Note:
To process a VCR Dispute response financial reversal by the VISA SMS Inward Processing pipe, new message_codes must be set up in the "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Transaction Types\Message Types - All" menu item, common settings: "Channel" - "VISA SMS", Category - "Reversal", Is Authorization - "FIN"
1) Name = "ATM 2Prs Rev", Code = "0220_5_SMSR", Trans Type = "ATM 2Prs"
2) Name = "Retail SMS 2Prs Rev", Code = "0220_5_SMS05R", Trans Type = "Retail 2Prs"
3) Name = "CH Payment 2Prs Rev", Code = "0220_5_SMS062R", Trans Type = "CH Payment 2Prs"
4) Name = "CH Debit 2Prs Rev", Code = "0220_5_SMS051R", Trans Type = "CH Debit 2Prs"

CARDS-57860

Fixed EN_CREDIT_ADJUSTMNT tag setting for VISA SMS Adjustment codes.
Upgrade Note:
Clients who use the VISA SMS Interface must change the tag setting "EN_CREDIT_ADJUSTMNT=Y;" to "EN_CREDIT_ADJUSTMNT;" for Adjustment message codes like "0220_2_SMS..." in the "Msg Details" field of the "Message Types - All" form (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Transaction Types\Message Types - All).

CARDS-56487 / I1710090102

Added using data prepared before running the report in 'XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business report' for performance reasons.
Upgrade Note:
Рекомендуется проверить производительность отчета "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business" на базе, где объем данных сравним с промышленной.

CARDS-55432 / I1710136911

Fixed temporary behaviour of the VISA SMS Outward pipe, when DE65 (SRN) was inherited for 2Prs from 1Prs (this could be necessary for initial NSPK connection). Now DE65 (SRN) for 2Prs is inherited from Chbk by default. For legacy behaviour, the new SRN_FROM_PRS = Y pipe parameter must be set.
Upgrade Note:
Temporary behaviour of the VISA SMS Outward pipe, when DE65 (SRN) was inherited for 2Prs from 1Prs, has been fixed (this could be necessary for initial NSPK connection). Now DE65 (SRN) is inherited for 2Prs from Chbk by default. For legacy behaviour, the new SRN_FROM_PRS = Y pipe parameter must be set.

Code "2522J"

CARDS-57280

Implemented new faster VISA OnUs Outward process - new pipe "VISA BASEII ONUS Marked Outward Processing". The "VISA BASEII ONUS Prepared Outward Processing" and "VISA BASEII ONUS Prepared FR Outward Processing" pipes are no longer supported. See Upgrade Notes for details. Pipes affected: 
VISA BASEII ONUS Outward Processing.dll 
VISA BASEII ONUS Prepared Outward Processing.dll 
VISA BASEII ONUS Marked Outward Processing.dll
Upgrade Note:
Изменена технология выгрузки файлов VISA Collection Only: 
1. Добавлен новый пайп VISA BASEII ONUS Marked Outward Processing, ускоряющий выгрузку On-Us-документов. 
2. Пайпы "VISA BASEII ONUS Prepared Outward Processing" и "VISA BASEII ONUS Prepared FR Outward Processing" больше не поддерживаются. Необходимо использовать новый пайп "VISA BASEII ONUS Marked Outward Processing" взамен. 
3. Поддержано новое значение Outward Status "On Us Outward", которое используется совместно с пайпом VISA BASEII ONUS Marked Outward Processing. Новый статус проставляется в случае включения глобального параметра MARK_ONUS и обработки документов индивидуально настраиваемой процедурой CUST_MARK_ONUS. 
4. Industry Specific Addendum не выгружаются в режиме On-Us, только чиповые аддендумы могут быть выгружены. 
5. Пайп VISA BASEII ONUS Marked Outward Processing может быть сконфигурирован для параллельной выгрузки. 
6. Номера файлов и батчей, выгружаемые пайпом VISA BASEII ONUS Marked Outward Processing берутся из последовательностей. Последовательности цикличные для каждого processing BIN внутри банковского дня. 
Параметры пайпа VISA BASEII ONUS Marked Outward Processing: 
START_BATCH_SEQ - начальный номер батча (по умолчанию - "5000") 
END_BATCH_SEQ - конечный номер батча (по умолчанию - "9999") 
SEQ_CACHE_LENGTH - размер кэша (по умолчанию - "1") 
Стартовый номер файла берется из существующего параметра START_FILE_SEQ (по умолчанию - "0"). 
OUTW_STS_LIST - список статусов выгружаемых документов, разделенных запятой. Значение по умолчанию - 'О'. Допустимые значения: 'O','Y','N'. Значения 'Y','N' используются только для выгрузки транзитных документов аффилиатов. Формат параметра: буквы в одиночных кавычках, разделенные запятыми. Пример: 'Y','N','O'. 
DEST_CHANNEL_LIST - список кодов каналов получателей. Формат параметра: буквы в одиночных кавычках, разделенные запятыми. Пример, 'v','f','K'.

CARDS-54107

VISA Fee Collection/Funds Transfer Reason Codes. Changed description for reason code 0150 to "Recovered card handling fees or rewards and ATM BI acquiring direct fee returns". Also revised all Fee Collection/Funds Transfer Reason Codes.
Upgrade Note:
Changed name for VISA reason code V150 to "Recovered card handling fees or rewards and ATM BI acquiring direct fee returns" (menu item OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Transaction Types\Interbank Reason Codes). Contact Customer Support for the Copy Configuration file with the full list of revised VISA Fee Collection/Funds Transfer Reason Codes.
Updated Manuals: [ips_releases\visa\20XX_XX_VISA_Requirements.pdf]

CARDS-55951

Added the ability to process (import and export) VCR status advices via the UFX H2H interface.
Upgrade Note:
Added the ability to export and to import advices for "outgoing" transactions (for example VISA VCR advices for originator of transaction) via the UFX H2H Interface ("IC Documents Import" and "IC Documents Export" pipes with MODE=H2H pipe parameter set).

To avoid duplicates, exported records are marked with the "H2H_SENT=Y;" document tag. The recommended additional condition for the FILTER pipe parameter to export such transactions is "doc.source_channel = <Aff channel> and doc.target_channel = 'V' and doc.outward_status = 'C' and doc.fx_settl_date beetwen (<date1>,<date2>)". For correct export of advices for "outgoing" transactions, additional settings of the current menu items used for H2H document export (IC Documents Export pipe) are required:

If a menu item has FILE_SENDER and FILE_RECEIVER pipe parameters explicitly set as a constant value (not as an sql expression) then the FILTER pipe parameter of the existing menu item should be modified as specified above.

If FILE_SENDER and FILE_RECEIVER parameters are not set (the default values are DOC.SEND_MEMBER_ID and DOC.TARGET_MEMBER_ID respectively) or they are set as another sql expression it is recommended to create a separate menu item with FILE_SENDER=DOC.REC_MEMBER_ID and FILE_RECEIVER=DOC.SOURCE_MEMBER_ID parameters. The FILTER pipe parameter described above should be also added to the pipe in the new menu item.

Note that the proposed settings are recommended and are subject to testing on a particular WAY4 system configuration. Contact Customer Support if any obstacles are encountered during the testing.

No additional settings are needed for the "IC Documents Import" pipe to import advices for "outgoing" transactions.
Updated Manuals: [UFX_H2H_Interchange.pdf (NDA Specification for vendors)]

CARDS-56111

Added a new currency with Full Name "DOBRA", Name "STN", Code "930" and Exponent "2". The old currency DOBRA has been renamed to "DOBRA (old)". Changed currency codes for the country "Sao Tome And Principe".
Upgrade Note:
Clients should manually change Full Name of currency with Full Name "DOBRA", Name "STD", Code "678" to "DOBRA (old)" (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Currency Table).
Clients should manually add a new currency with Full Name "DOBRA", Name "STN", Code "930" and Exponent "2" (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Currency Table).
Clients should manually change "Curr Code", "N Curr Code" for the country "Sao Tome And Principe" to "STN", "930" on the date of VISA April 2018 Release implementation (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Country Table).
Updated Manuals: [ips_releases\visa\20XX_XX_VISA_Requirements.pdf]

CARDS-56126

Added new SICs 3834, 3835, 3836 according to VISA Release Apr18-783 Global Mandatory Changes to Merchant Category Codes.
Upgrade Note:
Clients should manually add the following SICs (MCCs):
1. "3834 Baymont Inn & Suites" with Code 3834 and Group Code "H"
2. "3835 Dolce" with Code 3835 and Group Code "H"
3. "3836 Hawthorne Suites by Wyndham" with Code 3836 and Group Code "H"
To do so, use the menu item "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\SIC Codes".
Also, these SICs must be added to Direct Group "Hotel/Motel (Lodging)".
To do so, use the [Direct Groups] button in the "SIC Codes" form (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\SIC Codes).
After adding, click on the [Normalize] button in the form for each of these SICs.

CARDS-58689

Removed the SEND_REFUNDS_AS_CREDIT pipe parameter from VISA and Affiliated BASE II outward pipes. Pipes affected:
Affiliated BASEII Outward Processing.dll, Affiliated BASEII Prepared Outward Processing.dll, Visa Base II Outward Processing.dll, VISA BASEII ONUS Marked Outward Processing.dll, VISA BASEII ONUS Outward Processing.dll, VISA BASEII Prepared Outward Processing.dll.

Удален параметр "SEND_REFUNDS_AS_CREDIT" в 
пайпах VISA и Affiliated BASE II Outward.
Если параметр использовался, клиенту следует обратиться в Службу поддержки
Updated Manuals: [ips_releases\visa\20XX_XX_VISA_Requirements.pdf] VISA Interface | VISA VCF

CARDS-56502 / I1710317086

Changed the VISA_FAST_FUNDS additional global parameter default value from the existing value "Y" to a new value "A". If VISA_FAST_FUNDS is set to "A", all original credit transactions will be converted into notifications regardless of the Fast Funds Indicator value. For all other transactions, the processing logic remains unchanged. The changes affect the VISA Base II Inward Processing and Affiliated Base II Inward Processing pipes. Please see CUN for required additional actions.
Upgrade Note:
Добавлено новое значение по умолчанию ( "A" ) для существующего глобального параметра  VISA_FAST_FUNDS. Если VISA_FAST_FUNDS="А" , то независимо от значения Fast Funds Indicator все загружаемые  Original Credit Transaction  будут  преобразованы в NotifItem. Для остальных документов  логика обработки остается аналогичной VISA_FAST_FUNDS="Y". Для возврата предыдущего поведения пайпа параметру VISA_FAST_FUNDS должно быть установлено значение "Y". В случае обработки авторизационных Fast Funds запросов, как финансовых зачислений, рекомендовано использовать значение параметра VISA_FAST_FUNDS в значении "A".

WAY4 manager

WM-3067

New option SHOW_ERROR_STACK_TRACE has been supported in OW_WORK\DB.ini. It allows error stack traces to be shown/hidden from Clerk users.
Upgrade Note:
SHOW_ERROR_STACK_TRACE can have the 'yes' or 'no' value. The default value is 'no'. The option disables error stack trace visibility for Clerks: 
- error traces will be visible to Clerks only if the option is precisely set to 'yes' 
- traces are available to Admin roles regardless of the key. 
Setting SHOW_ERROR_STACK_TRACE to 'yes' means switching to the old system behaviour: traces are available for a user of any role.
Updated Manuals: [way4_manager\WAY4_Manager_Manual.pdf]

e-Commerce acquiring

CARDS-54171

Implemented the license for AFT transactions with single debit document and C07,C52,AA, and PP transaction application codes.
Upgrade Note:
Для корректной работы системы при переводе денежных средств в рамках AFT-транзакций (при списании средств с карты, используя транзакционные коды C07, C52, PP, AA) требуется настройка лицензионных опций. За дополнительной информацией следует обратиться в службу поддержки поставщика системы WAY4.

Upgrade Notes ( )

Change types:

  • Added New Feature
  • Changed Feature
  • Fixed Bug
  • New Task
  • Sub-task
  • Support of Payment System Release Requirements
  • Standard Configuration Update
  • Backporting
  • Information Note

Cards

  • 03.46.30.68
    • [CARDS-60163]
      • Fixed message code of special adjustments for original credit transactions. Affected pipe: "com.openwaygroup.pipe.cup.audit_trailer_import.jar".
    • [CARDS-60253]
      • Fixed an issue when a response file does not have a link to the file that is imported by the "IC Documents Import" pipe and rejected during validation.
    • [CARDS-60254]
      • Fixed an issue when import of incorrect response file by the "IC Documents Import" pipe may lead to erroneous numeration and naming of files that are generated by the "IC Documents Export" pipe.
    • [CARDS-60255]
      • Fixed an issue when specific documents can be exported twice by the "IC Documents Export" pipe with the set pipe parameter INCREMENTAL_EXPORT=Y.
    • [I1811120917]/[CARDS-60115]
      • Modified RA criteria for Belgium.
    • [I1811141826]/[CARDS-60113]
      • Modified Fee Prediction tariff for e-commerce transactions in Latvia.
    • [ICFEE-418]/[CARDS-60136]
      • Modified RA Criteria for the Netherlands.
    • [CARDS-52397]
      • Изменен раздел "Срок хранения данных карт (Data Retention)" (добавлено замечание о хранении полей PVV и ENCRYPTED_PIN).
      Updated Manuals: [security_and_key_management\PA-DSS_Implementation_Guide.pdf]
    • [CARDS-60000]
      • The sections "Specifics of Generating Dispute Documents in Visa and Mastercard" and "Specifics of Working with Dispute Documents in Mastercard" are added.
      Updated Manuals: Dispute Assistant | Functional Specification
    • [CARDS-60092]
      • The sections "System Activities Program Codes", "Non-System Activities Program Codes", "Special Activity Parameters for Dispute Cases" were updated. Activities related to MasterCom API online interface for the MCCM server (Mastercard) are added.
      Updated Manuals: [dispute_assistant\Dispute_Assistant_Case_Configuration.pdf]
    • [CARDS-60132]
      • Изменен раздел "Перечень используемого стороннего программного обеспечения, аппаратной архитектуры, используемых системных служб и протоколов" (добавлена информация о своевременности установки Oracle Java Commercial Updates).
      Updated Manuals: [security_and_key_management\PA-DSS_Implementation_Guide.pdf]
    • [CARDS-60278]
      • Изменен раздел "Использование шифрования и защищенных протоколов передачи данных" (добавлена информация о запрете использования SHA1 в конфигурации Authserver).
      Updated Manuals: [security_and_key_management\PA-DSS_Implementation_Guide.pdf]
    • [CARDS-60312]
      • Supported MasterCom API (Mastercard dispute online interface) in the Dispute Assistant R2 module.
    • [CARDS-60347]
      • Upgrade Note:
      При обновлении версии изменяется поле Event Group Code для схем резервирования. Поле содержит значение типа События (Event Type) в поле Event Group Code, которое совпадает со значением в поле Accrual Code схемы резервирования. Такие изменения не затрагивают стандартный процесс резервирования, но могут повлиять на некоторые решения. Необходимо проверить пользовательские пункты меню и процедуры, если они используют поле Event Group Code схем резервирования, и исправить их соответсвующим образом.
Проверочный скрипт CARDS-60244_RES_RISK_SCH_01.sql необходимо запустить, когда дополнительному глобальному параметру MULTIPLE_RESERVE_SCHEME присвоено значение "S" или "L", или до установки соответсвующего значения. Оставшиеся значения используются для MOVE_RESERVE.

    • [RPC0-46]/[CARDS-59848]
      • Added new parameters in report XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business:
- P_HINT_ACT, varchar2(255), default value is null. Parameter allow to define HINT for select, which read stat_contract_act table.
- P_HINT_ACC_BAL, varchar2(255), default value is null. Parameter allow to define HINT for select, which read account table.
- P_HINT_TRN, varchar2(255), default value is null. Parameter allow to define HINT for select, which read doc_statistics table.
Parameters could be used for HINT, which include execution of the query in several parallels  /*+ PARALLEL(N) */.

    • [CARDS-59521]
      • Supported import of Mastercard "Issuer Account Change Confirmation" files with information for several ICAs by the "MABU Issuer Response Import" pipe.
      Upgrade Note:
      If the "Issuer Account Change Confirmation" file contains information not only for "our" ICA, but also for external ICAs (i.e. for affiliates), the new pipe parameter "OUR_ICA_LIST" must be set. The parameter's value must contain "our" ICAs delimited by commas. In this case, infomation for ICAs not listed in the parameter will be exported in a separate file in the directory, defined in the new pipe parameter "OUTPUT_DIRECTORY".

      Upgrade Note:

  • 03.46.30.61
    • [C1809304929]/[CARDS-59476]
      • Preferred codes in MasterCard Standard Service Packs now are filled.
    • [I1807186129]/[CARDS-59585]
      • Corrected calculation of the following report fields in the XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business report for the "Account and Cards" section:

- "Accounts at the beginning of Quarter - Open" - now counts valid account contracts that have at least one valid card contract at the beginning of the reporting period.
- "Accounts at the beginning of Quarter - Blocked" - now counts account contracts that are blocked but have open/blocked cards, or account contracts that are valid but have blocked cards.

- "New accounts obtained during the quarter" - now counts new account contracts that are valid or blocked at the end of reporting period and have open/blocked cards.

- "Accounts at the end of quarter - Open" - now counts valid account contracts that have at least one valid card contract at the end of the reporting period.
- "Accounts at the end of Quarter - Blocked" - now counts account contracts that are blocked but have open/blocked cards, or account contracts that are valid but have blocked cards.

- "New cards obtained during quarter" - now counts new card contracts that were added in the reporting period and are valid or blocked at the end of the quarter.
    • [OWS-2757, I1810165619]/[CARDS-59519]
      • Modified criteria for IRD PV. The card cannot be a contactless card.

    • [I1810154959]/[CARDS-59650]
      • Modified the Fee Prediction tariffs for PayPass transaction for commercial cards in Ireland.
    • [CARDS-59236]
      • Changed the algorithm for calculation of the fee amount for blocking on Issuing authorization. The target fee amount from the authorization document is used now as the fee amount of the main service. If it is absent, it will be recalculated according to the Target Service configuration. Previously, it was always recalculated, even if the document already had Fee Amount information. These changes do not impact standard Issuing Authorization, as it does not have any predefined Fee Amounts, but may affect some specific and custom solutions.
      Upgrade Note:
      Необходимо проверить наличие конфигураций, при которых реальная сумма комиссии, указанная в поле "Target Fee Amount" документа, блокируется для контракта в соответствии со специально настроенной дополнительной комиссией (Custom Fee) под основным Сервисом. При этом дополнительная комиссия имеет значение поля "Fee Percentage" = 100% и теги "<AUTH>" и "TGTFD" в поле "Service Details" дополнительной комиссии. Для того, чтобы проверить наличие проблемной конфигурации следует использовать проверочный скрипт CARDS-59236_DOC_FEE_AMOUNT_01.sql.
При обнаружении проблем необходимо обратиться в службу поддержки OpenWay.
      Check Scripts:
      CARDS-59236_DOC_FEE_AMOUNT_01.sql
    • [CARDS-59489]
      • Corrected fee amount calculation that was using the mtr.CRE_TEST_MTR procedure to work on secondary nodes of a high availability configuration.
      Upgrade Note:
      The procedure mtr.CRE_TEST_MTR will not raise an exception when executed on a secondary node of a high availability configuration. Custom code should be checked so that macrotransactions returned by the CRE_TEST_MTR procedure are not inserted into the database.
    • [CARDS-59385]
      • Added filling "CH_BILL_CURR" BIN table tag when processing BIN tables from Mastercard. This makes it possible to process DCC acquiring transactions more accurately.
      Upgrade Note:
      Clients who use DCC acquiring functionality must run the "OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\Special OpenWay Utilities\Interchange\MC. Load Bin Table and Handbooks\MC MPE Processing for Bin Table" menu item to fill the "CH_BILL_CURR" BIN table tag for existing Mastercard BIN records.
    • [CARDS-59479]
      • Supported IRD NP - Indonesia Intracountry LSI.
      Upgrade Note:
      Clients who use the acquirer Mastercard interface in Indonesia must manually add tag DE33 with the proper value(s) to IRD NP. The tag must be added in the "Special Restrictions" field (OpenWay\MasterCard\MC. IRD Configuration\MC IRD Criteria).
    • [CARDS-59061]
      • Added the ability to change IRD for secondary dispute transactions when exporting to Mastercard with the "IPM Outward Processing" pipe.
      Upgrade Note:
      To override IRD for secondary dispute documents when exporting transactions to Mastercard with the "IPM Outward Processing", the appropriate IRD value must be put in the "doc.target_fee_code" database field. This can be helpful in some emergency cases when the previous incoming transaction from Mastercard has an incorrect IRD.
  • 03.46.30.59
    • [CARDS-59304]

com.openwaygroup.pipe.visa.abc_import.jar.
    • [CARDS-59322]
      • Added the ability in the "MABU Issuer Request Export" pipe to generate the name of an exported file in "Mastercard Global File Transfer System" format .
      Upgrade Note:
      To set the name of a file that is exported by the "MABU Issuer Request Export" pipe according to the "Mastercard Global File Transfer System" naming convention, set the new pipe parameter "FILE_NAME_FMT"="GFT". It is also necessary to set the new pipe parameter "FILE_NAME_PREFIX". The "FILE_NAME_PREFIX" pipe parameter value must contain the part of the  file name before the date time part (for example "MCI.AR.R274.C.E0023456", see Mastercard "File Transfer Manual" manual, chapter "File Naming Convention in the Mastercard Repository" for values).
      Updated Manuals: [abu_issuing\mastercard_automatic_billing_updater\Interacting_with_MABU_Issuing.pdf]
    • [I1805161998]/[CARDS-59306]
      • Improved the performance of the "Card Issuance" section in the XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business report.
    • [CARDS-59279]
      • Modified interchange tariffs for Denmark according to VISA bulletin on 26 July 2018.
    • [I1808153593]/[CARDS-59336]
      • Changed default menu items for importing and exporting transactions to NSPK in Mastercard IPM format according to NSPK operational bulletin #43.2018.
      Upgrade Note:
      Clients in Russia that process Mastercard transactions should review menu items for importing and exporting these transactions to NSPK.

Inward Processing: if the "FILE_FORMAT" pipe parameter in the menu item for importing IPM files is absent or has the value "U1014", additional actions are not required. If "FILE_FORMAT" has the "RDW" value, it should be deleted before the first import of a file in 1014 blocked format.

Outward Processing: if the "FILE_FORMAT" pipe parameter in menu items for exporting IPM files (including Collection only files) is absent or has the value "U1014", additional actions are not required. If "FILE_FORMAT" has the "RDW" value, it should be deleted before the first export of a file in 1014 blocked format. Also if the menu item has a subitem for conversion from RDW to 1014 blocked format, this subitem shoud be deleted and the "IPMMAST__INITIAL_DIR" pipe parameter must be reviewed. It should contain the final (not temporary) directory.

Note that exported files must be sent to Mastercard also (not only to NSPK) according to "Mastercard Bulletin No.4 3 May 2016" as earlier. Since now NSPK and Mastercard formats match each other, there is no need to generate 2 files. A copy of the NSPK file can be sent to Mastercard.
    • [I1808237554 (ICFEE-348)]/[CARDS-59131]
      • Modified interchange tariffs for the UK according to the Mastercard bulletin AN 1980.
  • 03.46.30.57
    • [I1808166199, I1808165902, I1808166394]/[CARDS-59014]
      • Modified the Mastercard interchange tariffs for the Czech Republic.
    • [I1808249941 (ICFEE-350)]/[CARDS-59122]
      • Modified the Mastercard interchange tariffs for Luxembourg according to Mastercard bulletin AN 2015 on 23 August 2018.
    • [CARDS-59084]
      • Added the ability to convert an authorisation to instalment from the "Auth" link in the "Instalment Contract Data" form. An instalment plan status is set according to the INST_APPROVE_PLANS parameter. 
If INST_APPROVE_PLANS=Y, the plan is assigned the "Preview" status. After approval or if INST_APPROVE_PLANS=N the plan status becomes "Inactive" and awaits of financial document posting. After a financial document has been posted, the instalment plan is activated or recalculated according to the INST_FIN_ACTION parameter. New custom function CUST_INSTL_ACTION is called during financial document posting that makes it possible to define what to do with the instalment plan if some attributes of the financial document differ from the authorisation.
      Upgrade Note:
      The behaviour of instalment plan activation in the "Preview" status has been changed during financial document posting. If the parameter INST_APPROVE_PLANS=Y is configured, an instalment plan in the "Preview" status linked to an authorisation document will not be approved. The plan will be just relinked to the financial document and will require manual approval.
      Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

- MC: Canada (A),
- MC: Latin America and Caribbean (B),
- MC: South Asia, Middle East, Africa (E),
- MC: Europe (D).

  • 03.46.30.51
    • [CARDS-58517]
