    • [CARDS-55995]
      • Implemented forms for adding/editing product classifiers with "No" in the "Set to Contract" field; after changes made using the new forms it is not necessary to reapprove the product. Additionally, when approving a product, the value of the "Set to Contract" field value is automatically set with the SET_TO_CONTRACT tag value, if the tag is specified in the "Custom Rules" field of the "Product" -> [Classifiers] form, or with the "Yes" value, if this tag is not present.
      Upgrade Note:
      При утверждении Продукта также реализована проверка на пересечение диапазонов дат для установленных классификаторов. В случае выявления пересечения дат, изменения Продукта не будут утверждены с сообщением об ошибке "Incorrect intersection of activity periods of the classifier".
      Check Scripts:
      Для выявления пересечения дат классификаторов следует воспользоваться проверочным скриптом CHECK_V2_CARDS-55995_product_classifiers.sql, результаты работы которого будут сохранены в журнал выполнения процесса "Checking product options". Для исправления пересекающихся периодов можно использовать стандартную форму OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Products\Product Definition\Products -> [Classifiers].
      Updated Manuals: [core\Contract_and_Client_Classifiers.pdf] [product_management\Products_and_Subtypes.pdf]
    • [CARDS-56277]
      • Enhanced the partial early repayment algorithm for the instalment plans with a flat fee. By default, when a partial early repayment is made in a portion, the principal amount of a loan is repaid first, and then the portion fee is repaid. The "PRIORITY" tag makes it possible to repay the "Flat Fee" fee of the portion before the principal amount.
By default (if the tag is not set), the fee priority is "101", and the principal amount priority is always "100". The lesser value has the higher priority (i.e., by default, the principal amount is repaid first). The principal amount priority must not be changed. To repay the "Flat Fee" fee before the principal amount, the "PRIORITY" tag with the value less than "100" must be specified (for example, PRIORITY=90).
If several "Flat Fee" fees are used, the priority must be specified for each fee.
      Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]
    • [CARDS-56327]
      • Added the possibility to redefine the INST_INTEREST_TO_DUE global parameter for a financial institution. It can also be redefined in an Instalment Scheme as a value of the INT_TO_DUE tag in the "Special Parms" field. If the parameter is defined in an Instalment Scheme, it will be inherited in a plan, and if the "Change Instalment Terms" action applies to a new Instalment Scheme, initial parameter value will be preserved for a secondary plan.
      Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]
    • [CARDS-56406]
      • Supported the new behavior of the "Payment Holidays" action. If the "INST_HOLIDAYS_FOR_OPEN" global parameter is set to "N" (could be redefined on the Financial Institution level), the partially paid and overdue portions of an instalment plan are not shifted to the future periods when the "Payment Holidays" action is performed. If the parameter has the "Y" value (default), then old behavior is used, and the overdue principal amount is recalculated to be paid in the future.
      Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [core\multiple_financial_institutions\Financial_Institutions.pdf] [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf] [tags description]
    • [CARDS-56963]
      • Added a new "Extra Fee from Principal" instalment fee type. A fee amount is subtracted from the principal amount and is included in the first portion of the plan. The fee rate and amount can be specified as the INST_EXTRAF_FRATE and INST_EXTRAF_FTOTAL document tags.
      Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]
    • [CARDS-58648]
      • Added the "FILTER" pipe parameter for the "PIN PVV Offset Export" pipe. This parameter allows exported records to be filtered. The parameter value contains an SQL expression.
    • [CARDS-58755]
      • Modified standard menu item "P2P.Clients" to prevent editing.
    • [CARDS-58757]
      • Fixed "Field 408 (PDS0208 Additional Merchant Data) contains binary ZERO" error when importing an IPM file with the "IPM Inward Processing" pipe.
    • [CARDS-58760]
      • Modified names of standard menu items to prevent editing. The following menu items have been changed: "AM.Authentication for point of sale", "AM.QR Create", "AM.QR Merchant Schemes", "AM.Setup Masterpass PAN Identification type", "AM.Setup mVisa PAN Identification type".
    • [CARDS-58761]
      • Modified standard menu items to prevent editing. Changed menu items: "Acq.Contr Select Liab", "Device Configurator Item Type", "Device Key Type Options".
    • [CARDS-58762]
      • Modified the standard "Goods Import" menu item to prevent editing.
    • [I1805174949]/[CARDS-58381]
      • Fixed calculation of the values "Cards at end of quarter - Open" and "Cards at end of quarter - Blocked" in the "XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business" report. Added a search for the first card when a card is reissued.
    • [I1807283554]/[CARDS-58795]
      • Fixed "NullPointerException" error when the message being imported by the "DCI Clearing Import" pipe does not contain the "CPANSQN" field in Chip Card Additional Detail Record.
    • [CARDS-58598]
      • Разработаны функциональная спецификация "ApplePay Issuing Statistical Report" и руководство пользователя "ApplePay Issuing Statistical Report".
      Updated Manuals: [issuing\tokenization\applepay_statistical_data\ApplePay_Issuing_Statistical_Report.pdf] [issuing\tokenization\applepay_statistical_data\ApplePay_Issuing_Statistical_Report_Functional_Specification.pdf]
    • [CARDS-56031]
      • Optimized BIN table record search. If a BIN record is found, no further search of BIN records with a wider sub bin is performed. This behaviour can be disabled by setting the global parameter SKIP_WIDER_BIN_SEARCH=N (the default value is "Y"). A Check action has been added to the form for BIN table records with "Own" data source.
      Upgrade Note:
      Необходимо проверить конфигурацию таблицы BIN на наличие записей с источником данных "Own", используя сценарий предварительной проверки. Запуск сценария и корректировка данных должны быть проведены перед обновлением до новой версии Cards. Результаты сценария будут записаны в Process Log в рамках процесса "Validate own BIN records".
Если записи BIN с более широким диапазоном (меньшим количеством цифр) Sub BIN имеют более высокий уровень или приоритет группы BIN, чем записи BIN с более узким диапазоном (большим количеством цифр) Sub BIN, такие записи не будут найдены в таблице BIN, если установлен глобальный параметр SKIP_WIDER_BIN_SEARCH=Y (значение по умолчанию). В данном случае необходима повторная настройка записи BIN с тем же количеством цифр в диапазоне Sub BIN, что и у других записей, или большим (максимальная длина для диапазона Sub BIN составляет 6 цифр).
      Check Scripts:
      CARDS-55773_own_bins.sql
    • [CARDS-56382]
      • Changed processing of the "INST_IRATE" instalment tag. Now, it is taken from the "E2.CA" bertlv tag rather than from the "E2.E1" bertlv tag.
      Upgrade Note:
      Эквайерам, поддерживающим на собственных или h2h-устройствах функциональность выдачи ссуды в рассрочку для своих карт и возможность ввода на устройстве процентной ставки по ссуде, следует обратить внимание на изменение тега для передачи процентной ставки в режиме онлайн. Теперь процент по ссуде передается в bertlv теге E2.CA вместо тега E2.E1. Данные изменения внесены из-за невозможности поддержки старым тегом требований к формату поля. Рекомендуется адаптировать работу POS-интерфейса и пользовательскую процедуру cust_auth_parse к данным изменениям.
    • [I1611016818]/[CARDS-56436]
      • Fixed CAB condition processing for IRD calculation. Previously CABs were loaded by the MPE Import pipe in SIC Groups with classifier code MC_CAB. Now the MPE Import pipe doesn't load/update SIC Groups with classifier code MC_CAB and the IRD Calculation process gets CAB directly from the MPE_IP0075T1 table.
To see the MCC-CAB relation, use the menu items "OpenWay\MasterCard\MC. IRD Configuration\MC MCC CAB Groups" or "OpenWay\MasterCard Fee Prediction\MC MCC CAB Groups".
      Upgrade Note:
      Clients who use the MasterCard interface should manually delete all SIC Groups with the MC_CAB classifier (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\SIC Groups). This is not mandatory, but now SIC Groups with the "MC_CAB" classifier will be not up-to-date. Use the menu item "OpenWay\MasterCard\MC. IRD Configuration\MC MCC CAB Groups" to see the up-to-date relation between MCCs and CABs.
  • 03.46.30.49
    • [CARDS-57890]
      • Added in the "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business" report for Europe (P_CEMEA=N):
- New report section "Cross Border Acquiring Data".
- New report parameters:
1) P_SHOW_CROSS_BORDER (varchar2(1), default value is "Y"). The parameter turns on/off the new section "Cross Border Acquiring Data".
2) P_ACQ_OWN_COUNTRY (varchar2(3), default value is null). The parameter defines the merchant's homeland(3-symbol country code, like 'RUS', 'JPN' and etc) to determine cross border transactions in the "Cross Border Acquiring Data" section.
      Updated Manuals: [visa_statistical_reports\quarterly_operating_certificates\VISA_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

    • [CARDS-58068]
      • Supported new PDS2097 (Text Message to Recipient) import in the NSPK Inward Processing pipe. If the field exists in an incoming message, its value is stored in the "PMTMSG" additional info document tag. 
Supported format change for PDS2175. If NSPK release settings for this article are activated, the "UTF-8" code page is used for filling this PDS, if not, the "ISO8859_5" code page is used. 
These changes are have been made according to K-18 article of the 18.2 NSPK release.
      Updated Manuals: [ips_releases\nspk\20XX_XX_NSPK_Requirements.pdf]

    • [CARDS-58646]

    • [CARDS-58657]
      • Добавлены суб-типы транзакций для карт UPI для транзакции типа "CH Debit" в целях поддержки требования релиза UPI "2.5 A new financial transaction type: Account Funding Transaction" (октябрь 2018 г.).
      Upgrade Note:
      Клиентам, которые используют интерфейс к UPI, необходимо добавить следующие суб-типы транзакций (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Transaction Types\Transactions - All -->SubTypes):

1. Для "CH Debit"
Source Cat "Device"
Target Cat "Card"
Source Type "Our POS"
Target Type "UPI Cards"
Source Acc Type "Merchant Receivable"
Target Acc Type "Outg Suspense"
Fee Algorithm Options "SIC=6012;ACQ_ONLINE=Y;"

2. Для "CH Debit"
Source Cat "Device"
Target Cat "Card"
Source Type "Our ATM"
Target Type "UPI Cards"
Source Acc Type "Merchant Receivable"
Target Acc Type "Outg Suspense"
Fee Algorithm Options "SIC=6012;ACQ_ONLINE=Y;"

Необходимо также добавить "Fee Algorithm Options" с "SIC=6012;ACQ_ONLINE=Y;" для следующих суб-типов:
1. Source Cat "Device"
Target Cat "Card"
Source Type "Our POS"
Target Type "Our UPI Cards"
Name "CH Payment" 

2. Source Cat "Device"
Target Cat "Card"
Source Type "Our POS"
Target Type "UPI Cards"
Name "CH Payment" 

3. Source Cat "Device"
Target Cat "Card"
Source Type "Our ATM"
Target Type "Our UPI Cards"
Name "CH Payment" 

4. Source Cat "Device"
Target Cat "Card"
Source Type "Our ATM"
Target Type "UPI Cards"
Name "CH Payment" 

5. Source Cat "Device"
Target Cat "Card"
Source Type "Our ATM"
Target Type "Our UPI Cards"
Name "CH Debit" 

6. Source Cat "Device"
Target Cat "Card"
Source Type "Our POS"
Target Type "Our UPI Cards"
Name "CH Debit"
      Updated Manuals: [ips_releases\unionpay\20XX_XX_UPI_Requirements.pdf]
    • [I1806190054]/[CARDS-58441]

    • [I1806039880]/[DBK-3890]
      • Added Configuration Inspector export and import of "Date From", "Date To", "Time From", and "Time To" fields in Event message templates.
      Upgrade Note:
      При загрузке конфигурационных файлов модуля Configuration Inspector, сформированных на предыдущих версиях системы, на этапе сопоставления данных будет формироваться сообщение об ошибке: "Field <XXXX> not present in source data". Для предотвращения возникновения ошибки следует перед этапом сопоставления данных добавить поля DATE_FROM, DATE_TO, TIME_FROM, TIME_TO таблицы EVNT_MSG_TEMPL с типом "Removed" в форме "Exc Fld Types" (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Copy Configuration Import\Copy Configuration Import Screen -> [Exc Fld Types]).
    • [CARDS-58520]
      • Eliminated attempts to fill BIN record reference on document accept and other card related checks for non-card contracts. The target contract's contract category is now checked instead of the transaction type's contract category.
      Upgrade Note:
      AUTH_TYPE and PAN document tags are no longer filled for mVisa payments. If the AUTH_TYPE tag was used to identify mVisa payments in product settings (e.g. services or usages), other distinguishing characteristic should be chosen (e.g. the BAI tag) and corresponding settings should be changed.
    • [I1807084877]/[CARDS-58556]
      • Added a check that CDU was performed for the contract involved in the backdated processing actions.
      Upgrade Note:
      Теперь, если процедура ежедневной обработки контрактов (CDU) для контракта еще не завершена, и для этого контракта вызывается процесс корректировки модуля Intelligent Backdated Processing (корректировка в ручном режиме, преобразование расходной операции из предыдущего отчетного периода в рассрочку и т. д.), система сформирует соответствующее сообщение об ошибке для обеспечения согласованности данных.
Чтобы закончить CDU для данного конкретного контракта в такой ситуации, а затем применить действие Intelligent Backdated Processing, необходимо установить глобальный параметр FORCE_CDU = Y.
    • [CARDS-58689]
      • Removed the SEND_REFUNDS_AS_CREDIT pipe parameter from VISA and Affiliated BASE II outward pipes. Pipes affected:
Affiliated BASEII Outward Processing.dll, Affiliated BASEII Prepared Outward Processing.dll, Visa Base II Outward Processing.dll, VISA BASEII ONUS Marked Outward Processing.dll, VISA BASEII ONUS Outward Processing.dll, VISA BASEII Prepared Outward Processing.dll.
      Upgrade Note:
      Удален параметр "SEND_REFUNDS_AS_CREDIT" в 
пайпах VISA и Affiliated BASE II Outward.
Если параметр использовался, клиенту следует обратиться в Службу поддержки
      Updated Manuals: [ips_releases\visa\20XX_XX_VISA_Requirements.pdf] VISA Interface | VISA VCF

1. Name "CH Debit"

Category "Advice" 
Trans Type "CH Debit" 
Msg Details "OUT_ST=Y;"

Code "DpR--1X-" 
Category "Reversal"

    • [CARDS-58521]
      • Изменены Сервисы Mastercard в соответствии со статьей релиза AN 1616 (4 квартал 2018 г.). Добавлены дополнительные Пакеты Сервисов: "STD-STD MC SPC - Maestro MoneySend Funding Forbidden" и "STD-STD MC SPC - MasterCard MoneySend Funding Forbidden".
      Upgrade Note:
      Для эквайреров во всех регионах: необходимо загрузить эталонную конфигурацию для синхронизации Пакетов Сервисов MasterCard из файла \home\db\datax\config\MC_IRD_CFG_SP_CC.txt.
      Updated Manuals: [ips_releases\mastercard\MC_Release_20XX_QX.html]
    • [I1805161998]/[CARDS-58129]
      • Added a new parameter P_CACHE_MTR (varchar2(1), default value is = "Y") for the "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business.rdf" report. The parameter makes it possible to use temporary tables to cache useful data to improve performance in the "Card Issuance" report section.
      Upgrade Note:
      Рекомендуется проверить производительность отчета "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business"  на базе данных с объемом данных, сравнимым с промышленной.
    • [I1807022888]/[CARDS-58525]
      • Corrected an issue with the Apply Strategy Scheme action when a rule contains a link to a new strategy step.
      Upgrade Note:
      Исправлена процедура Apply Strategy Scheme. Выполение данного действия приводило к некорректному заполнению поля New Step в правиле (Rule). 
В случае если на версиях WAY4 Cards 03.46.30.36 - 03.46.30.47 был выполнен Apply Strategy Scheme или Duplicate Strategy, необходимо выполнить Apply Strategy Scheme.

    • [CARDS-58399]
      • Added in the "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business" report for Europe (P_CEMEA = N):
- New lines "Number of ATMs accepting V PAY cards", "V PAY Merchants – Number of outlets", and "V PAY Merchants – Number of POS terminals" in the "Member and Merchant Data" section.

    • [CARDS-58257]
      • Fixed delete actions for Case Management Configuration objects(Activity, Strategy, Parm Values, Parameters, Map, Map Scheme).
      Upgrade Note:
      Клиенты, использующие пункт меню "Case Management", должны запустить скрипт для проверки корректности данных в конфигурации CM доменов. Если результат проверки будет непустым, необходимо отправить его в Службу Поддержки для получения рекомендаций.

Изменена стандартная форма "CM.Map". Удалите форму "CM.Map.dataform.xml" из "%OWS_WORK%\client\way4manager\components\dbm.module\dataform" для использования стандартной формы.
      Check Scripts:
      <OWS Home>\db\scripts\oracle\check\checkdata\cards\CARDS-58257_CM_Conf_check.sql
    • [NET-140]/[CARDS-57867]
      • Changed the algorithm for creating client/contract address lists and logic for transliterating addresses so that addresses are no longer shown multiple times in WAY4 Web screens and in DB Manager/WAY4 Manager forms. See Client Upgrade Notes for additional information.
      Upgrade Note:
      Изменен алгоритм определения языка для транслитерации адресов клиента или контракта, чтобы исправить проблему многократного отображения адреса на экранах адресов в WAY4 Wеb и форме "Customer Service Screen" в DB Manager/WAY4 Manager.
Ранее для транслитерации адреса на английский система использовала язык, указанный для клиента, если для типа адреса (address_type) адресом по умолчанию был задан адрес клиента  (Default Address="Client Base Address" в "ROOT\OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Client Classifiers\Address Types") и в таблице CLIENT_ADDRESS не было адреса с таким типом, а также если адрес был задан только в записи клиента. 
Новое поведение системы поддерживается с помощью глобального параметра USE_SYSTEM_ADDR_LANG со значением "Y" (значение по умолчанию).
Теперь система не учитывает язык клиента и в указанном выше случае использует системный язык из глобальных или пользовательских констант. 
Если язык для адреса клиента или контракта не указан, или указан как английский, или язык для пользователя не определен, транслитерация адресов не выполняется.
Поведение системы можно переключить на использование языка клиента с помощью глобального параметра USE_SYSTEM_ADDR_LANG со значением "N", если для address_type адресом по умолчанию задан адрес клиента, и в таблице CLIENT_ADDRESS нет адреса с таким типом, а также если адрес задан только в записи клиента. 

Теперь список адресов клиентов не содержит адреса, указанного в записи клиента. Прежнее поведение можно вернуть, используя глобальный параметр USE_CL_BASE_ADDR со значением "Y".

Исправлена логика формирования списка адресов для отражения на экранах адресов в WAY4 Wеb и в форме "Customer Service Screen" в DB Manager/WAY4 Manager:
1. если дата активации ("Date To") одного адреса равна дате ("Date From") другого адреса того же типа, система показывает последний созданный адрес;
2. если один период активации адреса охватывает другой период активации адреса, система показывает адрес с более коротким периодом.
      Updated Manuals: [core\Common_References_Books.pdf] [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [] [issuing\user_manuals\Issuing_Module.pdf]
  • 03.46.30.46
    • [CARDS-56678]
      • Changed data for the "Doc #" field of GL Account Report. Now this field is the document's identifier based on which a GL entry is generated.
    • [CARDS-58382]
      • Added a new parameter P_ADDRESS_LINE for the "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business" report (varchar2(255), default value is "to_char(c.billing_contract) || ad.address_line_1") for customising calculation of merchant outlets.
      Upgrade Note:
      Чтобы вернуть старое поведение отчета необходимо параметру P_ADDRESS_LINE выставить значение "ad.address_line_1". В этом случае для двух торговцев, которые имеют одинаковые адреса, количество торговых точек рассчитается как "1".
      Updated Manuals: [visa_statistical_reports\quarterly_operating_certificates\VISA_Statistical_Reports.pdf]
    • [CARDS-58383]
      • Changed logic for 'New Cards Obtained During the Quarter' 
 field in 'XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business'

      Исправлена логика расчета поля "New Cards Obtained During the Quarter" 
в "XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business" - исключено условие отбора по дате закрытия карты. Старое поведение не поддерживается.

    • [CARDS-58110]

      Upgrade Note:
      Эмитентам, использующим пайп "Instalment Plan Export", следует обратить внимание, что в выгружаемый файл по умолчанию добавлено поле "Currency", которое не может быть отключено. Необходимо также проверить интерфейсы, загружающие файлы с графиками погашения ссуды. Выгрузка валюты осуществляется в алфавитном коде. Предыдущее поведение не может быть восстановлено.

    • [I1805163324]/[CARDS-58079]
      • Corrected parameter name P_TRN_BALANCE_TRASFER -> P_TRN_BALANCE_TRANSFER in the XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business report.
Defined the default value for parameter P_TRN_BALANCE_TRANSFER = "Balance Transfers".
Changed the default value for parameter P_TRN_PAYMENT from "CH Payment" to "Payments".
      Upgrade Note:
      В отчете "XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business" скорректирована логика расчета показателей "Balance Transfers" и "Payments". Для возврата старого поведения необходимо: 
- параметру P_TRN_PAYMENT изменить значение на "CH Payment"
- параметру P_TRN_BALANCE_TRANSFER значение заполнить идентично устаревшему P_TRN_BALANCE_TRASFER.

    • [I1805174949]/[CARDS-58073]
      • Changed counting of contracts that are shown in HDR section of the "XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business" report:
-Breakout of EMV-compliant Chip-enabled Cards 
-Of which are MasterCard contactless enabled 
-Total MasterCard contactless Cards issued 
-Total MasterCard contactless enabled Phones issued 
-Total MasterCard contactless enabled alternative form factors.
Now only valid and blocked contracts as of the end of the billing period are counted (previously only valid contracts were counted).

  • 03.46.30.38
    • [CARDS-57318]
      • Upgrade Note:
      Добавлен новый параметр, разрешающий посылать кумулятивные отмены в платежные системы. Параметр CUMM_REV = Y(N) может быть настроен на субтипе транзакций и/или на Сервисе. По умолчанию кумулятивные отмены запрещены. Для того, чтобы разрешить кумулятивные отмены, необходимо установить параметру CUMM_REV значение "Y".
    • [CARDS-57946]
      • Fixed an issue when the "Retr/Resp" button in the form "ROOT\OpenWay\Full\Documents Input & Update\Doc - General Form\All Docs --> [DOC - Brief]" could open an empty document.
    • [CARDS-57949]
      • Added collection initialization before personal data erasure to avoid fatal error on first process launch.
    • [CARDS-57970]
      • Added a new parameter P_PAYMENT_SCHEME (varchar2(255), default value is "W") for the "XLS_NSPK_Statistics_Acquiring_Business" and "XLS_NSPK_Statistics_Acquiring_Devices" reports.
The parameter defines payment schemes which should be present in the report.
      Upgrade Note:
      Изменен выбор MP_PS_MEMBER.PAYMENT_SCHEME, по которым будет сформированы отчеты XLS_NSPK_Statistics_Acquiring_Business, XLS_NSPK_Statistics_Acquiring_Devices.  Для возврата к старому поведению отчетов в параметре P_PAYMENT_SCHEME необходимо задать все MP_PS_MEMBER.PAYMENT_SCHEME, для которых отчет формировался раньше.
      Updated Manuals: [mir_statistical_reports\MIR_Statistical_Reports.pdf]
    • [CARDS-57999]
      • Supported data inheritance for a Second Presentment from the First Presentment if the data is absent in the Chargeback. Affected pipe: com.openwaygroup.pipe.dci.outwards_processing.jar.
    • [I1710103681]/[CARDS-58005]
      • Fixed "ORA-01000: maximum open cursors exceeded" error. Added grants for CM_CASE_FILE and CM_CASE_OBJ tables. Affected pipe: com.openwaygroup.pipe.mc.mastercom_import.jar.
    • [CARDS-58032]
      • Changed how the "Is Group Activity" field is filled in for an activity when the "ROOT\OpenWay\Case Management\Configuration Setup\Domain Configuration\Activities\Approve" action is executed.
Now the field's value is taken into account that was set manually by the user in "ROOT\OpenWay\Case Management\Configuration Setup\Domain Configuration\Activities\Details".
      Upgrade Note:
      Значение поля "Is Group Activity" определяет возможность использования данной операции для группы дел одновременно.
Ранее значение поля "Is Group Activity", установленное вручную пользователем, не учитывалось при выполнении действия "Approve" для операции. Значение "Yes" автоматически устанавливалось для операций, удовлетворяющих всем перечисленными ниже условиям:
- операция не является системной (в поле "System" указано значение "No");
- при выполнении операции не создается новое дело;
- при выполнении операции не добавляется объект;
- операция не предполагает выполнения действий с конкретным объектом дела (для операции не задана роль объекта);
- операция не относится к операциям, специфичным для доменной категории "D" (Dispute).
Для всех остальных операций в поле "Is Group Activity" автоматически устанавливалось значение "No".

Теперь при выполнении действия "Approve" для операции изменился принцип автоматической установки значения "No" в поле "Is Group Activity". Теперь оно устанавливается только для операций, удовлетворяющих хотя бы одному из следующих условий:  
- операция является системной (в поле "System" указано значение "No");
- при выполнении операции создается новое дело;
- при выполнении операции добавляется объект и выбор или создание нового объекта дела требует выполнения ручных действий. Например, ввода параметров нового документа. 
Принцип автоматической установки значения "Yes" в поле "Is Group Activity" не изменился. Для всех остальных операций будет действовать значение, установленное пользователем вручную.

Старое поведение системы не поддерживается. 
Дополнительных действий при работе с настроенными ранее операциями не требуется.
      Updated Manuals: [case_management\Case_Management_Configuration.pdf]
    • [CARDS-58023]
      • Restored currency BOLIVAR FUERTE for Venezuela.
      Upgrade Note:
      Clients should check that the currency for Venezuela (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Country Table) is BOLIVAR FUERTE (VEF/937).
    • [I1804178470]/[CARDS-57919]
      • Modified Fee Prediction tariffs for low-value consumer domestic transactions in Italy according to VISA Business news on 5 Apr 2018.
    • [CARDS-57907]
      • Added a new interest calculation scheme to configure an instalment scheme: "Interest with USE_MONTH_WEIGHT = B". In this configuration, interest for the first instalment portion is calculated for the whole month regardless of a number of days left to the end of the month. In case of early repayment, no advance interest is taken.
      Upgrade Note:
      Раньше схемы расчета процентов по ссуде "Interest with USE_MONTH_WEIGHT=N" и "Interest with USE_MONTH_WEIGHT=Y" могли быть объединены с настройкой "USE_MONTH_WEIGHT=B" на уровне счетовой схемы и финансового института.
Теперь, когда на уровне схемы погашения выбрана схема расчета процентов с режимом USE_MONTH_WEIGHT, тег USE_MONTH_WEIGHT на уровне счетовой схемы или финансового института не проверяется. Если требуемое поведение параметра USE_MONTH_WEIGHT необходимо взять из счетовой схемы или финансового института для всего продукта целиком, включая револьверную часть и часть рассрочки, на схеме погашения необходимо использовать схему расчета "Interest".
  • 03.46.30.37
    • [CARDS-56949]
      • Added a new parameter P_IF_ACTIVE_STMT (varchar2(1), the default value is "Y") for the "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business" report. The parameter defines how to calculate the "Number of Statements Mailed" value - by valid cards (=Y) or by all account contracts (=N).
Changed the P_REPORT_TYPE parameter processing to support writing SQL statements in it.
      Upgrade Note:
      Изменена логика работы параметра P_REPORT_TYPE. Например, можно задать значение P_REPORT_TYPE="c.report_type = 'C'" вместо "'C'". 
Параметр можно использовать для  SQL-запроса, который отбирает контракты, по которым были отравлены выписки.
      Updated Manuals: [visa_statistical_reports\quarterly_operating_certificates\VISA_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

- Breakout of EMV-compliant Chip-enabled Cards
- Of which are MasterCard contactless enabled
- Total MasterCard contactless Cards issued
- Total MasterCard contactless enabled Phones issued
- Total MasterCard contactless enabled alternative form factors.
Now a contract is counted if it is valid at the end of the report period. Previously, the validity of the contract was checked at the beginning of the period.

    • [I1804119098]/[CARDS-57800]
      • Added a check that the CODE field has been filled in for Case Parameters, Activity Reasons, Strategy Step, and Strategy. It is now mandatory to fill in the field. Also fixed the Duplicate Strategy procedure.
      Upgrade Note:
      В пункте меню Case Management -> Configuration Setup -> Domain Configuration необходимо заполнить поле CODE у следующих объектов:
Case Parameters,  Activity Reasons, Strategy и Strategy Step. 
Незаполненное поле CODE не позволяет выполнить утверждение (Approve) стратегии, полученной путем копирования существующей с помощью действия "Duplicate".

Для поиска объектов с незаполненным кодом необходимо выполнить скрипт.
      Check Scripts:
      <OWS Home>\db\scripts\oracle\check\checkdata\cards\CARDS-58609_CM_conf_check.sql

      • Renamed elements from <StornoCorrection> to <Correction> and from <StornoDocId> to <CorrectionDocId> for UFX Additional Statement Request.

      Changes have been made in UFX Additional Statement Correction request. Elements have been renamed: from <StornoCorrection> to <Correction> and from <StornoDocId> to <CorrectionDocId>. The old field names cannot be used. <Correction> and <CorrectionDocId> must be used instead.

    • [CARDS-57740]
      • Enhanced standard personal data clearing process. Added obfuscation of personal data in the "Contract" and "Card Info" tables.
    • [CARDS-57646]
      • Fixed loading outward Fee Collections/Funds Disbursements. Affected pipes: com.openwaygroup.pipe.dci.inward_processing.jar.
      Upgrade Note:
      Clients who use the Diners Club Interface must add the following new message codes (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Transaction Types\Message Types - All):
1. 
Channel = "Diners Club"
Name = "Fee Collection Out"
Code = "FFPO-1Z-"
Category = "Advice"
Is Authorization = "Fin"
Trans Type = "Fee Collection Out"
Msg Details = "OUT_ST=C;"

2.
Channel = "Diners Club"
Name = "Funds Disb Out"
Code = "FFPO-2Z-"
Category = "Advice"
Is Authorization = "Fin"
Trans Type = "Funds Disb Out"
Msg Details = "OUT_ST=C;"
    • [I1804277508]/[CARDS-57769]

  • 03.46.30.34
    • [CARDS-54612]
      • Enhanced calculation for "Number Of Issued Chip Cards", "of which are only Contact", "of which are Contact and Contactless", "of which are only Contactless", "of which are micro tags", "Number Of Active Cards (at least one transaction)", "Number Of Active Cards (at least one Contactless transaction)", "Number of Accounts", and "Number of Active Accounts" fields in the "Card Issuance" section of the "Visa Statistics Issuing Business" report.
Now only contracts/accounts with valid statuses are included in calculations of the values listed above. Contract status history can be taken into account. 

For the "Accounts and Cards" section of the"MC Statistics Issuing Business" report:
Enhanced calculation for the "Accounts at beginning of quarter" (Open/Blocked/Total), "Accounts at end of quarter" (Open/Blocked/Total), "Cards at beginning of quarter" (Open/Blocked/Total), and "Cards at end of quarter" (Open/Blocked/Total) fields. Now the values listed above are calculated based on contract/account status validity where contract status history can be taken into account.
Renamed the "Of which are MasterCard contactless" field to "Of which are MasterCard contactless enabled".
Corrected calculation for "Total MasterCard contactless Cards issued". Now all valid cards enabled to perform contactless transactions are calculated; previously only active cards were calculated.
      Upgrade Note:
      Только новый алгоритм доступен для расчета значений полей раздела "Card Issuance" в отчете "Visa Statistics Issuing Business" и в разделе "Accounting and Cards" в отчете  "MC Statistics Issuing Business".
Старое поведение не поддерживается.
Текущие значения для вышеупомянутых разделов могут отличаться от предыдущих, поскольку добавлено дополнительное условие для карт/счетов, чтобы корректно рассчитывать статистику по статусам контрактов.
Чтобы использовать исторические значения статусов контракта (значения на даты, за которые  формируется отчетность), следует зарегистрировать стандартный классификатор «CONTR_STATUS». В противном случае будет использоваться текущее значение статуса контракта.
      Updated Manuals: [mastercard_statistical_reports\quarterly_mastercard_reporting\MC_Statistical_Reports.pdf] [visa_statistical_reports\quarterly_operating_certificates\VISA_Statistical_Reports.pdf]
    • [CARDS-57619]
      • Fixed incorrect processing of several reversal messages in HA configuration.
    • [CARDS-57627]
      • Added the "JCB" value to the "Data Source" field in the "Bin Table Data Source", "BIN Table - All", and "BIN Table" forms.
    • [CARDS-57636]
      • Added an additional check to verify the DE22.SF5 field when transactions are exported. If the DE22.SF5 field contains a value that is not supported by NSPK, the transaction is suspended.
    • [CARDS-57640]
      • Corrected 'Number Of Active Cards' for XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business report.
    • [CARDS-57650]
      • Fixed online performance degradation during ACCOUNT numeration.
    • [CARDS-57656]
      • Corrected invoice standing payment orders processing in backdated processing: now invoice standing orders are recalculated in backdated processing without the need for additional configuration.
      Upgrade Note:
      Ранее при исправлении операций с помощью модуля Reversal Management платежные поручения, связанные с инвойсами, обрабатывались в режиме Reapply (проводки отменяются и затем выполняются повторно без изменений). Теперь платежные поручения, связанные с инвойсами, будут обрабатываться в режиме Recalc (проводки пересчитываются). При необходимости вернуть прежнее поведение требуется установить на платежном поручении тег STORNO_ACTION=REAPPLY;.
    • [CARDS-57690]
      • Enhanced contract cache in gathering statistics for performance reasons.
      Upgrade Note:
      Рекомендуется проверить производительность сбора статистики на базе, где объем данных сравним с промышленной.
  • 03.46.30.33
    • [CARDS-57371]
      • Eliminated the possibility of incorrect recalculation of a merchant's and bank's sliding usage limiter thresholds on Contract Daily Update.
    • [CARDS-57532]
      • Fixed PDE3605 processing in JCB ISO Inward Processing and JCB ISO Outward Processing pipes. Fixed error when JCB ISO Inward Processing stops working on parsing unknown/incorrect subfields that are not used in processing.
    • [CARDS-57566]
      • Supported the ability to configure additional groups in the SIC_GROUP table to arrange data groups in the "Billing by Industry for ..." sections.
      Upgrade Note:
      В отчете XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business для формирования полей Industry split можно использовать новый параметр P_CLASSIFIER_TYPE. В нем указывается классификатор для группы (trans_group.trans_sic -> sic.code -> sic_group_tree -> sic_group.name)
    • [CARDS-57573]
      • Fixed "Mandatory field 30 of reference message (mtid 1240) is absent" error when exporting "Retrieval Request" message by "JCB ISO Outward Processing" pipe.
    • [I1803265979]/[CARDS-57561]
      • Fixed filling the DE23 field by the "NSPK Outward Processing pipe" when the "F23" tag in a chip addendum has fewer than 3 characters.
    • [I1804098117]/[CARDS-57563]
      • Modified the transaction condition for the BG_BUS_CHIP fee descriptor for Bulgaria.
    • [I1804140808]/[CARDS-57593]
      • Fixed IRD 21 and 61 description (removed PRD_TYPE tag) in the MasterCard IRD Configuration.
      Upgrade Note:
      For acquirers who load IRD definitions from MPE file: use Copy Configuration to synchronise the MasterCard IRD Configuration from the file \home\db\datax\config\MC_IRD_CFG_CFG_CC.txt.
    • [I1804178065]/[CARDS-57576]
      • Added the "SELECT" grant to ADDENDUM_DATA table in the "CM Doc Addendum.dataform.xml" form in DA R2.
    • [I1804181620]/[CARDS-57587]
      • Modified priority of the commercial sector specific fee descriptor in Romania.
    • [PRIOR-79]/[CARDS-57583]
      • Fixed error when "IC Document Export" pipe does not export some messages if "NUM_DOCS_PER_FILE"  and "INCREMENTAL_EXPORT"=Y pipe parameters are set and two messages, which corresponds to one document, are splitted between outgoing files.
    • [CARDS-57451]
      • Implemented Visa 2.4 Apr18-731 Global Mandate for Credit Voucher and Merchandise Return Authorization Messages. Credit Visa transactions will processed as online.
    • [I1804124081]/[CARDS-57501]
      • Changed the condition to detect advices (notifications) on dispute documents sent by the payment system on behalf of a client. Now this condition in DA R2 is based on the value of the SENT_BY_TGT=Y; tag set by a particular inward channel module.
      Upgrade Note:
      Clients who use VISA VCR interface must check that their WAY4Cards version includes CARDS-56736.
    • [CARDS-55740]
      • Increased the length of the fields DOC.REASON_CODE, DSP_REASON.CODE, REASON_CODE.CODE, REASON_ACTION.TGT_REASON_CODE, DISPUTE_TYPE.INW_REASON_CODE, DISPUTE_TYPE.REASON_CODE, DISPUTE_ITEM.INW_REASON_CODE, DISPUTE_ITEM.REASON_CODE, CM_CASE_DOC.REASON_CODE from 4 to 32 symbols.
      Upgrade Note:
      Данное изменение внесено для поддержки требований VISA Claim Resolution. Длинные значения для настраиваемых оснований формирования транзакций (Reason Codes) могут использоваться только для целей VISA Claim Resolution. Все пользовательские интерфейсы, которые могут выгружать/загружать претензионные документы VISA, должны поддерживать длинные значения оснований формирования транзакций.
Соответствующие изменения влияют также на пользовательские представления, и их следует синхронизировать.

    • [CARDS-57350]
      • Fixed processing VCR Dispute response financial reversal in "VISA SMS Inward Processing pipe."
      Upgrade Note:
      To process a VCR Dispute response financial reversal by the VISA SMS Inward Processing pipe, new message_codes must be set up in the "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Transaction Types\Message Types - All" menu item, common settings: "Channel" - "VISA SMS", Category - "Reversal", Is Authorization - "FIN"
1) Name = "ATM 2Prs Rev", Code = "0220_5_SMSR", Trans Type = "ATM 2Prs"
2) Name = "Retail SMS 2Prs Rev", Code = "0220_5_SMS05R", Trans Type = "Retail 2Prs"
3) Name = "CH Payment 2Prs Rev", Code = "0220_5_SMS062R", Trans Type = "CH Payment 2Prs"
4) Name = "CH Debit 2Prs Rev", Code = "0220_5_SMS051R", Trans Type = "CH Debit 2Prs"

      Upgrade Note:
      Необходимо проверить, что на каждом шаге стратегии для данного пользователя доступна только одна операция с тегом CAPTURE в parm_list. В случае наличия нескольких доступных операций для выполнения будет выбрана операция с минимальным ID.
      Updated Manuals: [W4W\doc\Web_Client\Language\Application_Management\Acquiring\Acquiring_Application_Management.pdf] [W4W\doc\Web_Client\Language\Application_Management\Issuing\Issuing_Application_Management.pdf]

      Upgrade Note:
      Процедура установки обновления теперь удаляет дубликаты шаблонов ICC-ключей, а также ранее предварительно сформированные ICC-ключи из-под записей PM_Parms. Для хранения предварительно сформированных ключей теперь используется специализированная таблица. См. документ EMV_Card_Production_Setup.pdf.

    • [CARDS-56605]
      • Supported Visa Claim Resolution (VCR) mandatory update on Base II and SMS interfaces.
    • [CARDS-57375]
      • Changed the way how the "Addendum Type" column is displayed in the "Addendum Data List" and "Addendum Data List Edit" forms in the Dispute Assistant R2 module. Now NAME is displayed instead of CODE for an addendum type.
    • [CARDS-57379]
      • Added new Italy Intracountry Fallback interchange Fees for Micropayments.
    • [CARDS-55552]
      • Changed the values of the following variables for multicurrency products: USG_LIM_CURRENT_AMOUNT, USG_LIM_CURRENT_NUMBER, USG_LIM_MAX_AMOUNT, USG_LIM_MAX_SINGLE_AMOUNT, USG_LIM_MAX_NUMBER, USG_LIM_UNSPENT_AMOUNT and USG_LIM_UNSPENT_NUMBER. Now the values of the counters and the sum are taken from the base card. 
For products that are not multicurrency, the values of the variables remain the same; no search for the base card is made.
      Upgrade Note:
      В нотификациях для возврата значений ограничителей по мультивалютным картам теперь используется значение счетчика для карты в базовой валюте, которое суммирует транзакции во всех валютах. Для возврата к использованию в нотификациях счетчиков в валютах, отличных от базовой, или только в базовой валюте необходимо настроить отдельные ограничители.
    • [CARDS-57249]
      • Improved entry description in the "Merchant Standing Order Entry Details" report. Entry description is now taken from the record of the approved Service that was current at the time of transaction so that later Service updates won't corrupt the entry description.
      Upgrade Note:
      Описание проводки в отчете "Merchant Standing Order Entry Details" теперь берется из описания Сервиса, утвержденного на момент обработки транзакции. Изменение касается в том числе проводок для основной суммы транзакции, которые до этого описывались словосочетанием "Base Amount". При наличии какой-либо индивидуально настраиваемой логики, использующей словосочетание "Base Amount" как константу для поиска основной суммы транзакции в отчете, могут появиться ошибки. Для сохранения корректного поведения следует вместо описания проводки, ранее равного значению "Base Amount", опираться на значение  "Base" в поле Entry Type. Старое поведение не поддерживается.
    • [CARDS-56656]
      • Fixed UFX Messages Response Codes conflict. 
"2510 Unknown object type" replaced with "1920 Unknown object type", 
"2200 Client not found" replaced with "1930 Client not found", 
"2210 Multiple clients found by specified criteria" replaced with "1940 Multiple clients found by specified criteria"
      Upgrade Note:
      Изменились коды сообщений об ошибках, возвращаемых UFX:
вместо "2510 Unknown object type" теперь используется "1920 Unknown object type",
вместо "2200 Client not found" теперь используется "1930 Client not found", 
вместо "2210 Multiple clients found by specified criteria" теперь используется "1940 Multiple clients found by specified criteria"
Изменения могут повлиять на работу системы, если в програмных компонентах используется привязка логики к коду ошибки.
Необходимо проверить текстовым поиском по исходным кодам програмных компонентов, использующих UFX, обработку изменившихся кодов ошибок. Проверить, не используются ли изменившиеся коды в таблицах перекодировки/маршрутизации.
Вернуться к старому поведению можно только откатив обновление системы.

    • [CARDS-55225]
      • The description of tag EVNT_MSG_FOR was added to the installation and configuration manual "WAY4 Product Inspector Module". This tag is used for logging notifications from the EVNT_MSG_TEMPL table`s template, which are connected with an event from the EVENT_TYPE table. The tag must be specified in the Special Parameters field of the step at which the event activates.
The description of enabling test mode for running scripts was changed.
    • [CARDS-57290]
      • Поддержка Telescope будет прекращена с версии 03.48.30.00!
    • [CARDS-55951]
      • Added the ability to process (import and export) VCR status advices via the UFX H2H interface.
      Upgrade Note:
      Added the ability to export and to import advices for "outgoing" transactions (for example VISA VCR advices for originator of transaction) via the UFX H2H Interface ("IC Documents Import" and "IC Documents Export" pipes with MODE=H2H pipe parameter set).

To avoid duplicates, exported records are marked with the "H2H_SENT=Y;" document tag. The recommended additional condition for the FILTER pipe parameter to export such transactions is "doc.source_channel = <Aff channel> and doc.target_channel = 'V' and doc.outward_status = 'C' and doc.fx_settl_date beetwen (<date1>,<date2>)". For correct export of advices for "outgoing" transactions, additional settings of the current menu items used for H2H document export (IC Documents Export pipe) are required:

If a menu item has FILE_SENDER and FILE_RECEIVER pipe parameters explicitly set as a constant value (not as an sql expression) then the FILTER pipe parameter of the existing menu item should be modified as specified above.

If FILE_SENDER and FILE_RECEIVER parameters are not set (the default values are DOC.SEND_MEMBER_ID and DOC.TARGET_MEMBER_ID respectively) or they are set as another sql expression it is recommended to create a separate menu item with FILE_SENDER=DOC.REC_MEMBER_ID and FILE_RECEIVER=DOC.SOURCE_MEMBER_ID parameters. The FILTER pipe parameter described above should be also added to the pipe in the new menu item.

Note that the proposed settings are recommended and are subject to testing on a particular WAY4 system configuration. Contact Customer Support if any obstacles are encountered during the testing.

No additional settings are needed for the "IC Documents Import" pipe to import advices for "outgoing" transactions.
      Updated Manuals: [UFX_H2H_Interchange.pdf (NDA Specification for vendors)]
    • [CARDS-56111]
      • Added a new currency with Full Name "DOBRA", Name "STN", Code "930" and Exponent "2". The old currency DOBRA has been renamed to "DOBRA (old)". Changed currency codes for the country "Sao Tome And Principe".
      Upgrade Note:
      Clients should manually change Full Name of currency with Full Name "DOBRA", Name "STD", Code "678" to "DOBRA (old)" (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Currency Table).
Clients should manually add a new currency with Full Name "DOBRA", Name "STN", Code "930" and Exponent "2" (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Currency Table).
Clients should manually change "Curr Code", "N Curr Code" for the country "Sao Tome And Principe" to "STN", "930" on the date of VISA April 2018 Release implementation (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Country Table).
      Updated Manuals: [ips_releases\visa\20XX_XX_VISA_Requirements.pdf]
    • [CARDS-57159]
      • Added the parameter CHANGE_CURR=643810 to the menu subitem for the com.openwaygroup.pipe.nspk.mpe_import.jar pipe in the standard menu item "OpenWay\MIR\MIR. Daily Procedures\MIR. Load MPE\MIR MPE Import".

      Updated Manuals: [amex_statistical_reports\AMEX_Statistical_Reports.pdf] [mastercard_statistical_reports\quarterly_mastercard_reporting\MC_Statistical_Reports.pdf] [visa_statistical_reports\quarterly_operating_certificates\VISA_Statistical_Reports.pdf]
    • [UFX-497]
      • Changed response message and response file for online and batch UFX Applications for Instalments.
When the parameters "Response=Y" and "AcceptRq=Y" are set in the ResultDtls tag of an online request, the application response for an Instalment application returns instalment brief information (InstalmentRs) in the DataRs section. InstalmentRs includes the following fields:
- InstalmentIDT
- DocID
- Total Amount
- Paid Amount
- Written Off Amount
- Currency
- Status
- dates
This updated behaviour is also applied to batch applications for Instalment management.
      Upgrade Note:
      Application Response contents have been changed for Instalment applications in online mode and in batch mode. The previous contents of a response (contract data returned) are no longer supported. This should be considered if Instalment applications are already used in the integration layer.
This change affects the following application types (see samples of file applications in manuals\english\application_management\file_samples\issuing\readme.txt):
- Add instalment by transaction                                              
- Update instalment                                                          
- Add instalment                                                             
- Partial EarlyRepayment instalment with KeepInstalmentNumber recalculation  
- Partial EarlyRepayment instalment with KeepInstalmentAmount recalculation  
- Full EarlyRepayment instalment                                             
- PaymentHolidays instalment                                                 
- Close instalment                                                           
New contents of the response message/file:
<DataRs>
  <InstalmentRs>
</DataRs>
Previous contents of the response message/file:
<DataRs>
  <ContractRs>
</DataRs>
  • 03.46.30.16
    • [CARDS-57001]
      • Added the LOAD_CLR parameter (default value is "Y") for the com.openwaygroup.pipe.dci.inward_processing.jar pipe run by the menu item "OpenWay\Diners Club\DCI. Daily Procedures\DCI. Inward Processing\DCI DXS Issuer Detail File Inward Processing". The parameter prevents loading clearing documents when its value is "N".
      Upgrade Note:
      DCI Issuers who use the com.openwaygroup.pipe.dci.clearing_import.jar pipe run by the menu item "OpenWay\Diners Club\DCI. Daily Procedures\DCI. Inward Processing\DCI DXS Inward Processing OLD" must add the LOAD_CLR=N parameter to the menu item "OpenWay\Diners Club\DCI. Daily Procedures\DCI. Inward Processing\DCI DXS Issuer Detail File Inward Processing".
    • [CARDS-57012]
      • Added processing of empty tags "TRANS_COND_ATTR", "SEC_TRANS_COND_ATT" values in test_script_import pipe.
    • [CARDS-57023]
      • Added the ability to convert incoming payments to notifications for selected channels only in the UFX Documents Import pipe in "H2H" mode.
      Upgrade Note:
      Added a new pipe parameter, FF_SRC_CH_LIST that makes it possible to convert payment messages to notifications for desired channels only (DocFile/DocList/Doc/Originator/Product/Channel aggregate).  Values for the FF_SRC_CH_LIST pipe parameter are: "ALL", "NONE" or a comma-separated list of message channel codes. The default value is "W,V". 
Note that the FAST_FUNDS=Y parameter in the AddInfo field is no longer analysed; payment financial messages are converted to notifications only according to the values of the FF_CODES_MAP and FF_SRC_CH_LIST pipe parameters.
      Updated Manuals: [core_banking_interface\core_banking_interface\user_manuals\CBS_Interface_UFX.pdf]
    • [I1803013326]/[CARDS-56997]
      • Modified IRD configuration according to daily MPE files that were received before 01/Mar/18.

  • 03.46.30.13
    • [CARDS-49646]
      • The RSA EMV Key Management pipe no longer shows the Folder Selection dialog. Instead, the pipe shows a File Selection dialog with a list of all suitable files (if the SOURCE_DIR parameter is set) or selects the first suitable file from DEFAULT_PATH (if DEFAULT_PATH is set and SOURCE_DIR is not set).
      Updated Manuals: [data_preparation_and_card_personalisation\emv_smart_cards\EMV_Card_Production_Setup.pdf]
    • [CARDS-56664]
      • Implemented the ability to generate mVisa static QR codes in the DB Manager "OpenWay\QR Payments\QR Merchant Schemes" form, [Make QR] button.
    • [CARDS-56458]
      • Fixed an issue with processing of the acquiring contract application that does not have value in the "SIC" field or the "MerchantID" field. Now SIC and MerchantID can be taken from the parent level if these fields are empty.
    • [CARDS-56735]
      • Added the ability to run several NSPK Export processes in parallel.
      Upgrade Note:
      Added the ability to use a sequence generated by DB file numbering, which allows several NSPK Export processes to be run simultaneously.
    • [CARDS-56811]
      • Implemented additional validation of FX sequence for Secondary node of Distributed Processing when FX sequence is searching on Issuing Authorization. If last FX sequence was not found or has invalid state, the last valid FX Sequence will be used in Authorization.
    • [I1802068851]/[CARDS-56852]
      • Added the ability to convert incoming "fast funds" payments to notifications in UFX Import pipe in "H2H" mode.
      Upgrade Note:
      Added a new pipe parameter, FF_CODES_MAP which makes it possible to convert "fast funds" financial messages to notifications. If an incoming message contains the parameter FAST_FUNDS=Y in the AddInfo field, a message code will be substituted according to the FF_CODES_MAP parameter. FF_CODES_MAP has the following format: <OldMessageCode1>:<NewMessageCode1>,<RequestCategory1>;....<OldMessageCodeN>:<NewMessageCodeN>,<RequestCategoryN>; or the "N" value, which turns off message code substitution. The default value is "DpP--2X-:NpP--2S-,P;DpR--2X-:NpP--2S-,R;". To restore previous behaviour, the  "FF_CODES_MAP" pipe parameter value must be set to "N".
      Updated Manuals: [core_banking_interface\core_banking_interface\user_manuals\CBS_Interface_UFX.pdf]
    • [I1705221736]/[CARDS-56879]
      • Described working with Custom Views.
      Updated Manuals: [db_manager\DB_Manager_Administrator_Manual.pdf]
    • [I1801225028]/[CARDS-56878]
      • Внесены уточнения в раздел «Настройка ограничителей для Stand-in-авторизации»
      Updated Manuals: [core_banking_interface\cb_gate\CB_Gate_Setup.pdf]
    • [CARDS-57376]
      • Fixed an issue when an activity that was supposed to be performed without opening a form for a particular document type was performed in DA R2 even if the activity's DSP_DOC parameter value was not set to "AUTO". Now an activity stops with an error message when the above scenario takes place.
      Upgrade Note:
      For all activities which are supposed to be performed automatically, set the DSP_DOC parameter's value to "AUTO".
    • [CARDS-53149]

      Updated Manuals: [diners_club_interface\Diners_Merchants.pdf]
    • [CARDS-56650]

      Upgrade Note:
      For acquirers from Asia Pacific region who load IRD definitions from the MPE file: use Copy Configuration to synchronize MasterCard IRD Configuration from the file "\home\db\datax\config\MC_IRD_CFG_CFG_CC.txt".
    • [CARDS-56815]
      • Added a new currency for Mauritania, OUGUIYA with code MRU/929 according to article AN 1488.
      Upgrade Note:
      1. Banks, especially issuers and acquirers that support DCC, should manually add a new currency to the Currency Table: Full Name OUGUIYA, Name MRU, Code 929 and Exponent 2 (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Currency  Table). Full Name for the old currency with Name MRO and Code 478 should be changed from "OUGUIYA" to "OUGUIYA (old)".
2. Banks, especially acquirers that support DCC, also should set the new currency for Mauritania in the Country Table (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Country Table) from the April Release date.
      Updated Manuals: [ips_releases\mastercard\MC_Release_20XX_QX.html]
    • [CARDS-48154]
      • Supported resubmitting a MasterCard DCC First Presentment without DCC if the acquirer gets a First Chargeback for the full amount with Reason Code 4846.
      Upgrade Note:
      Acquirers that use the MasterCard interface can use the new button [-->1Prs w/o DCC] in the "Doc - Brief" form to resubmit a DCC First Presentment without DCC.

Acquirers that use the MasterCard interface and Dispute Assistant v2 should set up a new activity and change the strategy according to the manual.
  • 03.46.30.09
    • [CARDS-56616]
      • Supported database currencies overrides for the MasterCard CDF interface.
      Upgrade Note:
      If the currency code or currency exponent in the CURRENCY table differs from MasterCard CDF format, currency override must be set up. Refer to the "Redefining Currency Parameters" chapter of the "Currency Conversion" manual for more information.
    • [CARDS-56645]
      • Added VISA Fee Descriptors (BUS EMV, Parking/Vending) for Hungary.
    • [CARDS-56656]
      • Fixed UFX Messages Response Codes conflict. 
"2510 Unknown object type" replaced with "1920 Unknown object type", 
"2200 Client not found" replaced with "1930 Client not found", 
"2210 Multiple clients found by specified criteria" replaced with "1940 Multiple clients found by specified criteria"
      Upgrade Note:
      Изменились коды сообщений об ошибках, возвращаемых UFX:
вместо "2510 Unknown object type" теперь используется "1920 Unknown object type",
вместо "2200 Client not found" теперь используется "1930 Client not found", 
вместо "2210 Multiple clients found by specified criteria" теперь используется "1940 Multiple clients found by specified criteria"
Изменения могут повлиять на работу системы, если в програмных компонентах используется привязка логики к коду ошибки.
Необходимо проверить текстовым поиском по исходным кодам програмных компонентов, использующих UFX, обработку изменившихся кодов ошибок. Проверить, не используются ли изменившиеся коды в таблицах перекодировки/маршрутизации.
Вернуться к старому поведению можно только откатив обновление системы.
    • [CARDS-56671]
      • Added the ability to skip export of unchanged corporations for the MasterCard CDF Export interface.
      Upgrade Note:
      To skip export of the "CorporateEntity" aggregate without any embedded records, the new EXPORT_EMPTY_CORPORATION=N pipe parameter must be set. The new parameter works only when the ORG_REC_CHOICE=U pipe parameter is also set.
    • [I1801165374]/[CARDS-56538]
      • Corrected behaviour for DCI Clearing Import and DCI Inward Processing. Now ATM Service Fee transactions are processed as special Misc transactions. Previously they were processed as general ATM transactions.
      Upgrade Note:
      Clients who use the DCI Issuing Interface must manually add: 
1. New Trans Type (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Transaction Types\Transactions - All) with the following parameters:
Service Class = "Misc"
Source = ""
Target = "Card"
Name = "ATM Service Fee"
DR\CR = "Debit"
Chain Type = "Original"
Is Authorized = "Never"
Is Required = "Yes"
Category = "Individual"
RBS Code = "A1F"
RBS Rev Code = "a1f"
Dispute Class = "ATM Dispute"
Trans Type IDT = "0719F"

2. New SubType for "ATM Service Fee" Trans Type (using the [SubTypes] button in OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Transaction Types\Transactions - All):
Source Cat = ""
Target Cat = "Card"
Source Type = ""
Target Type = "Our DCI Cards"
Source Acc Type = "Inc Suspense"
Target Acc Type = "CH Current/Credits" or another appropriate account type which is used as current cardholder account (for example, Cl Deposit)

3. New Message Code for "ATM Service Fee" Trans Type (using the [Msg Types] button in OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Transaction Types\Transactions - All):
Channel = "Diners Club"
Name = "ATM Service Fee"
Code = "DfP--01-"
Category = "Advice"
Is Authorization = "Fin"
Trans Type = "ATM Service Fee"

4. Add corresponding Misc- services for Transaction Type "ATM Service Fee" to all DCI card service packages.

    • [CARDS-56601]
      • Corrected the logic for checking contract groups for a case when an acquiring MEMBER_ID changed during the reporting period. Now transactions are split into two groups by MEMBER_ID. This may downgrade performance of statistics collecting.
      Upgrade Note:
      Исправлена логика сбора статистики, когда в течение отчетного периода изменился MEMBER_ID эквайрера. Рекомендуется проверить производительность сбора статистики на базе, где объем данных сравним с промышленной.
    • [CARDS-56602]
      • Added support of hash partitioning of GL_TRACE table.
      Upgrade Note:
      A new field has been added to GL_TRACE_TRANSFER index. This may result in higher disk volume utilization.
In order to implement hash partitioning of a table and index, run the redefinition wizard for the GL_TRACE table.
This may be required if insert into GL_TRACE table performance issues are encountered.
This should be done only after proper functional and performance testing of back-office processes. (Posting, CDU, GL export and other processes using the GL_TRACE table).
    • [CARDS-56567]

      Upgrade Note:
      The IP0048T1 and IP0050T1 tables can be imported for custom needs. To import the IP0048T1 and IP0050T1 tables, the new ADD_TABLES pipe parameter should be set to the value "IP0048T1,IP0050T1" in the com.openwaygroup.pipe.mc.mpe_import.jar pipe.

    • [CARDS-52529]
      • Enhanced inheritance of document tags, transaction conditions and attributes to a financial presentment from an authorization document. In addition to inheritance for documents from our devices, attributes are inherited for our issuing documents and sponsor for acquirer documents. Sponsor document inheritance can be turned off by using the COND_INH_FOR_AFF global parameter where "Y" allows attribute inheritance and "N" disables it. The document tag with same values can also be used.
      Upgrade Note:
      In addition to inheritance for documents from our devices, "Transaction Condition", "Transaction Condition Attributes"  and "Additional Information tags" are inherited for our issuing documents and sponsor for acquirer documents. If sponsor documents should not inherit these attributes, the COND_INH_FOR_AFF global parameter should be set to "N" (do not inherit). The parameter's default value is "Y" (inherit attributes). The document tag COND_INH_FOR_AFF with the same values can also be used.
It is recommended to verify financial document processing results for the following cases:
1. Issuer:
- single/multiple financial document matched with authorizations for transactions with own cards card on own devices.
- single/multiple financial document matched with authorizations for transactions with own cards on foreign devices.
- single/multiple financial document matched with authorizations for transactions with own cards on affiliated host devices.
2. Acquirer:
- financial document linked to pre-authorization (by the PREAUTH_ID tag in the doc.add_info field) performed with foreign card on own device. 
- financial document linked to pre-authorization (by the PREAUTH_ID tag in the doc.add_info field) performed with affiliated card on own device. 
3. Sponsor for acquirer:
- financial document matched with the transit authorization performed with foreign card on affiliated host devices. 
- financial document matched with the transit authorization performed with affiliated card on affiliated host devices. 
4. Sponsor for issuer:
- financial document matched with the transit authorization performed with affiliated card on foreign host devices. 
- financial document matched with the transit authorization performed with affiliated card on affiliated host devices.
      Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [tags description] [transaction_management\Documents.pdf]
    • [CARDS-53384]
      • MasterCard Automatic Billing Updater (MABU) and Visa Account Updater (VAU) are supported in issuing. VAU/MABU files are generated based on events for card issuing, reissuing and/or closing to be sent to the corresponding payment system.
    • [CARDS-53816]
      • B2B and G2B money transfers license validation has been implemented for the following transaction application codes: 
FD,GD,MD,OG,C02,C03,C04,C05,C06,C09,C55,C56,C57.
      Upgrade Note:
      To allow the system to process B2B (FD) money transfer transactions (application codes: FD,GD,MD,OG,C02,C03,C04,C05,C06,C09,C55,C56,C57), the appropriate license option must be configured. Please contact Customer Support.
    • [CARDS-53838]
      • Added support for mVISA QR Code generation.
    • [CARDS-54520]
      • Added two new tablespaces: OWFIN_PART_D and OWFIN_PART_I.
On upgrade, the appropriate tablespace name mapping in the DB.INI file will be checked. If creating new database tablespaces instead of using existing ones, the quota also must be granted to the OWS Owner.
      Upgrade Note:
      Для поддержки двухуровнего секционирования для таблиц ACNT_LOG, CREDIT_HISTORY, GL_TRACE and ITEM, определенных как высоконагруженные при вставке, были определены два новых табличных пространства OWFINPART_D и OWFINPART_I. Для новых инсталляций схемы WAY4 или в случае переопределения этих таблиц необходимо создать новые табличные пространства OWFINPART_D и OWFINPART_I и добавить в секцию [Replacing] файла OWS_WORK\db.ini. Параметры табличных пространств могут быть предоставлены службой поддержки поставщика системы WAY4 по запросу. 
Если использование двухуровнего секционирования не предполагается, то вместо создания новых табличных пространств они могут быть переопределены на OWFIN_D и OWFIN_I в секции [Replacing] файла OWS_WORK\db.ini: 
OWFIN_PART_D=OWFIN_D
OWFIN_PART_I=OWFIN_I
    • [CARDS-54525]
      • Implemented a new pipe to import VISA Acquirer Reconciliation Report from BASE-II Customized Delivery File. Refer to "October 2016 VisaNet Business Enhancements Global Technical Letter and Implementation Guide Version 3.0 Effective: 15 September 2016" for report format description.
    • [CARDS-54549]
      • Added the new Actual Interchange Fee (AIF) reconciliation option for VISA and MasterCard acquiring. This option can be used on its own - loading and posting the AIF values provided by IPS. Alternatively, AIF reconciliation can be used in conjunction with Fee Prediction functionality - to reconcile the predicted interchange fees against the actual values and to post the respective differences (if any).
