    • [CARDS-56581]
      • Alipay Transaction QR payments are supported. Merchants can receive Alipay QR code on POS's display. Customers can scan this QR and make payments.
    • [I1608236369]/[CARDS-51555]
      • DA R2: Supported Bundled Chargeback creation.
    • [CARDS-43106]
      • Supported versioning of Case Management Activities, Parameters, Strategy and Map Schemes to make it possible to configure them without any impact on online processes. All active and history versions of an object are available to read in the "History" screens. 
A new version can apply starting from the current or future date. Once the new version has been set, it redefines future changes if they exist (i.e. each object can only have one future change). 
The old behaviour is not supported.
      Upgrade Note:
      Case Management custom procedures and functions have not been changed but it's recommended to check them in the case of customisation to make sure that all parameters are used correctly: parameters like "Activ" and "CMRule" contain now an active (approved) version of the activity or rule record, the "CaseActiv" parameter also contains the identifier and the information from the approved activity record.
      Updated Manuals: [case_management\Case_Management_Configuration.pdf]
    • [CARDS-43229]
      • VISA/Affiliated BASEII Inward Processing: Supported conversion of a Fast Funds transaction to a Notification by corresponding Bin Range settings.
    • [CARDS-47239]
      • Moved the CUST_MARK_ON_US custom procedure call from the standard CUST_ACCEPT_DOC_AFTER procedure to the standard accept procedure.
      Upgrade Note:
      The CUST_MARK_ON_US call should be removed from CUST_ACCEPT_DOC_AFTER procedure custom versions.
    • [CARDS-47333]
      • Updated "POS Monitor" and "POSs No Edit" forms. MerchantID and MemberID values have been added to the value of the "Terminal ID" field if it is configured for device identification.
    • [CARDS-47895]
      • Added the ability to limit the number of different cards for a monitoring rule. Add the "DIFF_CARDS;" tag to the SpcParms field to activate this mode. See documentation for details.
      Updated Manuals: [product_management\Usage_Limiters.pdf]
    • [CARDS-48229]
      • Supported use of several Advanced Applications in one test script. Applications should be identified by the "APPL_IDT" tag in the initial application creation test step.
      Updated Manuals: [product_inspector\WAY4_Product_Inspector_Manual.pdf]
    • [CARDS-48517]
      • Views V_PREGEN_KEY_TOTALS and V_PERGEN_KEYS_SETUP have been added to work with pre-generated keys.
    • [CARDS-49460]
      • Implemented a new form (CSS.OVL Threshold Amount.srd) to display hidden limits with pre-calculated amount values according to a tariff rules with the role = "THRESHOLD" and code = "OVL_THRESHOLD".
Menu: "OpenWay\Customer Service\Customer Service\ [Financials]\[Hidden Limits]"
      Updated Manuals: [] [issuing\user_manuals\Issuing_Module.pdf]
    • [CARDS-49887]
      • Added search for a default contract parameter value on the financial institution level.
    • [CARDS-50183]
      • Tariff Structure and Data Import: Added the parameter DATE_CHECK_MODE=ANY_DATE to the standard menu item for VISA and MasterCard.
    • [CARDS-50560]
      • Changed the Health Monitoring Root Node Name default value "logical-channel-db".
      Upgrade Note:
      В модуле "Health Monitoring" было изменено значение по умолчанию для имени корневого узла. Новое значение - "logical-channel-db". Чтобы продолжить использовать старое название - "netserver-db" необходимо добавить глобальный параметр CARDS_MON_METRIC_COMPATIBILITYсо значением "03.40.20".
    • [CARDS-51125]
      • Moved the Contract Parameters handbook to a separate table, CONTR_PARM. The obsolete handbook with Group Code CONTRACT_PARM_LIST is no longer supported.
      Upgrade Note:
      Изменен способ хранения справочника Параметров контракта. В данной версии форма OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Common Handbooks\Contract Parameters Setup базируется на таблице CONTR_PARM, тогда как в предыдущей версии форма показывала данные из таблицы SY_HANDBOOK с кодом справочника CONTRACT_PARM_LIST. При установке обновления версии автоматически выполняется специальный миграционный скрипт, который копирует записи из старого справочника в новую таблицу CONTR_PARM, дозаполняет новые поля, валидирует полученную новую конфигурацию, а также изменяет код старого справочника в SY_HANDBOOK с CONTRACT_PARM_LIST на OLD_CONTRACT_PARM_LINK. 
Данные старого справочника будут доступны для просмотра через форму OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\Special OpenWay Utilities\Product Utilities\OBSOLETE Contract Parameters handbook, однако обрабатываться не будут.
В новом справочнике Параметров контракта появились некоторые новые функциональные поля, а также нередактируемое поле Is Ready, которое выставляется в Yes при успешном выполнении валидации данного параметра. Валидация выполняется миграционным скприптом, ее также можно вызвать с помощью нажатия на кнопку [Check] на форме "Contract Parameters Setup". 
Важно отметить, что в процессе миграции данных в  новый справочники заполняется новое поле "Sub Main Inheritance Rule" для параметров контракта, перечисленных в значениях глобальных параметров TP_SUB_MAIN_INH и TP_SUB_MAIN_INH_EQUAL. Данные глобальные параметры после этого удаляются и больше в системе не поддерживаются.

После установки новой версии необходимо открыть форму OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Common Handbooks\Contract Parameters Setup и убедиться, что у всех мигрированных Параметров контратка поле Is Ready содержит значение "Yes".

Следует учесть, что при автоматической миграции возможны коллизии, в этом случае запись в новом справочнике остается в статусе Is Ready = No и требует обязательно анализа и ручных исправлений.

Следует также иметь ввиду, что при использовании модуля Configuration Inspector возможна загрузка в систему старых конфигураций с данными, помещаемыми в устаревший справочник Custom Handbook с кодом CONTRACT_PARM_LIST. 
Начиная с данной версии система WAY4 расценивает наличие записей в справочнике с таким кодом как неконсистентную конфигурацию, что будет приводить к ошибкам при утверждении (Approve) Продуктов, Схем Счетов, Пакетов Сервисов, а также при выполнении проверки настройки финансовых институтов.
При утверждении контрактов ошибка возникать не будет, однако, в Process Log будут формироваться записи вида:
"Obsolete Contract Parameters configuration for <N> parameters. It should be analyzed manually and either migrated or removed. See Upgrade Notes on Impact changes for CARDS-51125."

В процессе эксплуатации системы новой версии в случае обнаружения ошибок, описанных выше, рекомендуется выполнить следующие действия:
1. Открыть форму OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\Special OpenWay Utilities\Product Utilities\OBSOLETE Contract Parameters handbook:
2. Отфильтровать в ней данные для неподдерживаемого справочника с кодом CONTRACT_PARM_LIST. Записи, соответствующие этому справочнику подсвечены красным. Далее нажать на кнопку [Check].
После выполнения действия [Check], все записи справочника, которые являются дубликатами нового справочника CONTR_PARM, будут перемещены в справочник OLD_CONTRACT_PARM_LINK автоматически.
3. Те записи неподдерживаемого справочника, которые не являются дубликатами нового справочника, будут размечены либо как New, либо как Different в колонке Validation Flag. При этом, для них доступна кнопка [Messages] для просмотра последних сообщений валидации.
Новые записи, загруженные в старый справочник могут быть добавлены по одной в новый справочник, с помощью Кнопки [Actions] -> [Add to new Contract Parameters Setup]. После чего сам справочник CONTR_PARM (форма OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Common Handbooks\Contract Parameters Setup) должен быть повторно провалидирован (кнопка [Check]).
По записям, которые имеют расхождения с новым справочником (имеют значение "Different" в колонке "Validation Flag"), все необходимые изменения должны быть внесены в новый справочник вручную. После чего может быть запущен повторный Check, который перенесёт дубликаты в исторический справочник. 
Либо, в случае когда не все атрибуты старого справочника должны быть перенесены в новый справочник, после выполнения Check, система покажет в Messages, какие именно атрибуты данного Параметра расходятся. И если это соответствует ожиданиям, то запись в CONTRACT_PARM_LIST подлежит принудительному перемещению в историю, несмотря на расхождения. Для этого служит кнопка [Actions] -> [Remove].

При наличии в форме "OBSOLETE Contract Parameters handbook" записей, подсвеченных красным, которые неясно, как обрабатывать, рекомендуется обратиться в службу поддержки поставщика системы WAY4.
      Updated Manuals: [core\Contract_and_Client_Classifiers.pdf]
    • [CARDS-51703]
      • Calculated contract parameters are now logged in Product Inspector when LOG_MODE=CONTR_PARMS is used. The calculation is performed by request only (for example, when the service based on the parameter is being used in documents processing).
      Updated Manuals: [product_inspector\WAY4_Product_Inspector_Manual.pdf]
    • [CARDS-52087]
      • Refactored use of instalment-related document tags. When an instalment plan is created, the INST_PLAN_ID tag containing the ID of the plan that was created and the INST_CHAIN_IDT tag containing the IDT of the plan chain will be added to the document. The same tags are put into documents created during a plan's lifecycle (plan activation, portion opening, plan payment, portion overdue).
When early repayment of an instalment is made using a document, the INST_PLAN_IDT tag is used as an input parameter to define the instalment plan for early repayment. So instalment input document tags are delimited from instalment output tags.
      Upgrade Note:
      Тег INST_PLAN со значением идентификатора графика погашения более не будет добавляться в поле Add Data авторизационного документа при создании графика. Вместо него будет добавлен новый тег INST_PLAN_ID, который далее используется системой при активации созданного графика в процессе обработки финансового документа. В случае, если индивидуально настраиваемые процедуры использовали тег INST_PLAN, следует изменить их  с учетом использования нового тега INST_PLAN_ID или обратиться в службу поддержки поставщика системы WAY4. Старые документы с тегом INST_PLAN будут совместимы с новым поведением.
      Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]
    • [CARDS-52112]
      • "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Accounting Setup\Bank Divisions",  "OpenWay\SEPA\Issuing Mandate Input & Update" and "OpenWay\SEPA\Acquiring Mandate Input & Update" menus now make it possible to set up Ultimate Creditor and Ultimate Debtor data.
      Updated Manuals: [product_management\Client_Messages.pdf] [sepa_interface\SEPA_Interface_operation.pdf] [sepa_interface\SEPA_Interface_setup.pdf] [transaction_management\Documents.pdf]
    • [CARDS-52181]
      • The DCC_CONTRACT tag is checked during Nostro contract approve; it should be the same for Main and Sub Nostro contracts. When searching for the DCC_CONTRACT tag in Nostro contracts, the tag is first searched for in the Sub Nostro contract, then in the Main Nostro contract, and then on the Nostro Account Scheme. Earlier, the DCC_CONTRACT tag value in the Main Nostro contract was not considered.
      Upgrade Note:
      Клиентам, использующим продукты Dynamic Currency Conversion  (DCC) или Multi Currency Pricing (MCP/MCA), необходимо выполнить запрос CHECK_v1_CARDS-52181_dcc_contract_numbers.sql, проверяющий корректность настроек тегов DCC_CONTRACT на NOSTRO-контрактах. В случае, если проверочный запрос вернул непустое количество строк, то необходимо выполнить детальный запрос и прислать результаты обоих запросов в службу поддержки поставщика системы WAY4.
      Updated Manuals: [dcc\DCC_Setup.pdf]
    • [CARDS-52217]
      • Implemented fleet discounts calculation algorithm for interbranch transactions. Supported goods codes mapping between different nomenclatures.
    • [CARDS-52554]
      • Corrected Process Messages for creation of consistency points with the CLOSE_GL consistency type. They no longer mention WAY4 Datamart.
Starting from WAY4 Cards version 03.45.30, the POINT_TYPE tag in the mp_consist_type.add_info field is expected to differentiate consistency points used by WAY4 Datamart (POINT_TYPE tag with the "DM" value) and those used by WAY4 Cards (POINT_TYPE tag has the "C" value).
For WAY4 Cards version 03.44.30, mention of WAY4 Datamart has been excluded for creation of consistency points with the CLOSE_GL consistency type.
      Updated Manuals: [Datamart\manuals\language\Datamart_Administration.pdf]
    • [CARDS-52590]
      • New forms to view and edit client and contract parameters have been implemented. Menu item "OpenWay\Issuing\Customer Support\Contract Parameters".
      Updated Manuals: [acquiring\user_manuals\Acquiring_Module.pdf] [issuing\user_manuals\Customer_Support.pdf] [issuing\user_manuals\Issuing_Module.pdf]
    • [CARDS-52767]
      • Disabled editing of the "Service - Full Tariff" form's "Service Allowed" field for custom fees (this field has never been processed for Custom Fee).
    • [CARDS-52796]
      • Added validation for the "Normalize" action in "SIC Codes" and "SIC Groups" forms. The following conditions are checked:

For SIC Groups:
GROUP_CODE must be filled;
a pair of GROUP_CODE and CLASSIFIER_TYPE fields is unique

For SIC Codes:
CODE and GROUP_CODE must be filled;
a pair of CODE and GROUP_CODE fields is unique

If validation problems occur, the message "Normalization has error: see process log" will be displayed.
      Upgrade Note:
      При выполнении действия "Normalize" для справочников "SIC Codes" и "SIC Groups", добавлены проверки. Если ошибки были выявлены, то нормализация не производится.
При установке обновления для справочника "SIC Groups" будет выполнено автоматическое заполнение поля "Group Code" для экземпляров у которых "Group Code" не указан.
После установки обновления необходимо выполнить действия "Normalize" из пункта меню OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\SIC Codes, в случае получения сообщения об ошибках, необходимо исправить все ошибки, зарегистрированные в Process Log.
    • [CARDS-52816]
      • New features in balance prediction (Late Payment and interest in ToPay amount).
    • [CARDS-52825]
      • Added funds transfer transaction for core banking system (payments with IBAN can be sent to the CBS interface).
    • [CARDS-52890]
      • IC Documents Export: added a new pipe parameter, "USE_EXT_FILE_COUNTER". When the "Y" value is set (default value is "N"), a sequence generated by the DB is used for file numbering.
      Updated Manuals: [core_banking_interface\core_banking_interface\user_manuals\CBS_Interface_UFX.pdf]
    • [CARDS-52904]
      • A new work mode has been added to acnt_api.PREPARE_ENTRY_DATA0() 
- with the parameters ObjToCache => acnt_api.CollScopeFinAndAuth and AuthFilterMode => acnt_api.afAllNonFin. The API returns authorization and financial documents with balance changes, and records from credit_history that did not change balances and/or account Amount Available. 
- with the parameters ObjToCache => acnt_api.CollScopeAllCreditHistory and AuthFilterMode => acnt_api.afAllNonFin. The API returns only records from credit_history that did not change balances and/or account Amount Available.
    • [CARDS-53024]
      • The following variables have been added to support multicurrency debit products in statement reports ad:
-%SIBLING_MTR%, with values Y / N  indicating sibling order transaction.
-%MTR_OPPOSITE$, prefix for the opposite contract from a transaction.
      Updated Manuals: [issuing\user_manuals\Cardholder_Statements.pdf] [product_management\Client_Messages.pdf]
    • [CARDS-53248]
      • The ability to decline transactions in the second phase when CVV was not checked has been added. The CVC2R tag with the values 'N', 'P', 'U' or 'S' transferred from the controller implements this functionality. 
The global parameter CHECK_CVV_ON_ISS switches on this functionality.
If the parameter is empty, these transactions are successful. If it contains an error number, this error is transferred to the controller and the document is rejected.
    • [CARDS-53281]
      • Changed behaviour for Transaction Conditions. Now on WAY4Cards upgrade standard Transaction Conditions is updated. Before, the system used full delete and insert operations.
    • [CARDS-53369]
      • Supported uniqueness of client individual taxpayer number (ITN field). It's only checked if the field is not empty and the global parameter "UNIQUENESS_CLIENT_ITN" for the financial institution is not set to "N" (No). The default parameter value is "Y" (Yes) and ITN uniqueness is checked.
      Upgrade Note:
      The uniqueness of the client individual taxpayer number (ITN field) is now checked during client creation and modification. It's necessary to ensure that this field value is unique or set the additional global parameter UNIQUENESS_CLIENT_ITN to "N". The default value for this parameter is "Y".
      Updated Manuals: [application_management\r2\CBS_XML_Applications_R2.pdf] [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [issuing\user_manuals\Issuing_Module.pdf]
    • [CARDS-53407]
      • Added a new menu "OpenWay\Advanced Applications R2\Imported & Loaded XML Applications Management" that makes it possible to open unposted applications loaded from XML files or online XML requests with all details and manage them.
      Updated Manuals: [application_management\r2\Advanced_Applications_R2_Module.pdf] [application_management\r2\CBS_XML_Applications_R2.pdf]
    • [CARDS-53433]
      • In API acnt_api.PREPARE_ENTRY_DATA0() with call mode AuthFilterMode => acnt_api.afAllNonFin added a filter: API returns records from credit_history with service_class from list: Balance Inquiry, Top Up, Online Payment, External Payment, Online Statement, Verification, Additional Online Service.
    • [CARDS-53449]
      • Advanced Application R2 forms for contract and client classifiers have been extended by the "Date From", "Date To" and "Comment" fields.
      Updated Manuals: [application_management\r2\Advanced_Applications_R2_Module.pdf]
    • [CARDS-53456]
      • "OpenWay\Advanced Applications R2\Setup\Appl Type" now allows the TARIFF_CODE_EXT tag to be used in Tariff sections for setting a tariff code.
      Updated Manuals: [application_management\r2\Advanced_Applications_Workflow.pdf]
    • [CARDS-53470]
      • A new work mode has been added to acnt_api.PREPARE_ENTRY_DATA0() with the parameters ObjToCache => acnt_api.CollScopeFinAndAuth, AuthFilterMode => acnt_api.afAllWithNonFin. The API returns authorization and financial documents with balance changes, and records from credit_history which did not change balances and/or an account's Amount Available.
    • [CARDS-53471]
      • Implemented fleet transactions reposting by selection in the "OpenWay\Full\Documents Input & Update\Documents Troubleshooting\Documents - Repost by Selection" form.
    • [CARDS-53475]
      • The "Custom Parms" new button has been added to the "Contract Preferred" form (OpenWay\Advanced Applications R2\Cardholder Input & Update by Applications) to pack/unpack the "Custom Parms" tagged field.
A section with the "Preferred" object type is supported for applications created manually according to the application types.
      Updated Manuals: [application_management\r2\Advanced_Applications_R2_Module.pdf] [application_management\r2\Advanced_Applications_Workflow.pdf]
    • [CARDS-53501]
      • A new Event type with the "CLS_UNIQUE" code is used to set a classifier with a future date and empty "Date To" in WAY4Web. This prevents the situation when Single events are stored in the usage action table in Posted status forever.
For each financial institution that has an Event type with the "CLS" code and duration=Single, a new Event type with the "CLS_UNIQUE" code will be added during the  upgrade process.
      Updated Manuals: [core\Contract_and_Client_Classifiers.pdf] [product_management\Events.pdf]
    • [CARDS-53515]
      • Existing records in the VISIBLE_CLASSIFIER_TYPES handbook are marked as "Customer Service Workbench" records. New records can now be created indicating their relation to Customer or Merchant workbenches.
    • [CARDS-53551]
      • The ability to configure an instalment fee to waive all not opened fee invoices on full early repayment has been added. To enable this mode, the WAIVE_ON_FER tag should be specified in special parameters for the fee in the instalment scheme.
      Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]
    • [CARDS-53554]
      • Advanced Applications R2 can skip Product status verification during contract application approval if the new global parameter APPL_ALLOW_NOT_READY is set to "Y". Application accept will check this status anyway.
      Updated Manuals: [application_management\r2\CBS_XML_Applications_R2.pdf] [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]
    • [CARDS-53557]
      • Added functions containing standard DWD_CARD_BRAND and DWD_CARD_CTEGORY mapping logic to the DWH_MAPPING package.
    • [CARDS-53564]
      • The INST_PLAN_ID tag is set in documents created for invoice event fees.
Additional tags can be inherited from an instalment plan into a document created by an invoice event or invoice event fee. The list of tags should be configured in the INST_EVENT_INHERIT_TAGS global parameter (can be specified for a financial institution).
      Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]
    • [CARDS-53575]
      • Special type of fee - Merchant Fee with amortization is supported for instalment plans. The fee is configured in fees for an instalment scheme. Invoices for merchant fee are not included in portion amount and total plan amount, they could not be paid (never become Open). Invoice events should be configured with one of two new amount types, Merchant Fee or Total Merchant Fee. 
The source document contract can be used to get a tariff for an instalment scheme and instalment scheme fee - the USE_CONTRA_TRF tag should be set in the instalment scheme or specific fee for the instalment scheme
      Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]
    • [CARDS-53583]
      • Unnecessary grouping by MCC has been excluded for the "POS Terminal Statistics" and "ATM Statistics" sections of the XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Acquiring_Business report.
      Updated Manuals: [amex_statistical_reports\AMEX_Statistical_Reports.pdf]
    • [CARDS-53585]
      • The menu item "OpenWay\EMV Smart Cards\Card Production\RSA ICC keys PRE-generation\RSA ICC keys PRE-generation" has been updated to show new ICC key pregeneration form.
    • [CARDS-53622]
      • Added "DB Date" field reflecting the record creation system time to the "GL Trace" table to enable multiple Datamart data loading.
    • [CARDS-53659]
      • Fixed an issue with PA DSS requirements compliance. Advanced Applications R2 Import pipe and online requests save the original contract number from the <ObjectFor> section in a special encrypted field.
    • [CARDS-53662]
      • In a multiple relation configuration, if no relation is specified in an authorization document, the default contract will be chosen even if the global parameter SET_DEFAULT_ACCOUNT is set to 'N'.
      Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]
    • [CARDS-53663]
      • Fee charging options can now be selected when manually closing an instalment plan. The INST_ADV_FEE_WAIVE_ON_CLOSE global parameter has been enhanced with two new values: "A" - Charge unbilled fees for the whole plan, and "1" - Charge unbilled fees for one portion.
      Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]
    • [CARDS-53679]
      • Added a new variable for client message notification: %USG_LIM_ACTIVE:<Usage_Code>%, which returns varchar2(1).
The variable returns the current status of a usage limiter with <Usage_Code>.
      Updated Manuals: [product_management\Client_Messages.pdf]
    • [CARDS-53737]
      • A new custom procedure, CUST_EXTRA_LIM_NORM_TOP, has been implemented to redefine the top contract for extra limit normalization.
    • [CARDS-53791]
      • Added AllowedDirection attribute to CodingSet and GoodsLocalItem XML entities of the "Goods Coding Set Import" format. Modified database objects, WAY4 Web forms, and "goods_import" pipe to support the new attribute.
    • [CARDS-53798]
      • Supported a new algorithm for applying interest rate on Due Date. See the account template attribute INT_RESET_DATE definition.
      Updated Manuals: [tags description] [product_management\Client_Messages.pdf] [tariff_management\Tariff_Management.pdf]
    • [CARDS-53803]
      • Correct standing orders processing for terminal contracts with same Terminal ID in different financial institutions is supported. If this duplication exists in the client configuration, the global parameter ALLOW_DUPL_TERMINAL_ID should be set to "Y". In this case, standing order documents for device contracts will be filled with additional contract search attributes: Merchant ID, Member ID and Spc Scheme for source, Member ID and Spc Scheme for target.
      Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]
    • [CARDS-53806]
      • Re-ageing (WAIVED_PD tag) can now be used for Current Due accounts. The corresponding balance type should be marked with the WAIVED_PD tag.
See documentation for details.
      Updated Manuals: [core\Balance_types.pdf] [tags description] [tariff_management\Tariff_Management.pdf]
    • [CARDS-53813]
      • Added a message with "DWH Scope Mapping Update" results.
    • [CARDS-53818]
      • Updated the automatic reversals matching algorithm for terminals working in stateless mode.
RRN will be used first to search for the original transaction. If the original transaction is not found by RRN, STAN will be used.
    • [CARDS-53844]
      • Added the ability to stop regular fee charging when a card is expired. The STOP_AFTER_CARD_EXPIRE; tag should be used in the transaction subtype Fee Algorithm or in Service details.
      Updated Manuals: [tags description] [product_management\Service_Packages.pdf] [transaction_management\Documents.pdf]
    • [CARDS-53845]
      • A new instalment payment scheme, "Fees First" has been introduced. In this scheme, the entire fee amount is planned in first portions, principal payment is planned after the entire fee has paid. Only fees that are not interest-based (Annual Fee, Flat Fee, Portion Fee) can be used with the Fees First payment scheme, early repayments are not allowed.
      Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]
    • [CARDS-53847]
      • Added the ability to mark multi-currency Products with the tag MULTICURR_PRODUCT=Y. The tag should be specified in the top Product of a hierarchy. When the tag is set, additional checks will be performed when approving Products and contracts. Multi-currency Products require a separate license. Contact OpenWay Support for more details.
    • [CARDS-53848]
      • Extended information has been added to balance inquiries for multi-currency cards. The amount returned for 01 balance in authorization requests for multi-currency cards includes amounts in all currencies.
    • [CARDS-53849]
      • Interbranch Fee Order can now be used for Misc documents created by usages. The tag FEE_INTERBRANCH=ORDER; should be used in Misc service details. See details in Documentation.
      Updated Manuals: [product_management\Service_Packages.pdf]
    • [CARDS-53880]
      • The "Device Contract Group" form has been updated. MerchantID and MemberID values have been added to the value of the "Base Terminal ID" field if it is configured for device identification.
    • [CARDS-53978]
      • Enhanced SIC exclude behaviour. The EXC_SIC_GROUP_LIST tag works for all tagged data validation. It can be defined under Preferred, it can be defined in a Service in the "Service Details" field, in a Usage Template in the "Spc Parms" field, and in a Tariff in the "Apply Rules" field, in order to define the rules for document processing.
If a SIC Code is included in any group of this list, the validate entity does not meet search conditions.
      Updated Manuals: [tags description] [product_management\Preferred_Counterparties.pdf] [product_management\Service_Packages.pdf] [product_management\Usage_Limiters.pdf] [tariff_management\Tariff_Management.pdf]
    • [CARDS-53979]
      • Removed processing for the EXCLUDE_SIC tag from the CUST_EN_PREFERRED function.
For SIC Code, use the EXC_SIC_LIST tag.
For SIC Group, use the EXC_SIC_GROUP_LIST tag.
      Upgrade Note:
      Так как из стандартной индивидуально настраиваемой процедуры cust_en_preffered убрана обработка тега EXCLUDE_SIC, необходимо проверить использование данного тега в настройках. Для поиска записей с данным тегом можно воспользоваться проверочным скриптом.
В найденных записях необходимо использовать стандартные теги: EXC_SIC_LIST для задания кодов SIC и EXC_SIC_LIST_GROUP для задания кодов SIC Group.
      Check Scripts:
      CHECK_v1_CARDS-53979_EXCLUDE_SIC_tag.sql
    • [CARDS-54012]
      • Corrected contract status change applications to return error response code 2043 if the standard classifier CONTR_STATUS is not configured. Advanced Applications R2.
      Updated Manuals: [application_management\r2\CBS_XML_Applications_R2.pdf]
    • [CARDS-54050]
      • Implemented the CUST_ADV_MARKUP procedure called when an application is created by the application type and allowing application sections to be checked and pre-filled, if necessary.
    • [CARDS-54051]
      • A new variable has been added for client message notifications:
USG_EVENT_DETAILS:<TagCode>[:DateFormat]%
Returns tag values from usage_action.EVENT_DETAILS.
TagCode is mandatory and indicates tag name.
DateFormat is optional and indicates the date format in a message if the tag value contains a date. Default date format for the tag is "YYYY-MM-DD"
    • [CARDS-54052]
      • The ability to configure different invoice events for manual and automatic instalment plan closure / partial and full early repayment has been added. The IS_MANUAL tag with "Y" or "N" values can be configured in the invoice_event "Add Condition" field; in this case, the invoice event will only be triggered if instalment action is either manual or automatic, respectively.
      Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]
    • [CARDS-54053]
      • The AUTO_ER_KEEP contract parameter can now be used to configure keeping either the tenor or portion amount in instalment plan recalculation when billing date is changed. If the contract parameter is not configured, behaviour depends on the INST_RENEW_RATES global parameter. If INST_RENEW_RATES=Y, tenor is kept; in other cases, portion amount is kept.
      Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]
    • [CARDS-54054]
      • Fee calculation from transaction date is supported for instalments created by a service. To enable calculation from transaction date, the INST_FROM_TRANS_DATE tag should be set in service details or in the transaction subtype.
If the billing cycle with the transaction date is already closed when document posting is performed, plan dates will depend on the instalment scheme's "Dates mode". If dates mode is billing-based, plan dates will be calculated starting from the current billing cycle. If dates mode is transaction-based, the dates will be based on transaction date and if no plan shift is configured, the first portion may be created with overdue status.
      Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf] [tags description] [product_management\Service_Packages.pdf] [transaction_management\Documents.pdf]
    • [CARDS-54074]
      • Changed behaviour. Now the USAGE_HISTORY.SUSP_DATE field is filled when an operation leads to limiter overflow for any limiters, not only for risk rules as before.
    • [CARDS-54131]
      • Calculated contract parameters can now be used for Quarterly calculations.
    • [CARDS-54143]
      • Implemented flexible redefinition of Effective Contract for Balance Type posting.
      Updated Manuals: [core\Balance_types.pdf] [tags description]
    • [CARDS-54149]
      • Added transaction types and subtypes caching to the document accept procedure to reduce database reading.
    • [CARDS-54150]
      • Automatic backdated processing now checks the USE_AUTO_STORNO document tag with values. The same values as in Transaction Subtypes are used. The tag value is inherited into secondary documents (adjustment, reversal), so if backdated processing for presentments is disabled using the USE_AUTO_STORNO=N tag, backdated processing will be disabled for all secondary documents in this document chain as well. The USE_AUTO_STORNO tag without a value still can be used, but it will not be inherited into secondary documents.
      Updated Manuals: [reversal_management\Reversal_Management.pdf]
    • [CARDS-54151]
      • A new instalment limit type, "Total Principal Amount", has been added. The limit amount used depends on the total principal amount (without interest and fees) of active instalment plans. A limit is only restored when the plan is totally paid or closed.
      Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]
    • [CARDS-54154]
      • Added new menu item, "OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\Special OpenWay Utilities\SMS Notifications\Message priority update" for update of "Priority" field first in message templates (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Products\Event Types -> [Message] screen form) then in messages prepared for senting but  not yet sent to match priority set by this script in message template. This menu item is to be run only once.
    • [CARDS-54156]
      • Calculation of service fees depending on different tariffs for portions of one transaction amount according to accumulated turnover for a calendar period has been implemented.
    • [CARDS-54175]
      • Added progress bar, information on number of processed and total records, elapsed and estimated time for "Clear non-standard journals" process.
    • [CARDS-54176]
      • Added the ability to delete original_doc when doc__id is null.
    • [CARDS-54189]
      • Added the ability to configure instalment partner parameters depending on a card's financial institution. If the financial institution is specified for an instalment partner, the partner can be used for cards of that institution only. If the financial institution is not specified, then the partner can be used for cards of any institution.
    • [CARDS-54193]
      • The global parameter IBR_CHECK_COUNTRY has been removed. Default system behaviour is like when the IBR_CHECK_COUNTRY parameter was set to "Y".
      Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]
    • [CARDS-54196]
      • The acquiring processing procedure creates a new ACQ_NL tag in the doc add_info field if Card Stop List validation is passed successfully.
    • [CARDS-54235]
      • A new parameter "P_LIAB_TOP_SQL" has been added to the "Cardholder_Contract_Statement.rdf" report. The length is varchar2(4096). The default value for this parameter is "select a.id from client c, acnt_contract a where c.amnd_state = 'A' and a.client__id = c.id and a.amnd_state = 'A' and a.liab_contract is null and a.acnt_contract__oid is null". The new parameter allows the report to be run in batch mode together with the P_LIAB_CAT_LIST parameter.
      Updated Manuals: [issuing\user_manuals\Cardholder_Statements.pdf]
    • [CARDS-54260]
      • Created a new submission report for the AMEX GFS interface: "OpenWay\AMEX GFS\AMEX. Reports\AMEX GFS Submission Report".
    • [CARDS-54264]
      • Enhanced batch invoice creation. Now batch entries for reversal documents are matched with batch entries for original documents from the same batch and both are marked as paid. If all positive batch entries are matched with negative ones then for this batch invoice manual write-off can be made for the rest of unmatched negative batch entries.
    • [CARDS-54278]
      • Enhanced calculation of service fees depending on different tariffs for portions of one transaction amount. Implemented the ability to use single Fee Min/Fee Max/Fee Base for the total fee amount.
      Updated Manuals: [tags description] [tariff_management\Tariff_Management.pdf]
    • [CARDS-54290]
      • Implemented a new option for Reversal request processing. Set the DECLINE_REV_AFTER_CHBK=Y global parameter or tag in the Special Parms field of the financial institution to decline Reversals with code 58 if a Chargeback document has been created earlier.

    • [CARDS-54293]
      • To avoid hardcoded DUE_FOR_% event posting if WAIVED_PD or MIN_DUE/MIN_TOTAL_DUE parameters are used for an account template, new additional global parameters DUE_FOR_WAIVED_PD and DUE_FOR_SKIP_DUE have been added with the required value "N".
If a special event should be posted if due is skipped because of the WAIVED_PD or MIN_DUE/MIN_TOTAL_DUE options, the parameter value should be set to this special event code.

    • [CARDS-54652]
      • Supported three variants of value for the additional global parameter IF_PREPARE: Y/N, FI, comma-separated list of channels. If IF_PREPARE=Y, Fee Prediction is switched on for all IPS and all members. If IF_PREPARE=<comma-separated list of channels>, Fee Prediction is switched on for listed IPS and all members. If IF_PREPARE=FI, the additional global parameters IF_PREPARE and MC_FP_LICENSED_BSA are taken from the IF_PREPARE and MC_FP_LICENSED_BSA tags in the financial institution's "Special Parameters" field.

In the new "Service Pack Approved List.srd" form, you can go to the "Service Approved" instances (the [ServiceAppr] link), the "Usage Template Approved" instances (the [UsageAppr] link), the "Additional Pack Approved" instances (the [AddPackAppr] link), and the "Serv Pack Event Approved" instances (the [EventAppr] link). The [Details] link shows all the details of the "Approved Service Pack " instance (the "Service Pack Approved Info.srd" form).

    • [CARDS-54827]
      • Enhanced determination of the IPS Member Identifier (Member_ID) for account contracts (statistical contract groups for account contracts). Now Member_ID is calculated as Member_ID of the card contracts subordinate to the account contract while before Member_ID was calculated based on the interchange routing settings.
Supported an optional IPS Member Identifier set up for reporting purposes:
- The ability to define Acquiring/Issuing Member ID by IPS.
- The ability to aggregate reporting data that belong to different financial institutions under the same Member ID.
- The ability to report financial institution data with the different Member IDs by Issuing BINs.
Added the new menu item OpenWay\Full\Statistics\Dictionaries\Payment Scheme Identification.
For more details, please refer to the OW_HOME\manuals\language\MasterCard_statistical_reports\Quarterly_MasterCard_Reporting\MC_Statistical_Reports.pdf,
 OW_HOME\manuals\language\VISA_statistical_reports\Quarterly_Operating_Certificates\VISA_Statistical_Reports.pdf,
 OW_HOME\manuals\language\AMEX_statistical_reports\AMEX_statistical_reports.pdf.
      Upgrade Note:
      Исправлено определение идентификатора участника МПС (Member_ID) для счетовых контрактов (статистические контрактные группы для счетовых контрактов), чтобы избежать несоответствий в данных. Теперь Member_ID вычисляется как Member_ID карточных контрактов, подчиненных счетовому контракту. Ранее значение Member_ID рассчитывалось на основе настроек маршрутизации.
Предыдущее поведение системы больше не поддерживается. Для получения дополнительной информации см. следующую документацию: OW_HOME\manuals\language\MasterCard_statistical_reports\Quarterly_MasterCard_Reporting\MC_Statistical_Reports.pdf, 
 OW_HOME\manuals\language\VISA_statistical_reports\Quarterly_Operating_Certificates\VISA_Statistical_Reports.pdf, 
 OW_HOME\manuals\language\AMEX_statistical_reports\AMEX_statistical_reports.pdf.

    • [CARDS-54840]
      • Added the ability to configure last instalment portion threshold for instalments with portion amount specified. A threshold tariff code should be specified as the value of LAST_PORTION_THRESHOLD tag in the instalment scheme's special parameters. The tariff value can be configured as an amount or as a percentage of portion amount.
If the last portion (or several last portions) amount is less than the threshold amount, these last portions will not be created and the remaining amount will be added to the previous portion.

    • [CARDS-55088]
      • Supported a new tag, CPID_SPC, to search for Money Transfer contracts using a specific target_spc. The contract number that is found will be returned in the CPID_PAN tag.
    • [CARDS-55090]
      • Optimised BIN record search. On document processing for our cards, a BIN record will be searched for based on document parameters if the target contract number differs from the document target number or if the document terminal category differs from the BIN table terminal category (to which the contract subtype is linked), in contrast to previous behaviour when a BIN record was taken from contract subtype. 
On BIN record search, PAN length value will be checked to be between 13 and 19 symbols. For precise PAN length verification with the value in the BIN record PAN Length field, the global parameter CHECK_PAN_LENGTH can be used with the list of Interchange Payment System channel codes, for which this check should be done, delimited by commas. The default value of the parameter is "N" and has not changed. If the default value is used, PAN length is not matched against the BIN table. The "Y" value corresponds to checking PAN length on BIN search for Visa.
      Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]
    • [CARDS-55108]
      • Included markup fee in principal amount when creating an instalment plan for a transaction.

    • [CARDS-55392]
      • Added the ability to take an instalment fee amount from a custom fee. The tag SERVICE_FEE=<list of fee codes> should be added to instalment fee special parameters. If the fee should be taken from a contra service, the additional tag CONTRA_SERVICE should be also set. Only an instalment fee with a flat fee calculation scheme can be based on a service, however it can be of any fee category (ordinary fee, merchant fee, extra fee and so on).
      Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]
    • [CARDS-55421]
      • Added device name (WSP_DEVNAME), device ID (WSP_DEVID) and last four digits of mobile phone number (WSP_L4DIG) saving in the database as token parameters on MDES / VTS enrolment.
      Upgrade Note:
      Необходимо создать 3 параметра для существующих MDES/VDEP/MIR(tokenization)  "Identification Schemes" (OpenWay\Authentication Module\Identification Types -> [Parms]:

1) 
Name = Mobile Number Last 4 digits
Code = WSP_L4DIG
Is Global = No
Is Mandatory = No
Parm Type = String

2) 
Name = Device ID
Code = WSP_DEVID
Is Global = No
Is Mandatory = No
Parm Type = String

3) 
Name = Device Name
Code = WSP_DEVNAME
Is Global = No
Is Mandatory = No
Parm Type = String
	
и утвердить изменения схемы, нажав на кнопку [Approve].
    • [CARDS-55429]
      • Supported 3 logging modes for the CS_DECISION_LOG table. Default behaviour has been changed.
      Upgrade Note:
      Произошли существенные изменения для конфигураций, в которых использован справочник Decision.

Для проверки наличия такой конфигурации следует использовать стандартную форму: OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Common Handbooks\Decision.
Если она не пуста, необходимо внимательно ознакомиться с информацией ниже.

Отключено логирование изменений для всех Decision в таблицу CS_DECISION_LOG по умолчанию. Это не влечет за собой никаких изменений в процессинге, так как указанный лог в процессинге не используется. Текущее значение Decision всегда перевычисляется  в момент обращения к нему.

Ранее, логирование изменений Decision происходило всегда отложенно, с использованием Object Task Scheduler, что иногда влекло за собой образование большой очереди заданий на пересчет и логирование значений Decisions. При этом, сам лог мог нигде не использоваться в принципе.

Отключение логирования не касается тех Decisions, которые используются в экспорте Datamart. Такие Decision всегда логируются, вне зависимости от параметров. И для них можно только выбрать режим логирования - немедленный (используется по умолчанию) или отложенный.

Всего в системе поддержано 3 режима логирования:
1. SKIP - не логировать. Используется по умолчанию для всех Decisions, за исключением выгружаемых на Datamart.
2. DEFERRED - Отложенное логирование в CS_DECISION_LOG с использованием Object Task Scheduler. Этот режим логирования соответствует предыдущему поведению системы. Необходимо убедиться, что Object Task Scheduler регулярно запускается, прежде чем включить отложенный режим логирования.
3. IMMEDIATE - Немедленный пересчет и сохранение CS_DECISION_LOG в момент изменения связанного классификатора. Используется по умолчанию для пересчета Decisions, экспортируемых на Datamart. Данный режим не рекомендован для тех Decisions, которые могут использоваться для больших иерархий контрактов. Т.к. изменение значения классификатора на верхнем контракте в иерархии, может привести к немедленному пересчету связанных Decisions для всех нижестоящих контрактов.

Режимом логирования можно управлять с использованием глобального параметра DECISION_LOG_MODE.
При этом, для одинакового поведения для всех Decisions (за исключением экспортируемых на Datamart), необходимо использовать одно из перечисленных выше значений: SKIP, DEFERRED или IMMEDIATE.

Для того, чтобы система начала проверять режим логирования для каждого Decision отдельно, необходимо в качестве значения глобального параметра использовать - CHECK_<Режим по умолчанию>. Где Режим по умолчанию - это одно из значений SKIP, DEFERRED или IMMEDIATE. В случае, когда на конкретном Decision не задан тег LOG_MODE, то будет использован режим по умолчанию.

Для задания режима логирования на уровне Decision, необходимо использовать тег LOG_MODE в поле Add Info. Анализ режима на отдельном Decision происходит только в том случае, когда глобальный параметра имеет значение CHECK_<Режим по умолчанию>. А также, Decisions, используемые для экспорта на Datamart, рассматриваются индивидуально.

Если таблица CS_DECISION_LOG используется в каких-либо выгрузках или индивидуально настраиваемых процессах, то необходимо изменить режим логирования в соответствии с данными рекомендациями.
      Updated Manuals: [core\Contract_and_Client_Classifiers.pdf] [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [tags description]
    • [CARDS-55447]
      • Added new tags in the details of an event posted as RESULT_EVENT when a classifier value has been changed: PREV_ID, PREV_CODE, NEW_ID, NEW_CODE. PREV tags may be absent if the previous value is empty. NEW tags may be absent if the new value is empty. RESULT_EVENT can be configured as Result Event Code for a specific classifier value, or as a tag in the classifier's "Add Info" field.
      Updated Manuals: [core\Contract_and_Client_Classifiers.pdf] [tags description]
    • [CARDS-55449]
      • Added support of Event generation when the PIN attempts limit is exceeded. Now a PIN_ATT_EXC Event can be generated for a card contract for every subsequent PIN-based operation until the counter resets.
      Updated Manuals: [product_management\Events.pdf]
    • [CARDS-55454]
      • Supported the ability to use separate FX Type and FX Rate Type for Fee Base, Fee Min and Fee Max calculation, different from the main service's FX Type and FX Rate Type.
The following tags can be specified in the "Service details" field of the Service:
- Tag BASE_AMOUNT_FX_RATE_TYPE with values "M" (Middle) or "B" (BuySell) in "Service details" to redefine FX Rate Type.
- Tag BASE_AMOUNT_FX_TYPE=<FX Type Code> to redefine FX Type.
      Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [tags description] [product_management\Service_Packages.pdf]
    • [CARDS-55461]
      • Supported automatic generation of PAN Update messages for cards with tokens during the plastic activation procedure.
    • [CARDS-55462]
      • Implemented the ability to check Active Plastic for a card contract. The tag IF_DATE=CONTRACT.ACTIVE_CARD_EXPIRE; and appropriate IF_DATE_VALUE should be used in any check strings or apply rules.

      • Added the ability to substitute contract alias in the TGT_CARD_NUMBER document tag with actual contract number in Product Inspector test script run.

    • [CARDS-55474]
      • Changed behaviour: Now the standard "Recalc" action for reversal documents in backdated processing forms (OpenWay\Reversal Management\By Document and OpenWay\Reversal Management\By Contract, [Billing] button, "Transactions" form) will reprocess a reversal on the same date as its previous document as if automatic processing were configured for this document. If the value of the STORNO_CANCEL_REVERSALS global parameter is "Y", behaviour will not change - both advice and reversal macrotransactions will be canceled.
      Updated Manuals: [reversal_management\Reversal_Management.pdf]
    • [CARDS-55504]
      • Added references in TD_DOC.posting_details to operations which lead to skipped balance update.
    • [CARDS-55513]
      • Added "History" links to Workflow Configuration screens to open object version history in Advanced Applications R2.

    • [CARDS-55533]
      • Implemented extended logging of backdated processing results. Classifier and balance differences after backdated processing can be logged based on the STORNO_LOG_OBJECTS global parameter. The parameter value is a list of required object types delimited by commas: C - classifiers (default value), B - balances. To log both classifiers and balances C,B should be set as the parameter value.
      Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [reversal_management\Reversal_Management.pdf]
    • [CARDS-55576]
      • Supported Enhanced Value and Product Graduation MasterCard ALM programs.
    • [CARDS-55578]
      • Added a parameter that limits sending cumulative reversals to IPS.
The parameter CUMM_REV = Y(N) can be set in services or transaction subtypes. The default value is "N"  - cumulative reversals are not sent to IPS.
    • [CARDS-55582]
      • Added the Order IDT field to the standing order table. This field is a unique order identifier (unlike the standing order code) and is used in Configuration Import and Merge. The field is filled when approving an Accounting Scheme and when approving a contract (for personal orders). Once filled, the value is not changed on further approval.
      Upgrade Note:
      Для принудительного заполнения поля Order IDT в постоянных платежных поручениях для всех Схема Счетов и банковских контрактов рекомендуется использовать пункт меню OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\Special OpenWay Utilities\Standing order: Order IDT Migration.
Появление нового поля может привести к формированию сообщения об ошибке "Field not present in source data" при сопоставлении данных конфигурационных файлов, сформированных на более ранних версиях системы. Для успешного импорта такого файла новое поле следует добавить с признаком "Skip" в список полей таблицы STANDING_ORDER, которые не следует загружать.
      Updated Manuals: [product_management\Standing_Orders.pdf]

    • [CARDS-55631]

    • [CARDS-55635]
      • Revised algorithm for generating authorization codes. Base counters to generate this code are now stored in a dedicated table. Each counter is uniquely associated with a contract number. For all contracts with the same number, a single shared counter is used.
    • [CARDS-55637]
      • Additional tracing messages for ExtraLimNorm process have been added.
    • [CARDS-55639]
      • Added a new parameter, CONVERT_ACQ_BIN_CH. The parameter can be set for a financial institution or globally.
The parameter redefines the value of field N 32 (Acquiring Institution ID) of an ISO message received through a channel for interaction with an external system.
The value of the CONVERT_ACQ_BIN_CH parameter is set as a list of channels for which routing is defined according to the OUR_MEMBER_ID field of the INTERCH_ROUTING table.
If the parameter is not set, routing is performed according to the value of the CONVERT_ACQ_BIN global parameter.
      Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [tags description]

    • [CARDS-55713]
      • Added a new field, "Officer Granted", to the Case Management form "ROOT\OpenWay\Case Management\Configuration Setup\Users\Users". This field indicates if the corresponding officer has all necessary privileges to work with the Case Management domain. 
The "Approve" procedure will return an error if the user or group supervisor does not have enough privileges. 
The old behaviour is not supported.
      Upgrade Note:
      The "Officer Granted" value should be checked for all Case Management users. If a user does not have the necessary privileges to work with the Case Management domain, correct Data Constraints for the officer or change the owner for cases that are owned by this user and deactivate this user.

    • [CARDS-55953]
      • Added the ability to call the API to update token status on contract status change if the TOKEN_ACTION tag is configured in status "Code Parms" field. Currently available actions are "Resume", "Suspend", and "Deactivate".
    • [CARDS-55964]
      • Changed the order of retrieving values for the AUTH_AMOUNT_DIFF_PCNT and AUTH_AMOUNT_DIFF_PCNT_RETAIL parameters. If the transaction subtype contains a tag name as the value of the corresponding parameter, its value will be checked in the product or financial institution and if no value is found, the value of the global parameter will be used. The same logic will be applied for the AUTH_SAVING_PERIOD, PREAUTH_SAVING_PERIOD and FINAL_AUTH_SAVING_PERIOD parameters, but the first parameter value (or tag name) will be checked in the service.
    • [CARDS-55992]
      • Moved the API for the ALLOWED_SIC_CODE, IN_AREA_GROUP, and IN_SIC_GROUP functions from the BLK to the ACNTM package.
      Upgrade Note:
      Для оптимизации внутренней логики работы API по проверке вхождения страны (Country) или категории торговой точки (SIC) в перечень регионов (Area) или перечень категорий торговых точек (SIC Group) описанные выше функции были перенесены из пакета BLK в пакет ACNTM.
При обнаружении использования в индивидуально настраиваемых пользовательских процедурах вызова указанных API функций из пакета BLK рекомендуется изменить название пакета на ACNTM, применить изменения к базе данных и провести регрессионное тестирование. API функций из BLK пакета будут полностью сняты с поддержки в версии WAY4Cards 03.47.
    • [CARDS-55994]
      • Added the ability to define a default classifier value for a product without setting the value for all contracts. The behavior is implemented by setting the "Set to the Contract" attribute to "No" in the "Product\Classifiers" form and the DEFAULT_FROM=PRODUCT tag in the "Add Info" field of the corresponding user classifier. List of required Business classification is defined by Bank, products are marked by standard menu items which do not affect daily procedures and could be checked on channels by standard means to be used on Channels, screens etc.
      Updated Manuals: [core\Contract_and_Client_Classifiers.pdf] [tags description] [product_management\Products_and_Subtypes.pdf]
    • [CARDS-56008]
      • Added support for providing WAY4 Cards merchant details required for TS mVisa service.
    • [CARDS-56031]
      • Optimized BIN table record search. If a BIN record is found, no further search of BIN records with a wider sub bin is performed. This behaviour can be disabled by setting the global parameter SKIP_WIDER_BIN_SEARCH=N (the default value is "Y"). A Check action has been added to the form for BIN table records with "Own" data source.
      Upgrade Note:
      Необходимо проверить конфигурацию таблицы BIN на наличие записей с источником данных "Own", используя сценарий предварительной проверки. Запуск сценария и корректировка данных должны быть проведены перед обновлением до новой версии Cards. Результаты сценария будут записаны в Process Log в рамках процесса "Validate own BIN records".
Если записи BIN с более широким диапазоном (меньшим количеством цифр) Sub BIN имеют более высокий уровень или приоритет группы BIN, чем записи BIN с более узким диапазоном (большим количеством цифр) Sub BIN, такие записи не будут найдены в таблице BIN, если установлен глобальный параметр SKIP_WIDER_BIN_SEARCH=Y (значение по умолчанию). В данном случае необходима повторная настройка записи BIN с тем же количеством цифр в диапазоне Sub BIN, что и у других записей, или большим (максимальная длина для диапазона Sub BIN составляет 6 цифр).
      Check Scripts:
      CARDS-55773_own_bins.sql
    • [CARDS-56041]
      • Modified case contract selection during case creation. Cases created by an event triggered in bank contracts get the case contract from the document (depending on contract category and case domain category) instead of the original bank contract.
    • [CARDS-56303]
      • Added the ability to configure several "free" contract relation types with different codes. To specify that a contract relation is "free", the FREE_RELATION tag should be specified in the "Posting Scheme" field. Old behaviour for relations with the FREE_RELATION code has been preserved.
    • [I111106223]/[CARDS-29382]
      • A new parameter has been added to the "Cardholder_Contract_Statement" report:
P_HIDE_FEE_CONDITION, varchar(4000). The default value is "1=2". The parameter only works if P_SHOW_CUSTOM_FEE=Y.
Use the parameter to hide fee amounts (convert fee amount to zero) in the transactions section.

    • [I1512029680]/[CARDS-55350]
      • Supported adjustment document posting after card financial institution has changed. To enable this functionality, the global parameter ACCEPT_CHANGE_FI should be set to "Y"; in this case both reversals and adjustments will be posted. 
To preserve the old behaviour when only reversals could be posted after a change in financial institution, ACCEPT_CHANGE_FI  should be set to "R".
      Upgrade Note:
      Изменено поведение глобального параметра ACCEPT_CHANGE_FI. Значение "Y", которое раньше позволяло обрабатывать только отменяющие документы (Reversal) после переноса контракта в новый финансовый институт, теперь также разрешает обработку корректирующих документов (Adjustment). Для сохранения предыдущего поведения системы значение параметра следует изменить на "R".
      Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]
    • [I1601128707]/[CARDS-53135]
      • New menu items have been implemented (OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\Time Zone Support) that allow inconsistent data in the ext_local_date field of the F_I table to be checked and corrected, if TimeZone/FI mode is used.
      Updated Manuals: [core\multiple_financial_institutions\timezone_support\Time_Zones.pdf]
    • [I1603108865]/[CARDS-54836]
      • Advanced Applications R2: Supported a new parameter, "Reason", in AddData of a Usage application. This parameter will be logged to Process Message after application processing.
    • [I1612082576]/[CARDS-52928]
      • VISA BASEII Outward Processing (pipe): changed the logic for filling the "Reimbursement Attribute" field (TCx5 TCR 0 pos 168). Now the default value of the REIMB_ATTR_FROM_SERVICE parameter is "Y" instead of "N". If the REIMB_ATTR_FROM_SERVICE parameter is set to "Y", the "Reimbursement Attribute" field (TCx5 TCR 0 pos 168) will be filled with doc.TARGET_FEE_CODE field, if doc.TARGET_FEE_CODE is null, this field will be filled automatically by the pipe itself. Please review VISA services settings or if Fee Prediction is used, set up WAY4 according to the "VISA_RA_Configuration" manual. If the REIMB_ATTR_FROM_SERVICE parameter is set to "N", the "Reimbursement Attribute" field (TCx5 TCR 0 pos 168) is always calculated by the pipe itself. If the latter behaviour is needed, the parameter REIMB_ATTR_FROM_SERVICE = "N" should be set in the pipe.
      Upgrade Note:
      VISA BASEII Outward Processing (pipe): changed the logic for filling the "Reimbursement Attribute" field (TCx5 TCR 0 pos 168). Now the default value of the REIMB_ATTR_FROM_SERVICE parameter is "Y" instead of "N". If the REIMB_ATTR_FROM_SERVICE parameter is set to "Y", the "Reimbursement Attribute" field (TCx5 TCR 0 pos 168) will be filled with doc.TARGET_FEE_CODE field, if doc.TARGET_FEE_CODE is null, this field will be filled automatically by the pipe itself. Please review VISA services settings or if Fee Prediction is used, set up WAY4 according to the "VISA_RA_Configuration" manual. If the REIMB_ATTR_FROM_SERVICE parameter is set to "N", the "Reimbursement Attribute" field (TCx5 TCR 0 pos 168) is always calculated by the pipe itself. If the latter behaviour is needed, the parameter REIMB_ATTR_FROM_SERVICE = "N" should be set in the pipe.
      Updated Manuals: [visa_interface\VISA_Interface.pdf]
    • [I1701238826]/[CARDS-53843]
      • Information about interest fees has been added to Balance Prediction Log.
    • [I1702076152]/[CARDS-55705]
      • Corrected amount posted in the source contract when the USE_TRANS_AMOUNT parameter value is either "Y" or "F" and there is no account in the settlement currency in the source contract.
    • [I1702089608]/[CARDS-54265]
      • Changed behaviour: Now an invoice batch entry (a batch invoice is an aggregated batch of entries usually sent to merchants in order to collect fees) will be created in closed status if the sum of the debited and credited amount from the client account for the document is zero.
    • [I1703087400]/[CARDS-52467]
      • A new tag, "SEND_CHAIN_REV_ERR;", in device type configuration has been supported. This tag can be used to indicate an incorrect sequence of documents received from a merchant. If the "SEND_CHAIN_REV_ERR;" tag is specified in device_type and a Preauthorization Reversal is received after processing a Sales Completion, it will be rejected with Response Code 95.
    • [I1704043479]/[CARDS-54913]
      • Added inheritance of transaction condition and attributes into secondary financial documents. Inheritance is made for our acquiring and our issuing documents.
      Upgrade Note:
      Custom interfaces which export  trans_condition, trans_cond_attr, sec_trans_cond_att secondary document fields data might be impacted. The following changes should be applied to the interfaces to keep old behaviour: 
- initial trans_condition should be taken from "SEC_TRANS_CONDITION" tag value in doc.add_info field
- initial trans_cond_attr should be taken from sec_trans_cond_att field
    • [I1704060880]/[CARDS-53699]
      • The ONLINE tag is not inherited from a document when manually creating a Reversal document.
    • [I1704133654, I1706289467]/[CARDS-54215]
      • Fixed an issue of checking the Cards Stop list during the financial document posting in case it has been already checked during acquiring processing.
    • [I1705054882]/[CARDS-53869]
      • Added additional fields to the opt_acq_payment table to track when a statement record was created and when its processing started. A sub-process is created under the object task process for every payment processed.

    • [I1706261849]/[CARDS-55172]
      • Enhanced behaviour: when VISA OCT is approved by a channel, return code 00 and tag IRC=82 are returned from NetServer/Transaction Switch to the database. Document status is set to "Under Workflow" and return code to 82, and the information message "OCT approved by channel, check VSS report!" is logged to the document's process messages.
    • [I1708143568]/[CARDS-54914]
      • Added a new device enhanced parameter to the "Acq.Device Enh Parms" form.
Display Value: Note ID's configuration
Data Value: NOTE_ID_LIST
    • [I1708224441]/[CARDS-54611]
      • Added a new parameter, "P_USE_LOCAL_CONSTANTS", to "Cardholder_Account_Statement", "Merchant Standing Orders Details", and "Merchant Billing Level Standing Orders Details" reports. The length is varchar2(3). The default value is "Y". This is an internal technical parameter for DB Manager/WAY4 Manager/WAY4 Web client.

Added a new parameter, "P_READ_LOCAL_CONSTANTS", to "Cardholder_Account_Statement", "Cardholder_Contract_Statement", "Merchant Contract Statement", "Merchant Standing Orders Details", "Merchant Standing Order Entry Details", and "Merchant Billing Level Standing Orders Details" reports. The length is varchar2(1). The default value is "Y". The parameter makes it possible to change the ability to read report parameter values from the LOCAL_CONSTANTS table .

The "P_USE_LOCAL_CONSTANTS" and "P_READ_LOCAL_CONSTANTS" parameters work as a pair. Only if both parameters are "Y" and the "P_CONNID" parameter is not null, report parameter values will be read from the LOCAL_CONSTANTS table.
      Updated Manuals: [acquiring\user_manuals\Merchant_Statements.pdf] [issuing\user_manuals\Cardholder_Statements.pdf]
    • [I1709030570]/[CARDS-54726]
      • Added an additional check for duplicate documents to the accept procedure. Now if a duplicate document is processed in a parallel session, processing of the current document will be interrupted and will be repeated in the next launch of accept. A total of three attempts to process a document is made, if each time the duplicate document is locked by another session, the current document will be declined.
      Updated Manuals: [tags description]
    • [I1710032010]/[CARDS-55318]
      • Changed the default value of the BLOCK_DISTRIBUTED_LIMIT global parameter to "N".
      Upgrade Note:
      По умолчанию обработка документа по установке кредитного лимита не будет влиять на состояние банковского контракта -- источника транзакции. Данное изменение внесено для исключения возникновения взаимных блокировок на банковском контракте при массовой обработке документов по установке кредитного лимита. Для возвращения предыдущего поведения системы следует установить глобальному параметру BLOCK_DISTRIBUTED_LIMIT значение "Y".
      Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]
    • [I1710100663]/[CARDS-55932]
      • Supported Client Service Group inheritance to contracts. A new element, "ChangeServiceGroup" with the "Yes" value should be used in the Client/AddInfo application section. Advanced Applications R2.

DBManager does not support work with non-unique codes of tariff types.

    • [CARDS-53187]
      • The document processing procedure has been improved to support Sales Completion documents matching by shipment identifier (stored in the document add_info field as a value of the PACKAGE_ID tag) for Multiple Capture (Split Shipment) transactions for aggregators.
    • [CARDS-53409]
      • If an online reversal did not lead to a change in the amount available, a notification will not be created.
    • [CARDS-53412]
      • ORA-01403: fixed no data found exception that occurred during MoneySend Reversal Request.
    • [CARDS-53434]
      • Corrected behaviour: now an IPS STIP negative advice message (0120) creates a reversal document when it is received after posting an original request which was received in single-message mode.
    • [CARDS-53476]
      • Removed unnecessary transaction amount validation for transit authorization reversals.
    • [CARDS-53481]
      • Intelligent Backdated Processing functionality has been improved to correct balance history entry amounts for advice and reversal transactions when a balance type is specified in a custom fee service with an empty Fee Type reference.
    • [CARDS-53484]
      • Dispute Assistant v2: Suppressed Automatic Final Write-Off for zero summary balances.
    • [CARDS-53548]
      • Card Expire information will not be inherited from an authorization if it is already filled in the financial document.
      Upgrade Note:
      Card Expire information will not be inherited from an authorization/pre-authorization/transit authorization document if it is already filled in a financial document. This behaviour is required, for example, for tokenization transaction processing. Interfaces using expire date information from a financial document may be impacted. An interface should be changed to get the card expire date from authorization/pre-authorization/transit authorization document to support previous system behaviour.
    • [CARDS-53550]
      • "Device Operation" test step processing has been changed: the TREF tag will be saved in the result document with the "ps_ref_number" value if the TREF tag is not present and "ps_ref_number" is not null in the document template.
    • [CARDS-53556]
      • SEPA Customer-To-Bank export: creditor address data is exported for SEPA Credit Transfer.
    • [CARDS-53571]
      • Corrected behaviour: credited card channel license is only analyzed to determine if  _DOM/_INT suffixes must be added to source_fee_code value.
    • [CARDS-53572]
      • Filling of merchant information for Batch Header documents added on document accept.
    • [CARDS-53670]
      • Updated the discount calculation algorithm with the BEST_PRICE option.
A new BEST_PRICE_USE_STELLA calculation mode has been added to allow selection of the best price: tariff price or pump price.
    • [CARDS-53685]
      • Corrected secondary online messages routing when online and clearing channels are different.
    • [CARDS-53693]
      • Corrected fee amount calculation for authorizations when an additional fee is taken by a limiter.
    • [CARDS-53700]
      • MasterCard PIN PVV Offset Export. Added sorting by ID.

      • Remove checking duration type for Events with the CLS code.
    • [CARDS-53733]
      • Corrected the process for converting a transaction from a previous cycle into an instalment. Now transfers are generated as separate documents, not as macrotransactions for the original document.
    • [CARDS-53736]
      • A new global parameter AUTH_SKIP_TAGS_INHERIT has been added. This parameter makes it possible to skip inheritance of special tags from an authorization to a financial document; these tags should be listed in the parameter value. The online tags ACQ_USG,ONLINE and OPID are always skipped.
      Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]

      • Fixed an error in P2P check operation.

    • [CARDS-53763]
      • Corrected the algorithm for calculating the amount to check limits on online standing order processing: the transaction currency is used instead of contract currency.

      • Corrected process information message for deactivated or absent token.
    • [CARDS-53794]
      • It is no longer necessary to register the "Case Management" menu for the clerk user group to allow clerk users to perform an activity in "Dispute Assistant CM" and other Case Management operation screens.
    • [CARDS-53799]
      • Corrected the status of the link for a card related to an account when the card was reissued as Lost or Stolen.
    • [CARDS-53800]
      • Enhanced dispute documents matching. When a duplicate dispute document is processed, the DSP_DUPL=Y tag is set in the document. Matching of reclassified chargebacks will check the mandatory reason code change, and can be turned off for different payment systems using the global parameter DSP_RECLASSIFIED_CBKS_% with the "N" value, where % is the channel code. A document with the DSP_DUPL=Y tag will initiate a separate case in Dispute Assistant.
      Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] Dispute Management
    • [CARDS-53807]
      • XLS_MC_Statistics_Acquiring_Business and XLS_Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business reports include contracts with date_expire on first day of report period.
    • [CARDS-53809]
      • Use of the TOTAL_BAL_TYPE tag for prepaid cards has been changed. See Client Upgrade Notes.
      Upgrade Note:
      Изменён алгоритм использования тега TOTAL_BAL_TYPE в конфигурации Сервисов, тарифов и т. д.

В случае если тег TOTAL_BAL_TYPE используется для конфигурации предоплаченных карт со значением TOTAL_BAL_TYPE=AVAILABLE;, необходимо добавить дополнительный тег TOTAL_BAL_TYPE_SIGN=+; В противном случае система некорректно вычисляет доступный для пополнения лимит, при наличии на карте отрицательного баланса AVAILABLE. Отрицательный баланс может сформироваться на карте за счёт удержанных сумм комиссий за выдачу карты и т. п.

Использование тега TOTAL_BAL_TYPE рекомендовано только в конфигурации предоплаченных карт и только в сочетании с балансом AVAILABLE. При использовании данного тега с другим типом баланса, либо для конфигурации других типов Продуктов (не предоплаченных карт), необходимо обратиться в службу поддержки поставщика системы WAY4.

Служба поддержки поставщика системы WAY4 предоставляет отдельные проверочные скрипты, которые следует запустить на копии производственной системы до начала процедуры обновления на новую версию.
Если проверочные скрипты выявят указанные выше настройки в системе, следует обратиться в службу поддержки для получения дополнительных рекомендаций.
      Updated Manuals: [tags description] [product_management\Service_Packages.pdf] [tariff_management\Tariff_Management.pdf]
    • [CARDS-53822]
      • Tokens for Incontrol requests aren't checked as MDES/VDEP tokens.

      • Corrected fee processing when closing an instalment plan if a flat fee is used.

    • [CARDS-53839]
      • Fixed issue. Now the "Client Template Details" form in the "Customer Profile\Operations" menu shows sensitive attributes as masked and non-editable. To comply with PA-DSS requirements, a service attribute which can contain PAN should inherit its value from a sensitive dynamic handbook parameter or be directly marked as sensitive by the SENSITIVE=Y tag in the Additional Data field.
      Upgrade Note:
      To comply with PA-DSS requirements, all service attributes which can contain PAN should inherit their values from a sensitive dynamic handbook parameter or be directly marked as sensitive by the SENSITIVE=Y tag in the Additional Data field.
The SENSITIVE=Y tag should be registered in Full\DB Administrator Utilities\System Utilities\Tagged Data Objects for the TD_MSG_ATTR.ADD_DATA object.
      Updated Manuals: [customer_profile\Configuring_WAY4_Customer_Profile.pdf]

Previously, a check of the VISA SMS channel was not performed.
    • [CARDS-53983]

    • [CARDS-53990]
      • AMEX_Statistics_Acquiring report: format for new amount fields in the "Discount Business" section has been corrected.
    • [CARDS-53994]
      • Validation of contract functional dates Late Payment Date (LP_DATE) and Full Payment Date (FP_DATE) has been enhanced for Set and Recalculate operations. The new value of these dates should be equal to or less than the contract's Next Billing Date + 1 day if the previous value met this condition. When Late Payment Date or Full Payment Date equals Next Billing Date + 1, it means that the LP event or FP event will proceed right before Billing.
      Updated Manuals: [product_management\Functional_Dates.pdf]
    • [CARDS-54005]
      • Fixed issue: now an empty record in the Contract/Client Extra Info application section is not processed and doesn't cause an error if this section is not mandatory.
    • [CARDS-54015]
      • Account renumeration is skipped during reversal processing contract initialization.
    • [CARDS-54016]
      • For domains with the ATTACH SUBS tag, only subdomains with the same category will be attached.
    • [CARDS-54033]
      • To attach a contract with a non-unique contract number to a test script, the BNK=<FI bank code> tag should be specified in the test step. Contract search will be performed in the specified financial institution.
      Updated Manuals: [product_inspector\WAY4_Product_Inspector_Manual.pdf]
    • [CARDS-54039]
      • Fixed an issue with inheritance of the Trans_Country, Trans_State, Trans_City, Trans_Details, Merchant_Id, Sic_Code attributes from the main transaction document to line item documents.
    • [CARDS-54043]
      • Changed how the activity checks user competence.
For dispute cases, an activity for which a document is not specified checks user competence against the maximum absolute amount among the active financial documents attached to the case, not against the summary of document amounts as for financial cases. This amount is calculated by the entries for the case contract accounts, not for the document target contract.
      Updated Manuals: [case_management\Case_Management_Configuration.pdf]
    • [CARDS-54047]
      • Fixed Event Messages Date_To parameter calculation when the TimeZone feature is used.
    • [CARDS-54060]
      • If changes in the "Embossing" field group were made for a client, the changes are inherited to the client's contracts during the "Check" activity. 
If parameters were redefined earlier in a contract, the new values are not inherited to these contracts.
    • [CARDS-54066]
      • Now the system does not search for transit authorization documents during financial document processing if the document was created in SMS mode (the initial authorization document was converted to financial during issuing authorization processing). If no transit authorizations are created at all due to system configuration, the global parameter SKIP_TRANSIT_AUTH_SEARCH with the "Y" value can be set to omit transit authorization search.
      Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]

    • [CARDS-54184]
      • Fixed incorrect behaviour of the "Test Script Import" pipe when Standard Journals were imported even if the corresponding Test Scripts were not chosen for import. Now if Test Scripts are skipped by import, Standard Journals will be skipped as well.
    • [CARDS-54185]
      • AMEX GNS Inward: Fixed reject document fields filling.
