    • [CARDS-54245]
      • Incorrect Response Code 85 on TAR / TER for products without the MDES_TYPE tag has been changed to 05.
    • [CARDS-54246]
      • DA R2. Fixed duplicate call procedure to calculate amounts for secondary documents if they are opened to edit several times.
    • [CARDS-54249]
      • Added a new check in the Product approve procedure. Now all accounting contracts for a multi-currency Product should have a default priority specified. If the tag MULTICURR_PRODUCT=Y is set in the top Product, accounting sub-products should have the SIBLING_PRIORITY tag filled.
    • [CARDS-54254]
      • Corrected recalculation of Instalment plans during backdated processing. The INST_PLAN_IDT field of a recalculated plan will be the same as that of the original instalment plan.
    • [CARDS-54255]
      • Backward document replication (document reprocessing) now updates the Application Transaction Counter (ATC) value for declined authorizations.
    • [CARDS-54268]
      • Added consideration of more scenarios for sequences for receiving financial and authorization messages to avoid unnecessary holds on cardholder funds which could occur if a financial document arrived earlier than an authorization. Improved processing performance.
    • [CARDS-54287]
      • Ageing reclassification behaviour has been enhanced.
Threshold amount "WAIVED_PD" can now be compared according to the following rule: account balance less than or equal to "WAIVED_PD" amount. By default, account balance should be less than "WAIVED_PD". To use the comparison rule "less than or equal to", set the parameter "WAIVED_PD_MODE" to "<=" on the financial institution level, or in additional Global Parameters.
      Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [core\multiple_financial_institutions\Financial_Institutions.pdf] [tags description] [tariff_management\Tariff_Management.pdf]
    • [CARDS-54298]
      • MasterCard IRD Calculation: Added check of "Active" records to all selects from MPE tables.
    • [CARDS-54299]
      • MasterCard Inward Processing. Rollbacked issue CARDS-52613. Changed CH Payment transaction processing if Fast Funds option is used (the value of the global parameter MC_FAST_FUNDS is Y).
    • [CARDS-54300]
      • IC Documents Import/Export (pipes) : fixed error "Document with id xx not our document or wrong Message Sequence Number." when exporting the response for a batch document which was imported in DETAIL_DOC=Y mode.
    • [CARDS-54304]
      • AMEX GNS Inward: Fixed filling posting status for Reject File documents.
    • [CARDS-54310]
      • CARDS-53799 has been redesigned. Relations with invalid cards are excluded from the "Related Cards" screen form.
    • [CARDS-54313]
      • Notification Credit Item is converted into a financial document with CH Payment transaction type if the corresponding financial document could not be found and FF_SRC_CODE is present in document info.
    • [CARDS-54316]
      • MasterCard Inward: If pipe parameter USE_PAYMENT_TRANSACTION=N, Cardholder Payment transactions will not be converted to Notifications (Fast Funds mode).
    • [CARDS-54319]
      • Redesigned the algorithm for defining a hierarchy of applications for loading into one plastic. Now a hierarchy of applications with different expiry dates and sequence numbers can be joined in one plastic.
    • [CARDS-54321]
      • AMEX GNS Inward. Changed order of rejects processing in financial mode by changing the menu subitem in the menu item OpenWay\AMEX GNS\AMEX. Daily Procedures\AMEX. Inward Processing\AMEX GNS Inward Processing. Now personal rejects are processed before file reject.
    • [CARDS-54325]
      • Corrected filling document is_authorisation field for transit reversals
    • [CARDS-54336]
      • VISA VCF Export (pipe): fixed duplicating erroneous second export of T4 record when a cardholder belongs to more than one company.
    • [CARDS-54341]
      • Changed how the "RBS Number" and "MemberID" fields are filled in Advanced Application R2 for contract modification. Field values are now inherited from the parent contract if they are empty.
      Upgrade Note:
      Advanced Application R2 for contract modification now inherits RBS Number and MemberID from the parent contract if they are empty. Previously, this was only the case for new subcontracts.
    • [CARDS-54343]
      • Implemented merchants stop list check for OnUs cards Acquiring processing stage.
    • [CARDS-54344]
      • Enhanced Due Date calculation for due normalization for Payment Due (Long Payment Due) accounts. For ageing reclassification (WAIVED_PD threshold) Due Date for target account is now calculated as:
- current Due Date, if due normalization has not yet been performed for account,
- next Due Date, if due normalization has already been performed for account.

For due normalization between Payment Due (Long Payment Due) accounts with the same due settings, Due Date for the target account is now calculated as next cycle Due Date. It avoids transferring the amount to the deepest overdue bucket.
      Updated Manuals: [product_management\Client_Messages.pdf]
    • [CARDS-54352]
      • Corrected interest calculation during balance prediction procedure when both grouped interest and projected interest calculations are used in product configuration.
    • [CARDS-54357]
      • The amount of an unused instalment limit for posting to accounts is now calculated without the amount used by inactive instalment plans. The available instalment limit for plan creation still takes inactive plans into account. If an instalment plan created on authorization should not affect posted instalment limits, INST_AUTH_ACTION=CREATE_INACTIVE should be configured in the service or using the global parameter.
      Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]
    • [CARDS-54358]
      • UFX Documents Import (pipe): if FROM_TRANSIT=Y pipe parameter is set but "Originator\TransitId" element is absent then doc.source_member is filled with "Originator\MemberId" element value.
    • [CARDS-54359]
      • Matching of simulated instalment plans will now depend on the INST_VER tag of a financial document (E2.CF bertlv tag). If the tag value is MC_INST, MasterCard specification for instalment plan mandatory fields for matching will be used and mandatory fields will be INST_NUM, INST_INF_RATE, INST_FEE, EFF_RATE, INST_TYPE. In other cases, OpenWay notation for mandatory fields will be used and mandatory fields will be INST_NUM, INST_AMNT, INST_TOTAL.
      Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]
    • [CARDS-54360]
      • SIOM: fixed finding Issuer Member ID when creating an ONUS SIOM document for an Affiliated Bank's card.
    • [CARDS-54372]
      • Corrected the "Last Updated" field value for the PAYMENT type invoices during test script run in the Product Inspector: now emulated banking date is set instead of the system date.
    • [CARDS-54385]
      • The mode for processing unbilled fees when closing an instalment plan can be configured in Product Inspector. The FEE_OPTION tag in a test step can be used with following values: "Y" - waive unbilled fee, "A" - charge all unbilled fees, "1" - charge unbilled fee for one period. If no option is selected, the default fee processing mode will be used depending on the INST_ADV_FEE_WAIVE global parameter.
      Updated Manuals: [product_inspector\WAY4_Product_Inspector_Manual.pdf]
    • [CARDS-54391]
      • Added clearing of the date_to field in the local_constants table as the first step for menu items "OWS.Statements.Batch Cardholder Statements", "OWS.Statements.Set Billing Date, Branch, F_I, Report Type" and "OWS.Statements.Set ReportType and BillingDate" to avoid incorrect statement generation.
    • [CARDS-54393]
      • Dispute Assistant R2: Fixed wrong bank balance and representment amount calculation on acquirer side when there is a first presentment reversal before chargeback.
    • [CARDS-54398]
      • Allowed AFD zero amount completion advice. When AFD occurs, the blocking amount is cleared on the issuer side.
    • [CARDS-54406]
      • NSPK SIOM Inward: fixed linking incoming documents to incorrect SIOM documents.
    • [CARDS-54415]
      • Fixed the calculation algorithm for a value of funds available for early repayment that is shown during the "Early Repayment" actions. Now balance types configuration in global parameters or in account scheme is considered.
    • [CARDS-54417]
      • Добавлены новые статистические атрибуты "Contract Group: AMEX Card Brand" (AMEX_BRAND), "Contract Group: MC Card Brand" (MC_BRAND), "Contract Group: VISA Card Brand" (VISA_BRAND), позволяющие сделать более точным сбор статистики по транзакциям, выполняющимся на уровне счетовых контрактов, в тех случаях, когда под одним счетовым контрактом ведутся карточные контракты различных МПС.
При наличии описанной выше конфигурации следует устанавливать параметру  P_ATTR_PS_CONTRACT_NAME отчетов "XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business" и "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Busines" значения MC_BRAND и VISA_BRAND соответственно.
Чтобы сохранить текущее поведение системы, изменять значение параметров отчета не требуется.
      Updated Manuals: [mastercard_statistical_reports\quarterly_mastercard_reporting\MC_Statistical_Reports.pdf] [visa_statistical_reports\quarterly_operating_certificates\VISA_Statistical_Reports.pdf]
    • [CARDS-54419]
      • MDES: Changed RC to "00" for Tokenization Event Notification messages with Tokenization Event Indicator = 8.
    • [CARDS-54425]
      • VISA BASE II Outward Processing: fixed filling reserved "Interface Trace Number" field (TCR1 pos. 118-123).
    • [CARDS-54426]
      • When a financial presentment is created by online processes and the PREAUTH_ID tag is present, a check for duplicate presentments is skipped on this document accept. For partial shipments, documents created by the online module are not checked for duplication.
    • [CARDS-54429]
      • Added new API in trans_api package:
GET_MTR_ACC_CURR_EXT() - returns account currency for transaction
GET_MTR_DUE_STATUS_EXT() - returns due status from item_due for transaction
GET_MTR_DUE_DATE_EXT() - returns due date from item_due for transaction
    • [CARDS-54437]
      • When every day including holidays is opened in WAY4 and documents are posted on holidays, backdated processing should not skip holidays when contract state is recalculated. To ensure this, the global parameter STORNO_SKIP_HOLIDAYS=N should be set (can be set for a financial institution).
When the parameter's value is 'Y' (default value), backdated processing skips holidays and does not perform CDU or any other actions with contracts on holidays.
      Updated Manuals: [reversal_management\Reversal_Management.pdf]
    • [CARDS-54439]
      • A new global parameter, FROM_SEC_TRANS_DATE has been added to regulate behaviour of entry posting by transaction date (when FROM_TRANS_DATE configuration is used in services/transaction subtypes) for secondary documents. 
If FROM_SEC_TRANS_DATE = 'Y' (default behaviour) a secondary document's entries will be created with their own transaction date ('Sec Trans Date" document field). If FROM_SEC_TRANS_DATE = 'N', entries will be created with the original document transaction date ("Trans Date" document field).
      Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]
    • [CARDS-54448]
      • Supported a timezone configuration when processing the instalment event fees.
    • [CARDS-54450]
      • Fixed ORA-01747 error during "empty" Assignment menu subitem execution in Scheduler.
    • [CARDS-54455]
      • "Saved Limits" (minimum and maximum balance values and dates when these thresholds were reached) for balances with USAGE=BALANCE have been added to Product Inspector log.
    • [CARDS-54456]
      • Corrected tenor calculation for instalments with fee capitalization.
      Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]
    • [CARDS-54463]
      • VISA RA configuration has been fixed for Slovakia. MCC qualification criteria has been changed for VISA domestic (intra-Slovakian transactions) manual cash transactions.
    • [CARDS-54465]
      • Safe Inward Processing (pipe): fixed import of the "Chargeback Indicator" field for "Acquirer Loss" and "Issuer Loss" records.
    • [CARDS-54468]
      • Fixed issue when payment transactions with PTID=C04 were processed as MasterCard MoneySend transactions.
    • [CARDS-54469]
      • Transaction Conditions: Changed defaults for tokenized base TC to corresponding non-tokenized TC.
    • [CARDS-54482]
      • When an instalment plan is created with interest capitalization and specified portion amount, the calculated tenor is rounded to the nearest integer, instead of rounding up as done in other cases.
      Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]
    • [CARDS-54484]
      • Modified the money transfer transactions PTID and RPBA tags analysis algorithm. The USE_PTID_IN_P2P global parameter is no longer used.
The PTID tag value is used for processing documents when the target card is a MasterCard card. The RPBA tag is used for VISA and other international payment systems.
    • [CARDS-54486]
      • Fixed system behaviour for balance type with history mode: after using backdated processing functionality, MAX amount counter calculation has been corrected.
    • [CARDS-54501]
      • Fixed the algorithm for custom non-group transaction condition code processing. Previously the code had been trimmed to 4 digits.
    • [CARDS-54512]
      • Fixed error in processing of prefix "##" for authentication method parameter pattern which can lead to empty result value.
    • [CARDS-54523]
      • IPM ONUS Outward Processing (pipe): added support for PDS0207 ("Wallet Identifier").
    • [CARDS-54539]
      • Corrected system behaviour for balance type with history mode = Billing when saving history records if billing falls on the second day of the year and the first day is a holiday.
    • [CARDS-54546]
      • Added the global parameter DETECT_FIN_PRESENTMENT_EARLIER_AUTH_ADVICE for incoming authorisation advice processing. This parameter's "N" value deactivates additional searching for previously processed financial advices.
    • [CARDS-54550]
      • Enhanced due normalization for accounts with Due Type = "Contract Due" when the calculated date is a holiday according to the business calendar defined in the Account Scheme or Financial Institution, and when every calendar day is opened with the Contract Daily Updates process. In this case, Due normalization will be performed on the first working day after the holidays according to this business calendar. For due normalization, it is not recommended to use Functional Dates which may be a holiday. It is recommended to shift the resulting date to a working day.
      Updated Manuals: [product_management\Functional_Dates.pdf]
    • [CARDS-54556]
      • DCI IPSE Export: Fixed "Establishment Country" field filling.
    • [CARDS-54559]
      • Visa BASEII Outward Processing (pipe): additional format check for "Authorization Code" field has been implemented.
    • [CARDS-54594]
      • Corrected "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Renew All For Institution" process behaviour for Account Schemes with Included Account Schemes approval: a new step "Renew Not Approved Included Account Schemes" has been added before the "Renew Not Approved Account Schemes" step.
    • [CARDS-54596]
      • Added a new step "Renew Not Approved Date Scheme" to the menu item "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Renew All For Institution". It launches the approve procedure for Date Schemes used in the product setup.
    • [CARDS-54598]
      • DCI. Restored menu item OpenWay\Diners Club\DCI. Daily Procedures\DCI. Inward Processing\DCI DXS Inward Processing OLD.
    • [CARDS-54604]
      • Now adding consistency points after manual editing consistency types (and thus producing new historical records in mp_consist_type) works correctly.
    • [CARDS-54608]
      • Fixed chip data processing when authorization and information requests (i.e. ministatement) are received on different nodes of a distributed processing solution within a short time gap.
    • [CARDS-54609]
      • VISA BIN Table Import (pipe) : fixed performance issue.
    • [CARDS-54613]
      • VISA VCR: Added VCR Reason Codes to VISA SMS channel.
    • [CARDS-54618]
      • Added a new shift mode, "Instalment Start Date" to define the posting date for an Instalment Event Fee. When a transaction from a previous billing cycle is converted to an instalment (using the backdated processing module), an Instalment Event Fee with the specified shift mode is processed with a posting date equal to the current banking date, not the date of the original transaction.
      Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

      • During the Financial Institution Init Settings (Copy) process, references to products are restored after copying all the products.

      • Fixed an issue with fleet transactions report related to documents with empty doc__orig__id field value (Standing Orders). Additional conditions have been added to exclude such document records.

    • [CARDS-54673]
      • The issue when a declined transaction on a secondary node was blocking money on the primary node has been fixed.
    • [CARDS-54678]
      • Due normalization in backdated processing has been corrected.
    • [CARDS-54681]
      • NSPK Outward. Fixed DE22.5 filling.
    • [CARDS-54683]
      • Added advice macrotransaction posting call if a reversal macrotransaction is posted and an advice macrotransaction has not yet been posted. This could happen if contract was not ready during initial advice posting and the value of the global parameter POST_REVERSED_MTR differs from "N".
    • [CARDS-54687]
      • A check for empty macrotransaction currency has been added to API function api.PUT_MTR. If the currency is empty, a fatal error with the message 'Currency can not be empty' will be generated.
    • [CARDS-54688]
      • Backdated processing start date is now always shifted to the previous working day before a holiday, according to the business calendar, even if the global parameter STORNO_SKIP_HOLIDAYS=N is set.
    • [CARDS-54695]
      • Now due macrotransactions processed using a standing order are linked to a standing order document only for acquiring contracts. For issuing contracts, due macrotransactions are not linked and item_due records are not closed as it interferes with backdated processing.
    • [CARDS-54698]
      • Changed processing of POS Environment field (TCR1 pos 168): for recurring transactions the value is "R", for installments - "I".
    • [CARDS-54704]
      • The label for the ADD_INFO field has been changed to "Add Info" in the "Reply Doc Part" form opened by the buttons "Doc-Brief ->Pt Cbk/Rpr".
    • [CARDS-54707]
      • Due normalization during Intelligent Backdated Processing has been corrected for cases when Item Due was closed after loan repayment.
    • [CARDS-54710]
      • Transit authorization reversal processing has been fixed. Previously reversals were rejected with RC 91 - "Autonomus mode disabled".
    • [CARDS-54711]
      • The "Add Info" field has been added to the W4M "Reply Doc" form opened by the buttons "Doc-Brief ->Cbk/Rpr" and "Doc-Brief ->Pt Cbk/Rpr", and to the W4M "Reversal Doc" form, opened by the buttons "Doc-Brief ->Reverse".
    • [CARDS-54717]
      • Changed the result of a value returned by the %TRANS_REASON_DETAILS% variable. Now it returns the whole text from the doc.reason_details field instead of text from doc.add_info.
      Upgrade Note:
      Поскольку у переменной %TRANS_REASON_DETAILS% изменился возвращаемый результат, то необходимо проверить шаблоны сообщений на наличие переменной %TRANS_REASON_DETAILS% (или с тэгом %TRANS_REASON_DETAILS:tag%). Если переменная использовалась без тэгов для получения значения поля документа add_info, то ее необходимо заменить на %DOC_TAGS%. Если переменная использовалась для получения значения тегов, то ее необходимо заменить на %DOC_TAGS:tag%.
      Check Scripts:
      Для поиска шаблонов сообщений можно воспользоваться следующими проверочными скриптами:
CARDS-54717_SMS_template_reason_details_01.sql
CARDS-54717_SMS_template_reason_details_02.sql
CARDS-54717_SMS_template_reason_details_03.sql
CARDS-54717_SMS_template_reason_details_04.sql
      Updated Manuals: [notifications\transaction_notifications\Transaction_Notifications.pdf]

    • [CARDS-54902]
      • Enhanced filling of the "E2.CB" tag. Now, it is always returned in the bertlv data for a Mastercard authorisation request from a terminal capable of processing an instalment even if no instalment simulation was done. Together with the "E2.D6" tag, they form the correct answer for a terminal capable of processing an instalment.

      • Supported Activation Code Notification (ACN) transactions without token.
    • [CARDS-54908]
      • Added a new configuration check in Balance Type validation: use of the SAVE_LIMITS tag for balances with daily history mode is prohibited. If this setting is found, a message will be written to the process log: "Min / Max history unavailable for daily history mode."
    • [CARDS-54928]

      • On card replacement with same product, product init events are not repeated.
    • [CARDS-55041]
      • Included liability contracts in the contract hierarchy that is analysed to determine if a reversal can be accepted from a different terminal than that which sent the original request.
      Upgrade Note:
      В алгоритм определения возможности выполнения запроса на отмену операции с устройства, отличного от устройства присылавшего первичный запрос, добавлена проверка Liability-контрактов.
За дополнительной информацией следует обратиться в службу поддержки поставщика системы WAY4.

    • [CARDS-55114]
      • Modified the XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business.rdf report. Now "Number of Statements Mailed" and "Number of Statements Mailed with Finance Charges" are gathered only for card categories with the parent value of card programme = "CREDIT" (DWD_CARD_CATEGORY classifier values with the "Parent value"="CREDIT") and multiplied on billing cycles number.

- P_FILTER_11
- P_FILTER_12
      Upgrade Note:
      Старая логика расчета полей "Number of Statements Mailed" and "Number of Statements Mailed with Finance Charges" в отчете "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business" не поддерживается.

    • [CARDS-55115]

    • [CARDS-55123]

    • [CARDS-55128]
      • DCI IPSE Export: Fixed balances calculation. Now the pipe considers only "Amount Available" accounts.
    • [CARDS-55139]
      • Fixed issue. A multi-currency pricing document is now declined if the conversion service is not allowed in the DCC contract or IPS contract.
    • [CARDS-55142]
      • Fixed the error message ORA-06502 "Numeric or value error: character string buffer too small" for ageing account templates, when the "Template Details" field contains more than 255 symbols.
    • [CARDS-55152]
      • Fixed error when macrotransactions were duplicated for acquiring documents. The error occurred when a "PostAuth" document was processed simultaneously with the posting procedure.
    • [CARDS-55161]
      • MasterCard MPE Import. Fixed loading table IP0053T1 (Interchange Fee Type).
    • [CARDS-55162]
      • Fixed duplicated line item document rows (if multiple macrotransactions were created) in statement reports.
    • [CARDS-55164]
      • Resolved an issue with the Delinquent Outstanding section in the "XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business" and "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business" reports when they do not contain data for account contracts having both the Credit and Charge card contracts attached.
    • [CARDS-55177]
      • Visa Base II Outward: fixed "Authorization Code contains wrong characters in doc" error when exporting documents with an authorization code that contains the "q" character.
    • [CARDS-55207]
      • Added amendment information refresh for closed standing orders on account schemes approve.
    • [CARDS-55212]
      • Added grants on INST_LIMIT_TYPE view and STORNO_CORRECTION and STORNO_CASE tables for the Cardholder Contract Statement report to fix issue with insufficient privileges on Cardholder Statement generation.
    • [CARDS-55214]
      • Fixed NSPK VISA Bin Table Import: when an incoming range has at least one corresponding (smaller or bigger) original VISA BIN range, only these corresponding records are created (copied) in NSPK BIN Group. Before, the "bigger" original incoming NSPK BIN range was also added to WAY4.
    • [CARDS-55215]
      • DCI IPSE Export: Fixed filling of the "Record Type" field for an Account File if the pipe parameter ACC_LVL_FOR_BAL is set.
    • [CARDS-55241]
      • Corrected display of adjustments in the "Merchant Contract Statement" report. Added the P_ENTRY_FILTER parameter with a default value like in the "Cardholder Contract Statement" report.
      Updated Manuals: [acquiring\user_manuals\Merchant_Statements.pdf]
    • [CARDS-55276]
      • Fixed an issue with applying the appropriate interchange rules (VISA RA calculation when the additional global parameter VISA_CALC_RA is set to "Y"). Now if no domestic (intra-country) interchange rules exist, the system finds another rule (i.e. regional interchange rule).
    • [CARDS-55279]
      • Corrected the algorithm for determining the need to redirect an advice message to the core banking system when its processing finished with rejection.
    • [CARDS-55283]
      • Optimised Customer Profile handbook to reduce execution time.
    • [CARDS-55293]
      • NSPK Inward Processing: fixed rollback procedure for "Interchange Total" and "Reimbursement Fee Total" documents that were created from incoming file.
    • [CARDS-55308]
      • Corrected reversal fraud prevention validation condition to avoid rejection of payment reversals.
    • [CARDS-55312]
      • Changed constant data for the mVisa request according to VISA requirements.
    • [CARDS-55313]
      • Corrected recalculation of interest rate in backdated processing if the rate change is restricted to a specific contract date (INT_RESET_DATE tag is used).
      Updated Manuals: [tags description] [product_management\Client_Messages.pdf]
    • [CARDS-55316]
      • Added a new action, "Refresh Product List" to the forms "Acq Main Contract.srd", "Iss Main Contract.srd", and "Iss Main Contract - Corp.srd". This action makes it possible to refresh the list of allowed products for the current contract, if contract has the approval status "No"
      Updated Manuals: [issuing\user_manuals\Issuing_Module.pdf]
    • [CARDS-55324]
      • Fixed fleet clearing documents transaction amount validation rounding issue.
    • [CARDS-55329]
      • Improved performance of Quarterly IPS Reporting by using account.current_balance and account.on_date_balance in "Total Outstanding" sections for the following reports:
XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business
XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business
XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business
    • [CARDS-55355]
      • Eliminated the ability to generate an authorisation code value unsuitable to VISA restrictions.
    • [CARDS-55384]
      • Fixed WAY4 Manager form "ROOT\OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Accounting Setup\Bank Divisions". A SEPA mandate activation period can now be set.
      Updated Manuals: [sepa_interface\SEPA_Interface_setup.pdf]
    • [CARDS-55387]
      • Restored processing of cases when a reversal transaction message is received before the authorization request. Added limit on the period for stopping attempts to search for reversals preceding the corresponding request. By default the search is performed within 24 hours. This period can be redefined with the global parameter UNM_AUTH_REV_FLASHBACK_DAYS.
    • [CARDS-55388]
      • Corrected Advanced Application R2 for contract counterparty creation by a predefined application type to avoid "Counterparty is not found" errors.
    • [CARDS-55405]
      • Fixed issue: PAN and D_TKN document tags containing sensitive data will now be masked when they are viewed through the "All Tags" link.
    • [CARDS-55418]
      • DCI IPSE Export: Fixed filling of "SIC Code" and "Merchant Specific Code" fields in TRA file. Now if SIC code has a value between 3000 and 3999, it is put in the "Merchant Specific Code" field, otherwise in the "SIC Code" field.
    • [CARDS-55420]
      • Added new check of debit/credit pairs for Account Types validation: if the appropriate pairs were not found, an error message will be added to the process log with the text "Asset/Liability pairs are not found. Account types has incorrect "Send Debit To"/"Send Credit To" setting". If both "Send Debit To" and "Send Credit To" properties are set in the same Account Type, an error message will be added to the Process Log with the text "Only one property "Send Debit To" or "Send Credit To" can be set".
    • [CARDS-55426]
      • Added check of received card data values on IRouter even if security values are absent in the message.
    • [CARDS-55433]
      • Changed the behaviour of the BAL file fields marked as "Information provided on the statement date only" in the DCI IPSE manual that are now exported only if the "Record Type" field value is "B".
    • [CARDS-55436]
      • Fixed WAY4Web client context data synchronisation process problem which could lead to deadlocks in documents posting process.
    • [CARDS-55443]
      • Corrected generation of the chain identifier for an instalment plan converted from a transaction in previous cycles if another plan was created and closed for the same transaction.
    • [CARDS-55459]
      • Corrected the "Event Message Text" form to avoid [Dictionary] button error.
    • [CARDS-55465]
      • Fixed menu item "OpenWay\WAY4 UFX Interchange\File Management\UFX Reset Outward File Counter". Changed counter name.
      Upgrade Note:
      After the "Import Standard Menu" procedure, compare the standard menu item "OpenWay\WAY4 UFX Interchange\File Management\UFX Reset Outward File Counter" with custom menu items that use it as a template and update them according to the standard one.
    • [CARDS-55471]
      • Added a new parameter to the "XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Acquiring_Business" report:
P_GROUP_CHANNELS, varchar2(255), the default value is " 'X','Y','x','y' ".
The parameter is used for transaction filtering in the "Discount Business Summary" and "POS Billing Detail By Industry" sections.
      Updated Manuals: [amex_statistical_reports\AMEX_Statistical_Reports.pdf]
    • [CARDS-55501]
      • Fixed an issue when ABU messages were wrongly selected and sent to IPS online by Transaction Switch DBFileUpdate.
    • [CARDS-55507]
      • Corrected processing of authorization requests in SMS mode if a reversal message was received earlier.
    • [CARDS-55510]
      • NSPK Inward Processing: fixed incorrect processing of settlement incoming messages for financial advices as "Iss Ichng Detail Loyalty For Cardholder CR Inc". Now such messages without the DE-026 field are loaded as "Iss Ichng Detail CH Payment Inc" type.
    • [CARDS-55511]
      • Corrected processing of financial online messages. They are now received without restriction by category.
    • [CARDS-55534]
      • XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business: fixed amount balance available calculation algorithm in the "Prepaid cards" section, line "Balance available/remaining at end of quarter". Now: if there are several Prepaid cards related to the same accounting contract in a main-sub hierarchy, its account balance will be included in the report only once. Before: it used to be multiplied by the number of cards.
    • [CARDS-55540]
      • DCI IPSE Export: Fixed "Transaction Amount" field filling in TRA file (added sign).
    • [CARDS-55547]
      • DA R2. Fixed function to check Fraud Counter. Now this is performed only for Issuing contracts.
      Upgrade Note:
      Fixed function to check Fraud Counter. Now it's performed only for Issuing contracts.
    • [CARDS-55569]
      • Fixed issue in the XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business report. Now the value "Of which are only Contact" in the "Card Issuance" block is calculated as "Number of issued Chip cards" minus "Of which are only Contactless" and "Of which are Contact and Contactless".
    • [CARDS-55584]
      • Fixed Declined authorisation message processing to avoid situations when increment of an authorisation code counter lead to an exception on a non-home node of a WAY4 HA Distributed Processing solution.
    • [CARDS-55613]
      • Restored default behaviour for charging regular fees. Documents for regular fees are not created now for contracts with Invalid contract statuses.
    • [CARDS-55614]
      • MasterCard CDF Export: fixed processing of the "CustomIdentifierType" field defined in the ADD_FIELDS_FINANCIAL_TRANSACTION_5000 pipe parameter. The "CustomIdentifierType" field was erroneously filled with the "CustomIdentifier" custom tag value instead of the "CustomIdentifierType" custom tag value.
Also fixed "CustomIdentifier" field processing - it is cut if length is greater than allowed by the format.
    • [CARDS-55616]
      • Corrected Advanced Applications R2 file import to prevent locking the processing contract during parallel loading that could cause deadlocks.
    • [CARDS-55617]
      • Added the default value of the AUTH_SKIP_TAGS_INHERIT global parameter with tags that are not inherited from an authorization to financial document: CASHBACK_CURR, CASHBACK_AMOUNT, PURCHASE_CURR, PURCHASE_AMOUNT, POI_CURR, POI_AMOUNT, REP_AMOUNT, ORIG_AMOUNT, POI_ORIG_AMOUNT, ORIG_AMOUNT_R, ORIG_ISS_AMNT_R, REST_AMOUNT, REST_TR_AMOUNT, REPL_AMNT.
      Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]
    • [CARDS-55628]
      • Fixed the customized fields processing for MasterCard CDF Export process. If a customized field in the ADD_FIELDS_XX pipe parameters had [null] value, non-customized value was used for export. Now standard value is used only when there is no customized field in the ADD_FIELDS_XX pipe parameters. Otherwise, a customized value is used even if it has [null] value.
      Upgrade Note:
      The customized fields processing has been fixed for MasterCard CDF Export process. If a customized field in the ADD_FIELDS_XX pipe parameters had [null] value, non-customized value was used for export. Now standard value is used only when there is no customized field in the ADD_FIELDS_XX pipe parameters. Otherwise, a customized value is used even if it has [null] value. Please review ADD_FIELDS_XX pipe parameters to check if [null] value ("<CustomField>=;") is used to export the non-customized fields.
    • [CARDS-55666]
      • Changed usage change amount definition on financial document posting when USE_TRANS_AMOUNT=F. If no account for the contract exists in the transaction currency, the settlement amount will be used for usage.
    • [CARDS-55702]
      • DCI IPSE Export: supported export of closed (Lost/Stolen) cards.
    • [CARDS-55708]
      • Added additional check of amnd_state in document accept process to prevent situations when documents selected for processing have been deleted in a parallel session.
    • [CARDS-55711]
      • Added the possibility to create ContractAddInfo or ClientAddInfo application section with the ActionType defined in the application type.
    • [CARDS-55722]
      • Corrected "For Export" field filling in GL Traces created during backdated processing if the original GL trace was also created by backdated processing.
    • [CARDS-55727]
      • Deleted some obsolete objects to prevent undesirable use of unsupported functionality. This has been done for future compatibility with the new Contract Parameter approach.
      Upgrade Note:
      Для обеспечения будущей совместимости с новым подходом ведения справочника параметров контрактов, некоторые устаревшие объекты были удалены в целях предотвращения их нежелательного использования:
Удалены пункты меню:
- OpenWay\WAY4 Data Warehouse Interface\Configuration Setup\Contract Parameters
- OpenWay\WAY4 Data Warehouse Interface\Runtime\Contract Parm Value Update

Удалены формы:
- Contract Parameter - Export
- Contract Parameter - Export - Value

Удалены pl/sql процедуры и функции:
- scdp.RUN_RENEW_TRF_LINK
- trf_export.RENEW_TARIFF_LINK
- trf_export.VALIDATE_CONTR_PARM

Удалено представление (View):
- CONTR_PARM_VALUE

Опция LOG_MODE=CONTR_PARM_EXPORT в Product Inspector более не поддерживается.

В соответствии с имеющейся в распоряжении CMS статистикой, данные объекты никем ранее не использовались.
      Updated Manuals: [product_inspector\WAY4_Product_Inspector_Manual.pdf]

      • Fixed an issue with the Product Inspector's "test script import" pipe that required UI elements and graphic objects when the pipe was running under Scheduler on *nix OS in silent mode (pipe parameter SILENT="Y").
    • [CARDS-55782]

    • [CARDS-55817]
      • Fixed an issue related to POS Terminal cycle reconciliation when the cycle counter was renewed.
    • [CARDS-55825]
      • Fixed issue. Now generation of GL corrections for misc fee macrotransactions in backdated processing is based on target fee amount. If the correction macrotransaction has the same fee amount and equal GL traces, no GL corrections will be generated even if transaction amounts are different.
    • [CARDS-55831]
      • Synchronized the name "WSP_REQ_ID" of the document tag representing the "Token Requestor ID" field supported in "TCR4 - Supplemental Financial Data" in BASE II Draft Data Transactions with the name of the same tag stored as the document tag representing the token "Requestor ID" parameter. Renamed the "WSP_TKNREQID" tag to "WSP_REQ_ID".
      Upgrade Note:
      Исправлено ошибочное написание тега "Token Requestor ID" в онлайн-документах.
Тег "WSP_REQ_ID" заполняется согласно полю "TCR4 - Supplemental Financial Data" in BASE II Draft Data"
для загруженных документов, 
для онлайн-документов значение поля "Token Requestor ID" сохранялось в теге "WSP_TKNREQID".
Имена синхронизированы, имя тега для онлайн-документов исправлено с "WSP_TKNREQID" на "WSP_REQ_ID". 
Необходимо проверить используется ли данный онлайн-тег какими-либо приложениями. 
Если используется, то следует откорректировать обращение к данному тегу из этих приложений, используя имя "WSP_REQ_ID" вместо "WSP_TKNREQID".

      • Eliminated the possibility of deadlocks in bank contract accounts when backdated processing is done in parallel.

    • [CARDS-55880]
      • Changed behaviour. Now Customer Profile Handbook checks that the filtering item code exists. An error message will be returned if this code does not exist in the filtering handbook.
      Upgrade Note:
      Customer Profile Handbook checks that the filtering item code exists. An error message will be returned if this code does not exist in the filtering handbook. The old behaviour in which the entire handbook without filtering was retrieved can be restored by setting the value of the additional global parameter CP_HANDBOOK_FILTER to "WEAK".

    • [CARDS-55968]
      • VISA VCF Export 
1) Modified period ID calculation: if the PERIOD_ID_FORMAT pipe parameter is set to "L", current period ID equals the last day of the previous period for all record types. 
2) Added the new pipe parameter DISABLE_CHECK_CLIENT with the default value "N". If this parameter is set to "Y", verify that duplicate T4 Cardholder records are disabled.

    • [CARDS-56305]
      • Fixed the error message ORA-06502 when reading the INT_GROUP tag from the "Template Details" field
    • [CARDS-56309]
      • Added the ability for documents from "Hotel", "Airline" and "Car rental" SIC groups to be excluded from consideration as multi-clearing/multi-authorisation transactions by setting the global parameter MULTI_AUTH_STRICT=Y (default value is "N"). In this case, if a transaction is not specified as multi-clearing it will be considered as a normal transaction, with no additional processing for multi-capture/multi-authorisations. The AUTH_AMOUNT_DIFF_PCNT_RETAIL parameter will be used to define the possible difference between an authorisation and financial presentment for total funds unblocking instead of the AUTH_AMOUNT_DIFF_PCNT parameter used for multiple mode transactions.
      Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]
    • [CARDS-56313]
      • Corrected splitting by currency in the XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business.rdf report in accordance with AMEX specification requirements. If the P_FX_CUR parameter is left empty, the "Billings by Industry", "Account Balances", and "Interest Rates" sections are grouped by card contract currency whereas before they were grouped by settlement currency.
      Updated Manuals: [amex_statistical_reports\AMEX_Statistical_Reports.pdf]
    • [CARDS-56362]
      • Corrected calculation MEMBER_ID while gathering statistics for Quarterly IPS Reports.
    • [CARDS-56367]
      • Increased maximum length for MoneyTransfers bertlv message FF04.C2 tag.
    • [CARDS-56382]
      • Changed processing of the "INST_IRATE" instalment tag. Now, it is taken from the "E2.CA" bertlv tag rather than from the "E2.E1" bertlv tag.
      Upgrade Note:
      Эквайерам, поддерживающим на собственных или h2h-устройствах функциональность выдачи ссуды в рассрочку для своих карт и возможность ввода на устройстве процентной ставки по ссуде, следует обратить внимание на изменение тега для передачи процентной ставки в режиме онлайн. Теперь процент по ссуде передается в bertlv теге E2.CA вместо тега E2.E1. Данные изменения внесены из-за невозможности поддержки старым тегом требований к формату поля. Рекомендуется адаптировать работу POS-интерфейса и пользовательскую процедуру cust_auth_parse к данным изменениям.
    • [CARDS-56399]
      • Fixed the error occurred if the "INST_SCHEDULED_ER_BAL" global parameter is empty. Added the possibility to redefine the "INST_SCHEDULED_ER_BAL" and "INST_AUTO_ER_BAL" global parameters on the financial institution level.
      Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [core\multiple_financial_institutions\Financial_Institutions.pdf] [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

      • Enhanced calculation of VISA_MEMBER_ID, AMEX_MEMBER_ID, MC_MEMBER_ID statistical attributes in order to correct transactions fetching of certain IPS in XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Acquiring_Business.rdf, XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business.rdf, XLS_Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business.rdf, XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business.rdf, XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business.rdf, XLS_MC_Statistics_Acquiring_Business.rdf reports.
    • [I1608314406]/[CARDS-54939]
      • Improved performance of XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business report.
    • [I1609198831]/[CARDS-51029]
      • The amnd-history record was not created when the document was released for housekeeping
    • [I1610077363,I1702062338]/[CARDS-54159]
      • Enhanced the "Lost Authorizations" form to show authorizations with the "Inactive" posting status that remain active due to partial financial clearing. The currently blocked amount is now shown as a separate column.
      Upgrade Note:
      Изменен источник данных для формы "Lost Authorizations" - теперь используется представление ACTIVE_AUTH_DOC. При наличии индивидуальных настроек в указанной форме рекомендуется провести замену источника данных, что позволит просматривать активные авторизации в статусе, отличном от "Posted".
      Updated Manuals: [core\Special_Contract_Utilities.pdf]
    • [I1611016818]/[CARDS-56436]
      • Fixed CAB condition processing for IRD calculation. Previously CABs were loaded by the MPE Import pipe in SIC Groups with classifier code MC_CAB. Now the MPE Import pipe doesn't load/update SIC Groups with classifier code MC_CAB and the IRD Calculation process gets CAB directly from the MPE_IP0075T1 table.
To see the MCC-CAB relation, use the menu items "OpenWay\MasterCard\MC. IRD Configuration\MC MCC CAB Groups" or "OpenWay\MasterCard Fee Prediction\MC MCC CAB Groups".
      Upgrade Note:
      Clients who use the MasterCard interface should manually delete all SIC Groups with the MC_CAB classifier (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\SIC Groups). This is not mandatory, but now SIC Groups with the "MC_CAB" classifier will be not up-to-date. Use the menu item "OpenWay\MasterCard\MC. IRD Configuration\MC MCC CAB Groups" to see the up-to-date relation between MCCs and CABs.
    • [I1701094565]/[CARDS-52846]
      • Improved performance of Quarterly IPS Reporting by caching statistic attribute values when the report runs. The improvement affects Issuing and Acquiring reports for AmEx, MasterCard and Visa.

    • [I1705170227]/[CARDS-53896]
      • New parameters have been added to the "XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Acquiring_Business" report: 
- P_ATTR_VALUE_ISONUS. The default value is "rpr.on_us_channel(cg.group_channel)" to customize the "is_on_us" flag. 
- P_CHAIN_TYPE_FILTER_1 and P_CHAIN_TYPE_FILTER_2 have been added for filtering transactions. The default value for P_CHAIN_TYPE_FILTER_1 is "trans.chain_type in ('U')"; for P_CHAIN_TYPE_FILTER_2 it is "1=2".
- P_HIDE_REPOST. The default value is "Y". Used to hide reversal and repost operations.
- P_FX_RATE. The default value is empty.
- P_FX_DATE. The default value is empty.
- P_FX_CURR. The default value is empty.

New sections have been added to the "XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Acquiring_Business" report: 
- Discount Business Summary
- POS Billing Detail By Industry
      Updated Manuals: [amex_statistical_reports\AMEX_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

    • [I1706209234]/[CARDS-54014]
      • Corrected behaviour: now the DEV tag value will only affect PBT Status if defined on the Device Type override level.
      Updated Manuals: [acquiring\user_manuals\Acquiring_Module.pdf]
    • [I1706238241]/[CARDS-54542]
      • Extended PAN mask format with Card Category [:C] for variables (like %CONTRACT_NUMBER[:NXM]%):
%CONTRACT_NUMBER:NXM[:K][:C]%, where:
<N> - number of visible digits at the beginning of the number.
<X> - filler symbol for the hidden part of the number.
<M> - number of visible digits at the end of the number.
<K> - number of filler symbols; this parameter is not mandatory.
<C> - contract category code; only contract numbers belonging to this category will be masked. By default, these are card contracts. The possible values are: "C" - card contracts; "B" - bank contracts; "A" - account contracts and "M" - device contracts; this is not a mandatory parameter, "C" is the default value.
Contract Number for card contracts (with PAN) will always be masked, even if "contract category code" does not contain "C".
      Updated Manuals: [notifications\transaction_notifications\Transaction_Notifications.pdf]
    • [I1706260734]/[CARDS-54119]
      • To consolidate positive and negative Due Amounts from several Due Items for an acquiring product's accounts, the REFRESH_DUE tag should be set in the corresponding account templates.
This tag should not be used for templates involved in per-transaction Merchant Payment Statements.
By default, Due Amounts are never consolidated into one Due Normalization for acquiring products.

      • Fixed balance update algorithm to not update a balance if the account is closed.

Changed default value for the "SEARCH_AS_SUB" pipe parameter from "N" to "Y". It allows new detailed VISA BIN token ranges to be imported more correctly. To restore old behaviour, the "SEARCH_AS_SUB"="N" pipe parameter must be set.
    • [I1710031301]/[CARDS-54988]

    • [I1710057271]/[CARDS-55095]

    • [I1710095553, I1710100916]/[CARDS-55092]
      • VISA Base II Outward Processing : fixed "Error in CPS Data format" error when exporting documents with "F62" document tag that contains 62.26 subfield.
    • [I1710096925]/[CARDS-55076]
      • Changed the ARN calculation algorithm. To avoid "Incorrect Date in ARN (yDDD) : [7281], must not be less than trans_date" error, the transaction date is used to calculate ARN for the MIR interface. When the posting date is larger than the transaction date by 5 or more days, the posting date is used. For other payment system interfaces (MasterCard, Visa, AMEX) the transaction date is always used for ARN calculation.
    • [I1710098485]/[CARDS-55125]
      • MasterCard IRD Calculation. Fixed IRD PT definition: added condition for requirement "The card cannot be a contactless card".
    • [I1710100883, I1710100829]/[CARDS-55210]

Now DE65 (SRN) for 2Prs is inherited from Chbk by default. For legacy behaviour, the new SRN_FROM_PRS = Y pipe parameter must be set.
      Upgrade Note:
      Temporary behaviour of the VISA SMS Outward pipe, when DE65 (SRN) was inherited for 2Prs from 1Prs, has been fixed (this could be necessary for initial NSPK connection). Now DE65 (SRN) is inherited for 2Prs from Chbk by default. For legacy behaviour, the new SRN_FROM_PRS = Y pipe parameter must be set.
    • [I1710137253]/[CARDS-55184]

    • [I1710180238]/[CARDS-55290]
      • Modified VISA BASEII Inward Processing (pipe): now the original notification code from an FRS message type "MC" is stored in an FRS document (safe_doc.details).
    • [I1710189042]/[CARDS-55505]
      • Fixed an issue with moving amounts available to a new card contract when a card is reissued with a new PAN and the "Check" or "Billing Limit" authorisation scenario.
      Upgrade Note:
      Изменено поведение системы при перевыпуске карты по причине утери. Для карт со сценарием авторизации "Check" или "Billing Limit" выполняется восстановление заблокированных сумм, так же для карт со сценарием авторизации "Check" выполняется восстановление остатков на счетах.
Глобальный параметр RESTORE_CARD_BALANCE в значении равном "N" позволяет отключить восстановление финансовой информации на перевыпущенной карте. 
Значение по умолчанию параметра RESTORE_CARD_BALANCE = "Y", отсутствие параметра интерпретируется как значение по умолчанию, любое другое значение отключает перенос информации.
      Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [issuing\user_manuals\Issuing_Module.pdf]
    • [I1710189537]/[CARDS-55554]
      • RBS. Documents Export: Added checking length of transaction code.
    • [I1710194662]/[CARDS-55224]
      • Corrected incorrect routing search for incoming documents if ROUTE_BY_FORWARDING_MEMBER_FOR_CHANNELS global parameter is set.
    • [I1710242617]/[CARDS-55320]
      • Corrected behaviour of the global parameter TRIVIAL_GL_TRANSFER. For the default value of the additional global parameter TRIVIAL_GL_TRANSFER=N, GL_TRACE/GL_TRANSFER records are not created now when debit and credit accounts are equal. Accounts are equal when their account numbers, gl_numbers and account templates match. Previously only account numbers and account templates were compared.
      Updated Manuals: [accounting\WAY4_Accounting.pdf] [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]
    • [I1710257336]/[CARDS-55494]
      • Fixed incorrect system behaviour: when using the "Duplicate" action in the Service screen, the amendment reference for the new record was not updated.
    • [I1710259099]/[CARDS-55431]
      • Fixed issue. Now by default the authorisation process does not apply deferred tasks and the Secondary->Primary Synchronisation process does not create deferred tasks. If you use High Availability solutions, set HA.DEFERRED_DOC_APPLY=Y global parameter to restore the old behaviour and make sure that Object Task Scheduler is always running.
      Upgrade Note:
      Now by default the authorisation process does not apply deferred tasks and the Secondary->Primary Synchronisation process does not create deferred tasks. If you use High Availability solutions, set HA.DEFERRED_DOC_APPLY=Y global parameter to restore the old behaviour and make sure that Object Task Scheduler is always running.
      Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]
    • [I1711038051]/[CARDS-55878]
      • Fixed incorrect fleet target fee resulting from the end-of-month fee recalculation procedure for a document chain with two adjustments.
    • [I1711087785]/[CARDS-55761]
      • Fixed "Internal Server error" when opening forms for contract tariffs with Debug Level  - "Trace".
    • [I1711089440]/[CARDS-55897]
      • Fixed an issue with CM_USER table export using "export.bat" script.
    • [I1711090861]/[CARDS-56412]
      • Fixed exception "com.openwaygroup.pkgj.cliint.IStnd is undefined in the context" in cb_gate_balance_load pipe.
    • [I1711105367]/[CARDS-55526]
      • Fixed incorrect system behaviour: cases when the Parent Pack was removed from a Service Package, service_approved records under the Service Package were not created when reapproving the Service Package.
    • [I1711137893]/[CARDS-55724]
      • Fixed the calculation algorithm for the PS_TRN_NAME statistic attribute in all statistics reports. The algorithm uses the document's source and target channel codes to define a transaction Payment Scheme. Added the priority to choose a channel code for calculation: On-Us channels have the highest priority, then Affiliated channels are taken into account, and other channels have the lowest priority in the algorithm. Without such prioritization, the PS_TRN_NAME attribute could have an incorrect value for transactions processed in the channels other than On-Us and Affiliated channels.
    • [I1711138024]/[CARDS-55916]
      • Corrected behaviour: now a reversal message is forwarded to the next member even when the response for processing the primary message has not yet been received.
    • [I1711139617]/[CARDS-55559]
      • Increased the size of the copied account name in an account template to 200 symbols when adding a settlement currency (in the "FX Scheme" screen).
    • [I1711236209]/[CARDS-55890]
      • Corrected getting default values for report fields in MasterCard report "Location Administration Tool (LAT)" (OpenWay\MasterCard\MC. Reports\ATM Location). 
If the proper parameter value is not set in the device contract, default values from sy_handbook (with filter: group_code="MC_LAT_ATM") are used.
Refer to OW_HOME\manuals\language\MasterCard_statistical_reports\Quarterly_MasterCard_Reporting\MC_ATM_Location_Report.pdf for details.
    • [I1711286506]/[CARDS-56011]
      • Added a new process that is started in the Process Log when the "Recalc Additional Balances" procedure (OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\Special Contract Utilities\Recalc Balances for Contracts -> Recalc Additional Balances) is executed.
    • [I1711290412]/[CARDS-55791]
      • Increased the number of digits (from 30 to 32) in the "Reference Number" field of the GL Transfer table to avoid uniqueness collisions.
    • [I1711303675]/[CARDS-56191]
      • Corrected related contract definition for standing order when Contract Spc is specified.
    • [I1712116966]/[CARDS-56170]
      • Fixed incorrect CBS Stand-in processing of several independent authorization requests received within a timeout interval.
    • [I1712146476]/[CARDS-56119]
      • Improved performance of the procedure that adds an object to a case.
    • [I1712183916]/[CARDS-56115]
      • Changed sub-case creation when moving a document from one financial case to another. Now it calls the activity to create a new sub-case for the document for the target case if there is no such sub-case for the source case. Otherwise, the sub-case will be re-subordinated for the target case.
    • [I1712227712]/[CARDS-56335]
      • Added creation of a historical record in sy_handbook table when IssFeeCode is updated with a ProvidePaymentReceiverDetailsRequest.
    • [I1712288846]/[CARDS-56343]
      • Fixed incorrect processing of authorisation requests. An authorisation will no longer be rejected if two similar Warning messages occurred.
    • [I1801043828]/[CARDS-56349]
      • Corrected how the reversal entries of adjustment documents are shown in the "Merchant Statement Standing Order Entry Details" report when only the fee from adjustment is included in the statement. Fixed the optional ACQ_PAYMENT functionality which prepares data for external merchant statements.
    • [I1801086398]/[CARDS-56431]
      • Changed the "Select Case" form for moving an object to another case: the "Contract" field has been removed, case selection is performed by case identifier in a lookup selection dialog.
    • [I1801177190]/[CARDS-56533]
      • Fixed converting document SIC code to DCI "Charge Type" field in DCI Outward pipe. Previously the pipe couldn't find "Charge Type" for SIC codes starting with zero.
    • [NET-109]/[CARDS-56314]
      • Corrected the output of grouped interests in the Balance Prediction functionality.
    • [PRIOR-67]/[CARDS-55710]
      • Disabled sensitive data storage for EMV cards.
    • [WFCKF-2636, WFCKF-2637, WFCKF-2710(DUP)]/[CARDS-54449]

    • [WFCKF-2637]/[CARDS-54518]
      • Declined transactions on secondary now increment the version number of the main contract.

    • [WFCKF-2870 WFCKF-2843]/[CARDS-54958]

    • [CARDS-52807]
      • Изменен раздел "Использование шифрования и защищенных протоколов передачи данных". Добавлено пояснение того, что при использовании протокола TLS 1.2 должно быть исключено шифрование по алгоритму RC4.

    • [CARDS-54236]
      • Added installation and configuration manuals (issuing and acquiring modules) for the MIR Loyalty Program.

    • [CARDS-54409]
      • Renamed "WAY4 PCI DSS Implementation Guide" document to "WAY4 PA-DSS Implementation Guide". The document has been supplemented by the following requirements: prohibit automatic creation of Heap Dump; encryption of the connection from the client browser to the IIS web server; hide wsruntime debugging information; mandatory setup of application authorization using client certificates.
      Updated Manuals: [security_and_key_management\PA-DSS_Implementation_Guide.pdf]
    • [CARDS-54561]
      • New functionality - VAU & MABU support for issuers - has been implemented. See manuals. The service makes it possible for issuers to send international payment systems up-to-date information about reissued cards. This information will be used by international payment systems to respond to requests by merchants where these cards are used for recurring transactions.
      Updated Manuals: [abu_acquiring\visa_account_updater\Interacting_with_VAU_Acquiring.pdf] [abu_issuing\ABU_Functional_Specification_Issuing.pdf] [abu_issuing\mastercard_automatic_billing_updater\Interacting_with_MABU_Issuing.pdf] [abu_issuing\visa_account_updater\Interacting_with_VAU_Issuing.pdf] [abu_acquiring\mastercard_automatic_billing_updater\Interacting_with_MABU_Acquiring.pdf]

    • [CARDS-54916]
      • Added a description of the USE_DOC_DATA; tag to the standard system manual "Documents".

    • [CARDS-55122]
      • Added information to documentation that describes enabling an additional mechanism for replicating the state of nodes and services. For more information, see the Setup Manual for the appropriate High Availability solution.

    • [CARDS-55259]
      • Updated document: key size requirement has been changed (112 bits for 3DES, 128 bits for AES, and least 2048 bits for RSA algorithm).
      Updated Manuals: [security_and_key_management\PA-DSS_Implementation_Guide.pdf]
    • [CARDS-55644]
      • Corrected description of the TRIVIAL_GL_TRANSFER global parameter.
      Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]
    • [CARDS-54454]
      • Upgrade Note:
      Для поддержки требований платежных систем по VISA Fast Funds, MasterCard MoneySend, осуществлению выплат государственных учреждений РФ на карты платежной системы «Мир» существует возможность настроить систему WAY4 для быстрого зачисления средств. Определить использование этих настроек можно по наличию глобальных параметров VISA_FAST_FUNDS, MC_FAST_FUNDS, MIR_FAST_FUNDS со значением "Y" в форме OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Additional Global Parameters.
Механизм обработки быстрых зачислений был изменен. 
Теперь при загрузке из клирингового файла платежной системы документ в системе WAY4, как и раньше, формируется с типом транзакции Notif Prs Credit Item. Далее если при обработке клирингового документа процессом Document Processing оригинальный финансовый документ, сформированный в онлайн-режиме из авторизационного, будет найден, то клиринговый документ Notif Prs Credit Item успешно обработается с кодом ответа "Successfully completed". 
Если же при обработке клирингового документа оригинальный финансовый не будет найден, обработка Notif Prs Credit Item прервется. При этом будет сформировано предупреждающее сообщение "Presentment not found for fast funds notification, converting to presentment", тип транзакции клирингового документа будет изменен на CH Payment. При следующем запуске обработка клирингового документа процессом Document Processing произойдет уже с учетом обновленных параметров.
Банкам-эмитентам, предоставляющим своим держателям карт такой сервис, настоятельно рекомендуется провести онлайновое и клиринговое тестирование указанной функциональности.
Дополнительно, необходимо выполнить следующие проверки:
1. Выполнить приведенный ниже запрос и обратиться в службу поддержки поставщика системы WAY4, если запрос вернет непустой результат: 
select * from trans_type where amnd_state = 'A' and chain_type = 'X' and prev_trans_type is not null;
2. Проверить настройки Пакетов Сервисов карт Our EuroCard/MasterCard и Our Cirrus/Maestro на предмет наличия в Сервисе операций CH Payment условия срабатывания "DOC_TAG=PTID;DOC_TAG_VALUE=C07,C52,C53,C54,C55,C56,C57,C67;", однозначно идентифицирующего транзакции экспресс-зачисления.
3. Проверить настройки пунктов меню загрузки клиринговой информации VISA, MasterCard на предмет наличия параметра USE_PAYMENT_TRANSACTION = N. Использование параметра USE_PAYMENT_TRANSACTION = N не совместимо работой технологии VISA Fast Funds, MasterCard MoneySend, осуществление выплат государственных учреждений РФ на карты платежной системы «Мир».
В случае использования параметра USE_PAYMENT_TRANSACTION = N необходимо обратиться в службу поддержки поставщика системы WAY4.
    • [CARDS-55073]
      • Disabled the SET_CREDIT_LIMIT_MODE global parameter.
      Upgrade Note:
      Банкам-эмитентам настоятельно рекомендуется проверить наличие глобального параметра "SET_CREDIT_LIMIT_MODE" в форме "Additional Global Parameters". Отсутствие глобального параметра или его наличие со значением, равным "SET_NEW" (значение по умолчанию), не требует никаких изменений. В случае наличия глобального параметра со значением "ADD" банк должен принять к сведению, что поведение системы при этом остается таким же, как и при значении по умолчанию. Изменение кредитного лимита в форме редактирования контракта (карточного или счетового) по кнопке [Credit Limit] выставляет новое значение кредитного лимита равным введенному значению. Если банком ожидается другое поведение, то необходимо обратиться в службу поддержки поставщика системы WAY4.
      Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [help system - acquiring\main_lng.chm and issuing\main_lng.chm] [help system - acquiring\main_lng.chm and issuing\main_lng.chm] [issuing\user_manuals\Issuing_Module.pdf] [product_management\Products_and_Subtypes.pdf]
    • [CARDS-56477]
      • Improved performance of data preparation for "Merchant Transactions Statement" and "Merchant Standing Order Entry Details" reports.
    • [CARDS-56589]
      • Added support for Visa Real-Time System Interface (RTSI) for Visa Resolve Online (VROL) services in issuing and acquiring. A dedicated module on the Transaction Switch platform provides two-way interaction between WAY4 Dispute Assistant R2 and VROL with minimum latency. All information exchange - inward and outward questionnaires, explanations, and details are available in the Dispute Assistant R2 interface (WAY4Manager UI).
    • [CARDS-56594]
    • [CARDS-57280]
      • Implemented new faster VISA OnUs Outward process - new pipe "VISA BASEII ONUS Marked Outward Processing". The "VISA BASEII ONUS Prepared Outward Processing" and "VISA BASEII ONUS Prepared FR Outward Processing" pipes are no longer supported. See Upgrade Notes for details. Pipes affected: 
VISA BASEII ONUS Outward Processing.dll 
VISA BASEII ONUS Prepared Outward Processing.dll 
VISA BASEII ONUS Marked Outward Processing.dll
      Upgrade Note:
      Изменена технология выгрузки файлов VISA Collection Only: 
1. Добавлен новый пайп VISA BASEII ONUS Marked Outward Processing, ускоряющий выгрузку On-Us-документов. 
2. Пайпы "VISA BASEII ONUS Prepared Outward Processing" и "VISA BASEII ONUS Prepared FR Outward Processing" больше не поддерживаются. Необходимо использовать новый пайп "VISA BASEII ONUS Marked Outward Processing" взамен. 
3. Поддержано новое значение Outward Status "On Us Outward", которое используется совместно с пайпом VISA BASEII ONUS Marked Outward Processing. Новый статус проставляется в случае включения глобального параметра MARK_ONUS и обработки документов индивидуально настраиваемой процедурой CUST_MARK_ONUS. 
4. Industry Specific Addendum не выгружаются в режиме On-Us, только чиповые аддендумы могут быть выгружены. 
5. Пайп VISA BASEII ONUS Marked Outward Processing может быть сконфигурирован для параллельной выгрузки. 
6. Номера файлов и батчей, выгружаемые пайпом VISA BASEII ONUS Marked Outward Processing берутся из последовательностей. Последовательности цикличные для каждого processing BIN внутри банковского дня. 
Параметры пайпа VISA BASEII ONUS Marked Outward Processing: 
START_BATCH_SEQ - начальный номер батча (по умолчанию - "5000") 
END_BATCH_SEQ - конечный номер батча (по умолчанию - "9999") 
SEQ_CACHE_LENGTH - размер кэша (по умолчанию - "1") 
Стартовый номер файла берется из существующего параметра START_FILE_SEQ (по умолчанию - "0"). 
OUTW_STS_LIST - список статусов выгружаемых документов, разделенных запятой. Значение по умолчанию - 'О'. Допустимые значения: 'O','Y','N'. Значения 'Y','N' используются только для выгрузки транзитных документов аффилиатов. Формат параметра: буквы в одиночных кавычках, разделенные запятыми. Пример: 'Y','N','O'. 
DEST_CHANNEL_LIST - список кодов каналов получателей. Формат параметра: буквы в одиночных кавычках, разделенные запятыми. Пример, 'v','f','K'.

    • [CARDS-53336]
      • JCB: Added message codes ("RjP-----","RJP-----","RmP-----","RmR-----") for reject processing.
      Upgrade Note:
      If the new JCB ISO format is used, the following Message Types must be added (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Transaction Types\Message Types - All):
1.
Channel=JCB
Name=Rejected Item Fin
Code=RmP-----
Category=Advice
Is Authorization=Fin
Trans Type=Rejected Item Fin
2.
Channel=JCB
Name=Rejected Fixing
Code=RmR-----
Category=Advice
Is Authorization=Fin
Trans Type=Rejected Fixing
Msg Details=OUT_ST=C;
3.
Channel=JCB
Name=Rejected Item
Code=RjP-----
Category=Advice
Is Authorization=Fin
Trans Type=Rejected Item
4.
Channel=JCB
Name=Rejected File
Code=RJP-----
Category=Advice
Is Authorization=Fin
Trans Type=Rejected File

    • [CARDS-53714]

    • [CARDS-53715]
      • If contract_subtype.add_parms contains the WSP_ADD_PERS_DATA_B64 tag, the tag value will be sent to the response for a token creation request as "Additional Personalization Data". The tag value must contain data in base64 format.
    • [CARDS-53769]
      • Supported processing DCI Card Production Confirmation file and storing information from this file in the process log.
    • [CARDS-53771]
      • JCB ISO Inward (pipe): added the ability to charge a cardholder using Cardholder Billing Amount (BIT 6) instead of Reconciliation Amount (BIT 5). "ACP_<memberid>"="Y" new pipe parameter must be set to use this functionality for a specific member.
    • [CARDS-53808]
      • Areas: "South Sudan" (code SSD) is included in "MC: Middle East, Africa (E)" area.
      Upgrade Note:
      "South Sudan" (code SSD) must be manually included in "MC: Middle East, Africa (E)" area.
    • [CARDS-53819]
      • Currency overrides are supported in the standard form OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Currency  Table.
      Updated Manuals: [accounting\Currency_Conversion.pdf]
    • [CARDS-53853]

    • [CARDS-53863]
      • [MC REL] 17.Q4 AN 1002 - Miscellaneous Core Systems Updates: update message for Tokenization event notification has been added.
    • [CARDS-53926]
      • [JCB Release 17.2] BIT54 is inherited now in chargebacks. No additional action is required.
    • [CARDS-53928]
      • [JCB Release 17.2] changed BIT 22.5 filling according to new documentation. The "JCB_RELEASE"="17.2" additional global parameter must be set to enable this functionality.
    • [CARDS-53952]

    • [CARDS-53972]
      • [VISA REL] Oct17-513 Global Mandatory 2.14, VISA BASEII Inward Processing (pipe): new "PAYMENT ACCOUNT REFERENCE" field is stored in the database field "safe_doc.details" if it is present in an incoming TC40 message.

    • [CARDS-53995]
      • MIR tokenization is supported.

    • [CARDS-54031]
      • [VISA REL v.2] Oct17-541 Global Mandatory 2.7. Field "Authorization Source Code" in outgoing BII presentments is filled according to new rules, described in article. Global parameter "VISA_RELEASE"="17.4" must be set.
    • [CARDS-54073]
      • [VISA REL] Oct17-588 has been supported.
Updating personalization data of tokens in 3730 message has been added.
    • [CARDS-54087]
      • If the parameter AUTH_REQ_TOKEN_CHECK is set to "Y" or is not set (the default value is "Y"), its value can be changed in a financial institution or contract subtype. If the parameter contains a comma-separated list of token service providers, no checking for these providers will be performed. If the list of service providers is empty, checking for all service providers is disabled (prohibited).
    • [CARDS-54094]
      • AMEX GNS Demographics Export/Response Import: implemented a new response matching method with the "Transport Data" field. This method is now the default because Merchant Id (Service Establishment Number) used before as a matching key can be non-unique.
    • [CARDS-54107]
      • VISA Fee Collection/Funds Transfer Reason Codes. Changed description for reason code 0150 to "Recovered card handling fees or rewards and ATM BI acquiring direct fee returns". Also revised all Fee Collection/Funds Transfer Reason Codes.

Contact Customer Support for the Copy Configuration file with the full list of revised VISA Fee Collection/Funds Transfer Reason Codes.

    • [CARDS-54266]
      • DCI MPE Import, CPF Acquirer Import. Supported DCI Card Products codes C and D in default value for pipe parameters  PRODUCT2AFS_MAP and PRODUCT2PTI_MAP.
    • [CARDS-54307]
      • VISA BASEII Inward Processing, Affiliated BASEII Inward Processing (pipes): Original Credit Transactions will be imported as Notifications based on the "VISA_FAST_FUNDS" additional global parameter and "Fast Funds Indicator" field in an incoming transaction. The "FF_TO_NOTIF" tag from the BIN table and "FF_TO_NOTIF_DEF" pipe parameter are not analyzed anymore. Notification will be converted to Advice by DataBase if necessary.
    • [CARDS-54308]
      • NSPK Inward Processing (pipe): G2C MIR Transactions will be imported as Notifications based on the "MIR_FAST_FUNDS" additional global parameter value. The "FF_TO_NOTIF" tag from the BIN table and "FF_TO_NOTIF_DEF" pipe parameter are not analyzed anymore. Notification will be converted to Advice by the Document Processing procedure if necessary.

      • Implemented service to export Initial Data load files and subsequent Update files from issuer to VAU.
    • [CARDS-54481]
      • Added support of new Initial and Update Data Load Response files import for Visa Account Updater service.
    • [CARDS-54494]
      • Added support of new "Account Change Data File" (R274) file export for MasterCard "Automatic Billing Updater" service.
    • [CARDS-54495]

    • [CARDS-54500]
      • VISA RA configuration has been modified for Intra-AP region.
    • [CARDS-54515]
      • VAU/MABU: Added workflow to correct sent or rejected Issuer messages.
    • [CARDS-54531]
      • DA R2: Added use of Trusted Amount in amount pre-calculation for a final chargeback if the first chargeback is for the full transaction amount.
    • [CARDS-54636]
      • Implemented  loading of historical data. Three new parameters have been added to the pipes com.openwaygroup.pipe.dci.clearing_import.jar and
com.openwaygroup.pipe.dci.inward_processing:
- HISTORY_MODE=Y/N (the default value is "N") - pipe's mode of operation.  If HISTORY_MODE=Y, data from an incoming file are loaded without addendums and with outward status="History" .
- HIST_ARN_LIST - ARN filter (list of ARN with commas as delimiters) for historical documents. The parameter only works if HISTORY_MODE=Y.  If the ARN of a processed document is included in this list, the document is downloaded. If HIST_ARN_LIST is empty and HISTORY_MODE =Y, all documents from the incoming file are downloaded as historical documents.
- HISTORY_POSTING=Y/N (the default value is "N"). If HISTORY_POSTING=Y, an attempt to post a downloadable document is made.
    • [CARDS-54675]
      • Added the pipe parameter LINE_TERMINATOR for MC Rates Import. By default LINE_TERMINATOR=0D0A.
    • [CARDS-54686]
      • Currency Table: Exponent for Chilean Peso and Uganda Shilling has been changed from 2 to 0 in the standard configuration.
    • [CARDS-54712]
      • Sending information about account closing to IPS has been added to the card contract status change procedure. Contract status codes should be configured in the ABU_CONTR_CLOSED_CODES global parameter (can be configured for a financial institution) to trigger information sending when the appropriate status is set. Information is only sent for contracts that have the ABU=Y tag configured in the contract subtype.
      Updated Manuals: [abu_issuing\mastercard_automatic_billing_updater\Interacting_with_MABU_Issuing.pdf]
    • [CARDS-54729]
      • Modified VISA RA configuration and interchange tariffs for Bulgaria according to VISA bulletin on 22 July 2017.
      Upgrade Note:
      The VISA_RELEASE parameter must be set to "17.3". The RA configuration must be imported from the VISA_RA_CFG_REL_17_Q4_EU_CC.txt file according to "Configuring WAY4 Parameters to Calculate Visa RA" manual. The Fee Prediction tariffs must be imported from the config\fp\VISA\BGR\TRFDMN_2016-02-16_18.xml file.
    • [CARDS-54735]
      • Replaced "CUP Inward Processing.dll" with a new java pipe, "com.openwaygroup.pipe.cup.inward_processing.jar". Removed the pipe parameters CHANNEL, CHANGE_CURR_IN, and EXT_CURR_EXP. Supported loading of Intra-currency Settlement Block File.
      Upgrade Note:
      For WAY4Cards version from 03.46.20:
The client must check the menu item that is used to run Union Pay Outward Processing and change it according to the new corresponding standard menu item (OpenWay\UPI\UPI. Daily Procedures\UPI. Inward Processing\UPI Inward Processing). If the menu item used the parameters CHANGE_CURR_IN and/or EXT_CURR_EXP, currency/currency exponent overrides must be configured in the database according to the WAY4 "Currency Conversion" document, section "Redefining Currency for clearing documents".
For WAY4Cards version from 03.44.30:
Loading of Intra-currency Settlement Files has been supported. Contact Customer Support for the installation manual.

    • [CARDS-54891]
      • Changed VISA OCT reversal processing. OCT reversals with Target Channel "VISA SMS" are rejected with Return Code "12" and Posting Status "Under Workflow". OCT reversals with Target Channel "VISA" are not sent in the online phase and should be sent in clearing.
      Upgrade Note:
      В случае непредвиденных ситуаций (отправки в канал VISA онлайн-отмены OCT-транзакций) документу присваивается статус Under Workflow - для ручного разбора.
После проведения реконсиляции необходимо документы с таким статусом проанализировать и принять решение о постировании или отмене документа.
      Updated Manuals: [transaction_management\Documents.pdf]

    • [CARDS-55064]
      • Tokenization Event Notification (TVN) message with Event Indicator 8 (exception) is allowed 
regardless of token number presence in a request. This TVN message doesn't change token status in the system (if present).
    • [CARDS-55069]
      • VISA VCF Export: added pipe parameter PERIOD_ID_FORMAT. Valid values: F, L.
F (default value) - period ID is calculated from the beginning of the current billing period. L - period ID is calculated from the end of the previous billing period.

    • [CARDS-55723]
      • Supported multiple Tariff Segments loading by MPE Import. Affected pipes: com.openwaygroup.pipe.mc.mpe_import.jar.
      Upgrade Note:
      This change affects customers that use Fee Prediction and load tariffs from an MPE file. Multiple Tariff Segments loading has been supported. Customers are recommended to test Interchange Tariff loading from MPE files in their configuration.
    • [CARDS-55734]
      • Modified the interchange tariffs for Belgium according to MasterCard announcement 1151 on October 17, 2017.
    • [CARDS-55740]
      • Increased the length of the fields DOC.REASON_CODE, DSP_REASON.CODE, REASON_CODE.CODE, REASON_ACTION.TGT_REASON_CODE, DISPUTE_TYPE.INW_REASON_CODE, DISPUTE_TYPE.REASON_CODE, DISPUTE_ITEM.INW_REASON_CODE, DISPUTE_ITEM.REASON_CODE, CM_CASE_DOC.REASON_CODE from 4 to 32 symbols.
      Upgrade Note:
      Данное изменение внесено для поддержки требований VISA Claim Resolution. Длинные значения для настраиваемых оснований формирования транзакций (Reason Codes) могут использоваться только для целей VISA Claim Resolution. Все пользовательские интерфейсы, которые могут выгружать/загружать претензионные документы VISA, должны поддерживать длинные значения оснований формирования транзакций.
Соответствующие изменения влияют также на пользовательские представления, и их следует синхронизировать.
    • [CARDS-55784]
      • Added the P2P_ONUS tag to money transfer documents if both the Payer's and Recipient's cards in a transaction are OnUs.
    • [CARDS-55802]
      • [MIR REL] 2018.1 B-20: NSPK MPE Import. Supported import of new file field BILCURRENCY_CODE. This field is stored in the CH_BILL_CURR tag in bin_table. To override this value, a new pipe parameter, CHANGE_CURR = "YYYXXX" can be used, where "YYY" is the currency code from the file and "XXX" is the currency code to store in the database.
      Upgrade Note:
      [MIR REL] 2018.1 B-20: NSPK MPE Import. Supported import of new file field BILCURRENCY_CODE. This field is stored in the CH_BILL_CURR tag in bin_table. To override this value, a new pipe parameter CHANGE_CURR = "YYYXXX" can be used, where "YYY" is the currency code from the file and "XXX" is the currency code to store in the database, for example CHANGE_CURR = "643810".
    • [CARDS-55807]
      • VISA Acquirer Capture Import: supported import of Multiple Clearing Sequence Number and Multiple Clearing Count into the CLR_SEQ_NUM and CLR_SEQ_COUNT tags.

    • [CARDS-55912]

Pipes affected:
Affiliated BASEII Outward Processing.cpp, Affiliated BASEII Prepared Outward Processing.cpp, Visa Base II Outward Processing.cpp, VISA BASEII ONUS Marked Outward Processing.cpp, VISA BASEII ONUS Outward Processing.cpp, VISA BASEII Prepared Outward Processing.cpp
